Title: Worst car buying experience I've ever
Content: Worst car buying experience I've ever had They try to automate everything but if one thing goes wrong you have no way to talk to a human They just tell you to go to the app but nobody answers the messages there It's like trying to buy a car from a really apathetic robot I tried to take deliver of my car today and ended up wasting half my day and came home with the same car I drove there with Add to that the fact that you have to drive a long distance to get to one of their dealerships and it's just infuriating they don't have better customer service and have such a cheap bush league purchasing experience

Title: Disappointing Experience with Tesla
Content: Disappointing Experience with TeslaI have been thoroughly disappointed with Tesla s customer service and overall approach Their lack of response to issues is shocking getting in touch with someone who can actually help is nearly impossible and when you do they are extremely unhelpful Tesla also seems to raise prices whenever they wish with no regard for customers who have already placed orders or those who have been long term supporters of the brand This unpredictability makes it very difficult to trust or plan around their pricing To make matters worse Tesla is not regulated in the UK meaning there is no ombudsman or independent body to hold them accountable for their actions This leaves customers with little recourse when things go wrong For a company that claims to lead in innovation and customer experience they have a long way to go in terms of transparency accountability and support I cannot recommend Tesla based on my experience Their approach feels dismissive and unreliable which is not what you expect when purchasing a premium product

Title: 5 5 for the car 0 5 for the dealer
Content: The car model 3 is excellent though feels a little cheap compared to ICE cars of a similar price It's enormous fun to drive and autopilot is awesome The after sales care is shocking They deny legal obligations to fix things and the warranty period is less than a Dacia which is surprising on a 50k car The things that go wrong are mostly niggles But you do need the warranty I think it would be better if they didn't pretend to have a dealer network for all the good they do I was expecting a proper company that stands behind their product That's not what you get

Title: Utter Rubbish
Content: Utter Rubbish 3 owner for the last 3 years Good start but the reliability went down hill rapidly Nav cameras and sensors would stop working repeatedly Trying to get a service was impossible customer service is appalling Getting rid in three weeks Never buying one of these clown cars again

Title: Put a deposit on a cybertruck 4 years
Content: Put a deposit on a cybertruck 4 years ago For the last 2 years I've been trying to contact Tesla for a refund but they never answer the phone When you login to your online account the option manage order takes you to a black screen with a message telling you to contact them on a telephone number I've been trying to contact them for 2 years and finally got through to them today after waiting over 20 minutes on the phone Let's hope that refund arrives cos I don't want to wait another 2 years to get through to someone It took 2 years cos sometimes I ran out of waiting time because I have a job to attend to and a family to look after and the waiting time has usually been longer than it was today Don't touch Tesla with a barge pole Hate to think how long it takes to get hold of them when something goes wrong with the car and I've heard rumours that things often go wrong with them

Content: For all you Tesla fans If you don't want the great dictator Trump to become president stop buying Tesla cars When Elon Musk donates his gazillion to Trump campaign you have chipped in as well You don't want to do that right If you work for Tesla or Twitter or SpaceX or whatever Musk owns get yourself a decent job You deserve something much better Shame on you Musk Bet on a big tax reduction by Trump administration When the dirty money married the dirty politics that's the end of the American democracy

Title: Tesla UK Attempting to Return Car After Diagnosed Steering Failure
Content: My leased Tesla experienced a complete steering failure while driving on October 19th nearly causing an accident The steering fully locked up while the car was in motion and couldn't be 'unlocked' until the car was turned off and on again What's happened since has revealed deeply concerning practices around Tesla's safety protocols and customer service The most alarming aspect is this Tesla's own remote diagnostic system identified a steering rack fault with the car displaying a limited steering may apply warning Yet after two physical inspections they've claimed they couldn't replicate the fault and have twice attempted to return the vehicle without any repairs They even suggested that it might be a 'one off' and if it happens again to undertake a reset on the steering wheel What if 'it happens again' while driving on a motorway They're now threatening 40 day storage fees for my refusal to collect a car that their own systems flagged as having a steering issue This fundamental contradiction between their remote diagnostics and physical inspections remains completely unexplained How can a car that Tesla's own systems identified as having a fault suddenly be deemed safe for the road without any repairs This raises serious questions about their safety protocols and diagnostic procedures Their customer service response has been equally concerning Safety critical issues appear to either fall outside their staff's training capabilities or worse aren't treated with the gravity they deserve Responses have been limited to a generic templated email with no evidence that anyone understands the serious safety implications of returning a vehicle to the road after a diagnosed steering fault The DVSA is now investigating this safety issue For a premium brand marketing itself on technology and safety Tesla's handling of this situation suggests a worrying disconnect between their diagnostic systems repair protocols and customer safety Potential customers should carefully consider whether Tesla has the proper infrastructure and processes to handle serious technical faults before purchase I am still waiting for a response from them

Title: Terrible service
Content: Great car AWFUL customer service The car showed delivery in September when I bought it Then every day the 10 day delivery window moved back 1 day Tesla only has email no phone number Email after email after email no response Eventually they get back to me and tell me the delay is because of the silver wheels and I can get the car within the week if I went with black Would have been really helpful if they'd told me that weeks earlier rather than ignoring my communications They finally give me a delivery date November 1 The same day I move in to a new house the main reason I bought the car and desperately needed the car for that move Now I've had to spend 4000dkk on a rental car for the move And still no responses from Tesla even though they promised to get back to me about compensation Really really bad customer support I choose to lease as I wanted to buy once the new model Y comes out Now I'll never buy a Tesla based on the terrible service and the staff that just don't care

Title: I have 2 Tesla Model S and Model Y 2023
Content: I have 2 Tesla 1 Model S 2 Model YLast night call roadside services for flat tire they open the case and after 1 min none response text closed the case today I request Roadside service I have flat tire they by text said need to be replaced 468 the car purchase on 07 2023 the tires is only one year old and they haven't come to see the tire and closed the request again and said call your insurance or fix on your own

Title: An honest review of a Tesla Model Y LR '23
Content: Considering they're censoring all honest reviews wherever and whenever they can may this be the only place where one can voice the true value of this vehicle In short everything and more of what you hear is true I've had my Tesla model Y LR for a year now driven more than 30000km in all sorts of conditions countries and places A quick summary the interior space is free of annoying buttons and quite comfortable the ability to control everything via the Tesla app get in and out preheat cool the car and share the key with whomever acceleration it's now a given for all electric cars but still fun tesla charging network saves you a few minutes on each charge but most companies are now adapting Autopilot is a dangerous joke it's jerky it tries to kill you on the highway and is in most cases out of service because one or more cameras are dirty Windshield wipers Never in my adult life have I stepped into a car where having to fidget with the wipers has been more needed in auto mode they'd try and swipe off the light at a traffic light anything but what they're supposed to It's clear whoever engineered them hasn't accounted for rain in their calculations Lights this is where the other drivers should form some sort of union against being blinded by our tesla's the light pattern scatters everywhere but where it's supposed to Paint in short there's more and better quality on my toaster You'll see it right away but there's not much you can do about it value loss bought the car the very last days of December they discounted it by 40000DKK in January no message or offer to compensate Should've prolly just returned it considering the 2 weeks consumer rights thing Parking aid just as autopilot only trust it if you wanna spend your money fixing the car the 3D projection is often off and doesn't account for smaller obstacles as most of the pillars poles or other things you find in parking lots the only thing you can use are the cameras gaps it looks like a lego car when you really look into it noise insulation is pretty much non existent you'll be very connected to your surroundings Drive over long distances it can be really stressful and tiring for your foot considering you can't and SHOULD NEVER rely on autopilot a few trips on the autobahn taught me that the hard way I hear noises soon enough you start walking the fine line between paranoia and schizophrenia as squeaks start forming around the car A C heating as you start the system especially the AC during summer you'll hear something comparable to someone taking a can opener and trying to can open your hood a metal on metal scratch that Tesla Service considers according to specs all normal oh and you can't really turn off the air for your passenger you can only redirect it The overall feeling after 1 year of ownership is that I bought into a project prototype that will never really become anything more Conclusion a gigantic DON'T BUY there are other options out there More so now that it has become a symbol of ignorance and malevolence P s if there are any Tesla competitors out there I'd be very willing to share a detailed report of the above They can't be selling all this smoke without consequences

Title: I have a Tesla lease
Content: I have a Tesla lease When I decided to move provinces I learn that the insurance company needs a form from Tesla Finance to be able to cancel the insurance in the first province I have been trying to get this from them for 2 months They won't respond so I'm stuck paying an extra 250 month in insurance because they won't provide a simple document No one will respond at all and there is no one to complain to The only people at Tesla you can contact are sales people to sell you a car When you need something after that you're on own Goodbye I'll never buy a Tesla again because of the company not the product

Title: Extremely POOR customer support
Content: First and foremost I love my new Model 3 the car's safety and technology are amazing but please find the time and resources to improve your aftercare it is appalling I find it a painful experience even trying to contact Tesla When I have dealt with their customer support agents they are friendly but hardly ever resolve issues Whenever I send emails to them they are either slow to reply don't reply or I have to deal with another agent Please address these concerns and improve your appalling customer service

Title: Bad experience
Content: I applied to purchase a Tesla in Houston Tx when I went to pick it up at the Cypress location I was shocked to find a front bumper damage on the car Despite multiple requests they neither replaced the car nor offered any compensation Later 300 was deducted as a reservation fee and 50 for insurance without prior notice After numerous attempts to communicate the response was entirely unhelpful This was a disappointing experience and I recommend thoroughly checking everything before purchasing from this location

Title: Instead I writing my frustration I ll
Content: Instead I writing my frustration I ll just copy and paste my text message I sent That doesn't make sense you offer financing on you use inventory but don't offer pre approvals You guys keep sending me links I've exercised already on top of that I've gotten pre approved from my bank Buts it's ok you guys have been very unhelpful when it comes to the used inventory I've sent out 4 requests on your used cars and not one person called back I now really understand why people can Love the cars but hate the Customer Service it's trash So may you have a great day And hopefully you understand that even though I not yet a Tesla owner this experience is horrible More people need to make YouTube video on this so they will be force to improve the area of the company It s too easy for them to get away with it because the product is so popular and loved

Title: Worst ever car experience
Content: Worst ever car experience This is my 7 th PCP car and decided to get a tesla Paid the deposit and finanliased the funding Tesla decided change the configuration Removed the despit contribution increased the car price and didn't leave the decency to let me know I phoned tesla 6 times Finally they answered and the explanation was sorry we couldn't informed you that your initial deposit have gone up from 5000 to 10000 we can't do much this is the worst ever ever experience that I have had buy a car

Title: Rip off
Content: I simply wanted to know if the service history was up to date on my vehicle However Tesla wont tell you They wont let you know what a previous owner has had done So they'll basically charge you for a service appointment even if they know nothing needs doing Im gobsmacked On top of these rip off tactics they have the Worst customer service ever Unhelpful and abrupt Not knowledgeable about vehicle issues and read from a script I'm so gutted I expected a lot more from this company I wouldnt recommend the BRAND or service but love the model x I purchased

Title: Brent Cross collection point is a place
Content: Brent Cross collection point is a place where youth and ambition come to die If anything goes wrong expect no one to take any responsibility or be remotely helpful in resolving issues Staff can barely make eye contact with you to begin with and when there was a mix up with trading in my current Tesla caused by their staff misinforming me I was treated with contempt rather than as a customer with any value In the follow up weeks where I repeatedly had to email a member of staff Louis Galvani who was meant to return my key cards to me I was simply ignored Aside from using the app getting in touch with a human to get anything done or raise a complaint is clearly made deliberately difficult and there is no desire to give good customer service despite the expense of a car to most people This seems to be their business model and if this is the future then count me out On the back of this experience my new Tesla will be my last and I ll switch to another electric car provider like BYD in the hope that they still value their customers

Title: 0 if possible

Title: My experiance with tesla sheffield
Content: My experiance with tesla sheffield Yes I had a few concerns Yes I was upset But After a double phone call both from Gary Drummond and Robert Addinall all was solved and dealt with in a very proffesional manner many bad reviews in regards to customer service on here I can assure you that this will change Tesla management went above and beyond to resolve my issues Also many improvements to be made in regards to comms with customers in regards to estimates and the way the app works I cannot thank Tesla eneough for putting me at rest after suffering both with anxiaty and a recent heart attack Thank you to jo and Chris also from the team at sheffield A very happy customer Mr grubb

Title: Tesla incompetence continues
Content: You will all hopefully have seen my previous reviews regarding the appalling Customer service provided by Tesla particularly Tesla Bristol After 3 weeks of chasing Tesla to return the 180 they owe me and have got nowhere I have now reported them to Trading Standards and requested a chargeback on my bank account Looks like I will be taking them to the small claims court for my refund I cannot believe how truly awful they are in relation to dealing with Customers when they themselves make mistakes I regret ever trying to buy a car from this company and in my opinion you should avoid them and seek an alternative manufacturer I've since bought a fully electric Volvo EX40 which took less than an hour to complete after a very good test drive

Title: I have been waiting for 2 month for a
Content: I have been waiting for 2 month for a part that my Model Y to be repaired but still I have been told there is no a delivery date for the part Tesla is a terrible company I will never ever even consider buying a Tesla again I will be very happy if I see the day Tesla is bankrupt

Title: Very Poor Customer Service
Content: We took a delivery of a new Model Y and it was full of scratches Now I am running behind the customer service to get it fixed and getting harassed due to their very poor quality control How can they deliver a brand new car which was full of scratches all over the body and leaving it to the customer to get it fixed subsequently They just don't appreciate the value of our time Stay away of this Company

Title: My Powerwall failed three months ago and Nothing from Tesla
Content: My Powerwall failed three months ago My warranty claim is stuck in limbo and Tesla customer support won't give me a name or connect me to the warranty department The repeat that they sent an email to my installer a month ago ignore that I have copied my installer on all the correspondence and they don't have it And that's it No replacement no way to talk to anybody and no progress I wish I could provide zero stars

Title: I just went through the Milton
Content: I just went through the Milton Hurricane I m very lucky many suffered far worse The worst thing I ve had to deal with the next Tesla customer service I reported A problem with my solar not working in early September It s still not fixed Indicated there be a delay now because of the hurricane Next available time they can come help is December 3 Although they re innovative technologically wide they don t give a damn about people and their customer service is disgusting Be very careful going anywhere near their products There are minions will lie to you on the phone They lie to you about what hours they actually work Why they don t pick up their phones chat services that don t work Their warrantees are worthless unless you re willing to wait for months for remedies Beware beware

Title: Support Does Not Care
Content: So there was a huge outage in my area and I guess it affected my software update download My phone key wasn t properly connecting my location and time were not updating and my unique features and premium connectivity were disabled I called support and the lady was literally like oh well I ll have to schedule you in for a local appointment there s nothing I can do Mind you the appointment she scheduled was four days away I called my local Tesla and they sent a remote update to my car and now it s working perfectly I appreciate them but support did not care at all

Title: Customer Service Manchester
Content: Having taken delivery of our Y model recently I felt the need to acknowledge the great service we received The salesperson dealing with us went out of his way to resolve the ongoing technical issues we were experiencing when trying to purchase the car through the Tesla app However having not been able to resolve this in the end we had to complete all the relevant forms the old fashioned way via email Rueben discovered the issues were not with the Tesla but with the finance company's system Rueben Callau spent time trying his best to help resolve these issues Without his help we would have simply given up on the purchase Thanks for going over and above Reuben

Title: After I ordered my new car
Content: After I ordered my new car the referral campaign started I wanted to participate without taking delivery of my car A Tesla official called and offered to give it to me as Tesla credit without participating in the campaign I accepted this offer but they have now refused to deposit the money My advice Don't rely on verbal conversations with Tesla Ask for written confirmation

Title: How do they get away with stealing from people
Content: They took 2 months to organise financing on a used car when I came to my senses and cancelled my order they immediately ghosted me not a single person has been in contact with me to confirm the cancellation or the refund of my 5000 It s been 2 months and still no contact their customer service is non existent How does such a big and well known company get away with stealing from people

Title: Bought a used Model X and love it
Content: Bought a used Model X and love it Minimal unexpected maintenance costs Regular updates on the app App contact informative helpful and timely Service appointments in Scotland are not as great as the Exceptional Milton Keynes Branch I wish there was a Service Centre in Inverness And if they put one there to make it as good as the Milton Keynes Branch Arnold Clark s Arnold Shark as its lovingly described in Inverness market share would go down the toilet An Inverness Tesla Service Centre would save me having to drive to Milton Keynes to get my car serviced which admittedly is not very often The only niggle I wish there were more multiple Tesla charge points in Scotland Fraserburgh Elgin Golspie Wick and Ullapool They would be the locations which would destroy the awful CPS Swarco offering in one swoop Love you Tesla Please please please lobby the Government to get rid of Swarco and get the funding you need to create or add to your Awesome charging infrastructure in Scotland

Title: Worst customer service Cars good
Content: Cars good Customer service terrible Trying to get into contact impossible Was sold a 185 speaker for my car which it always has the technician was shocked I was sold it and they refused to return it

Title: I join the majority of reviewers in
Content: I join the majority of reviewers in reporting on terrible Tesla service or lack thereof today I have a slow leak in a tire First the roadside service part of the app didn t work The confirm location button froze and I could never get through Second the regular service section of the app said that it would be 17 DAYS before I could get an appointment to repair or replace the tire Finally I eventually got a phone number for my local dealership s service bay to seek help with the roadside problem and never got a call back Tesla service is disastrous and this car will be gone as soon as possible Unfortunately and understandably no one is going to want it

Title: Excellent customer service
Content: Excellent customer service in the Birmingham UK branch Made to feel very welcomed and given the opportunity to test drive even after being informed that I was using a salary sacrifice scheme Jasmine was very knowledgeable and gave us the respect time and space required to make a decision Ordered the car this week Keep up the good work Jasmine a great testament to the company Well done for hiring this one Tesla Keep it up

Title: Not worth the overall cost
Content: The repair costs are not worth the purchase If at any point you need to deal with Tesla Service IN CT at least you will severely and thoroughly regret ever buying a Tesla The car itself is great but when it breaks it costs more than an entire used car Literally and anyone that disagrees I have the receipts to prove it The cars may be sexy fast efficient but overall all said and done pound for pound adding up all of the time you spend charging and repair costs my final answer is no not worth it I basically spent over 100 000 on what is essentially equivalent to a 20 000 value I do not recommend I would not recommend and I will NOT be purchasing another Tesla in the future I was under the impression that the longer a vehicle is in production the cheaper the parts would get I am wrong They go up

Title: AVOID Shocking Tesla Service
Content: Tesla Service Experience Frustration with Sheffield CentreI loved driving my 2021 Tesla M3P with 25k miles and an aftermarket aero kit until I needed service at the Sheffield Centre 1st visit early July No work done but both front wings were scratched 2nd visit July Held my car for four weeks failed to secure panels didn t fix their scratches as promised and broke my front splitter which I was going to remove but tesla advised against it apologised and promised to 'put it right' then they refused to cover repair costs on the quote they requested 3rd visit Sep They removed and discarded my custom T badge without approval saying replacements were cheap no apology given My splitter repair is still in dispute with no response It's a shame as I really enjoy driving the car Note to Tesla time for you to recognise the existence of your customers Sorry I can't rate you less

Title: I have a 2019 Tesla model three with
Content: I have a 2019 Tesla model three with 65 000 miles and it won t even get 150 miles on 100 charge This thing is a lemon

Title: Appalling customer service

Title: tesla is not living up to their promise have requested the promised refund on
Content: I have requested the promised refund on the cybertruck reservation deposit twice and haven't received even an acknowledgement How do I get my promised 100 back

Title: A Body shop repair bad Experience with tesla
Content: We are an auto Body shop repair business and we work with different insurance companies I wanted to make this review because we have had to deal with Tesla dealer and insurance services and according to the experience we have had it is the worst insurance company we have been able to work with when it comes to handling a vehicle claims damage and you want to get in contact with someone big surprise is that no one answers their phones no one returns calls or emails vehicle can be seating at the shop for months waiting on approvals for repair and no one answer or email back it is very stressful and frustrating So if you haven't experienced this problem yet you probably will For those of you who are thinking about getting this insurance or a tesla at all please do your research because you are in for a big surprise if you dont

Title: Absolutely awful customer service
Content: Absolutely awful customer service takes around 2 weeks to reply to an email absolutely impossible to get hold of a human on the phone I will never buy a Tesla again

Title: Abhorrent Customer Service
Content: Tesla has morphed into this app oriented company that is oblivious to honest and good customer service I had a 2021 MY lease I was sent a text message through their app that if I returned my car early I would receive incentives waive 2 months of lease payments and a 750 credit toward Teslas products The fine print that wasn't disclosed was that I had to do that within one week I started the process texted them back with an acceptance text DAYS later I receive a text that had a date scheduled for me to drop off the car Coincidentally I purchased a new 2024 MY which I was hoping to pick up at the same time Unbeknownst to me picking up my new MY was in a different city 200 km away from the Tesla dealership where I dropped off my lease In the meantime trying to schedule my drop off and pickup was a nightmare Tesla has no phone numbers where one can talk to a human to sort this out As it Turned out the scheduling did not happen within the week They did not honor their incentives because I was late beyond the one week in completing the deal Can you believe it They choke all their communication so customers have limited if any ability to communicate with a human to sort out these situations And when this extends the deals beyond their arbitrary deadlines they renege on their incentives They are the WORST Even though I now drive a Tesla I am recommending that people that want to drive an EV go elsewhere Save yourself the aggravation of dealing with these thieves

Title: Brought my model x to tesla for a tire
Content: Brought my model x to tesla for a tire rotation and tesla never informed me that the although the tires were 6 32nds in the rear there were massive shoulder damage on the inner portion of the tire yet they still performed a rotation They easily dismissed my concern and will not address the concern which may be an alignment at the time of rotation

Title: Dreadful Customer Service
Content: Dreadful Customer Service It took and incompetent uncaring team 3 weeks to fix my motor with only 21000 miles done The Sales staff were rude obnoxious to boot Don t by a Tesla They can t or can t be bothered with repairs Buy BYD instead I don t think they can be worse US is dead too

Title: Tesla has terrible customer service
Content: I have had Teslas since they first came out I love the car BUT the business model has evolved over time into a very poor experience as a customer One month after I bought my last car they dropped the price twenty percent They also charged for the power cord and started charging for the use of super chargers The standard rims for the Model3 are terrible But worst of all they do not have customer service beyond an app interface If you value good customer service do not buy a TESLA

Title: It s been frustrating
Content: I purchased a used certified pre owned vehicle from Tesla expecting a high standard of quality given the description that the car had undergone a thorough inspection Unfortunately the reality has been quite the opposite From the moment I took ownership I found myself performing the inspections identifying issues that should have been addressed beforehand Despite multiple attempts to resolve these problems with my local Tesla service center I am now scheduling my third visit in just three months On top of this the battery range has been another significant disappointment Tesla s commercial team presented me with a range far above what the vehicle actually delivers which is now showing only 75 of the promised total This has been a frustrating experience far from the quality and reliability Tesla claims to provide with their certified vehicles

Title: Tesla rubbish
Content: If there was 0 star that would be appropriate Most overrated car ever thanks to free media publicity Tesla gets not sure to help boost their share price Yet reality is Tesla is nothing but rubbish in my honest opinion Thank God Chinese BYD and others have delivered some great electric cars I wouldn't be surprised if Tesla goes bankrupt in the next few years Do your research even the so called Cyber truck is the same I heard Door happens come off if you shut the door with force

Title: Feel bitterly disappointed
Content: Feel bitterly disappointed by the level of service from tesla I was emailed a delivery date for my new car After taking time off to recieve the delivery and waiting sometime I emailed the advisor to be told my car was reallocated and that car would not be delivered After I wrote to them again three times before even getting a reply This has ruined my thoughts on this car and I am extremely worried about the level of service I will recieve if I ever get the car

Title: Appalling customer service
Content: All the money you pay and you get treated like a mug We were frustrated enough that we needed to make a 140 mile round trip to pick up a car for an employee we've always had company cars delivered before but we didn't buy direct from Tesla before We had to place an order thro the website which isn't great to navigate then pre agreed a delivery date to align with existing car lease ending this itself a pain because you can only agree the date a few weeks before Then at the 11th hour Tesla and ALD their finance Co fail to communicate with each other and as a result the delivery day is changed We now have to take off more time change the insurance arrangements and that's before we get there and experience the 'light touch' handover which I've not heard good things about Never again will we buy a Tesla regretting this purchase before we've even got the car We're a small business and the whole process has been inflexible and cost us time and consequently money

Title: Hard rattle and squeak
Content: Tesla Y experience after one year summarised Good Supercharger network Autopilot Ability to precondition cabin Integration with Apple Music Spotify etc Bad Constant rattles and squeaks that Tesla has tried but failed to fix and undermine otherwise silent driving Ridiculously hard suspension for UK roads The ride basically feels cheap If driving long holidays supercharger network still gives Tesla the edge If not higher quality softer rides exist

Title: How can Tesla stay in business
Content: We have a Tesla solar powerwall system Installation was a nightmare as their technician miss read his tool and thought Kg were lbs Ended up costing and much aggravation they denied it for months and then finally admitted it and fired the employee Now our system has been down for 4 months and the service call was just postponed another 2 months because the lost a service team Elon laid them off

Title: This company is going from bad to
Content: This company is going from bad to worse I have been informed by Tesla customer service that their policy on allocating loaner vehicles has changed Considering most customers have between a 1 and 2 hour drive to the the nearest service centre then Tesla drivers could be in for some serious waiting times at your local centre I for one won't be staying with Tesla

Title: What a total joke of a company
Content: What a total joke of a company We put down a deposit for our car a brand new Model X Due to a hurricane the financing was delayed The dealership told us that if we didn't pick up our vehicle we would lose our deposit AND the car would be sold to someone else All we needed was a few more days for Navy Federal to finish the application which was never in doubt Instead to avoid losing the deposit and the car we went through Tesla finance at a higher interest rate and will re finance ASAP We think it was because it was the end of the quarter on top of it right after the APR through Tesla went down Furthermore we found defects in the car including a rattle and badly applied trim The Falcon doors promptly opened into the garage door tracks and scratched the paint since their sensors don't sense properly I can't get anyone to call me back from the dealership and I can't get in touch with the company BEWARE there are no live people to talk to Everything is a pre recorded message or handled through the app Worst ownership experience I've ever had in 35 years of purchasing vehicles Tesla clearly thinks that they are in such demand that they can get away mistreating people and that someone else will be along to take their place

Title: Frustrating experience dealing with Tesla product support
Content: My Tesla wall connector has developed a fault and would not charge my Tesla car anymore I thought it would be straight forward matter as the product was still under warranty I went on to the Tesla app and followed the instruction to try to get the matter resolved It was tedious but I was OK to go along Little did I know that I was about to embark on a nightmare journey There was little support rather I was asked to provide all kind of checking results There was a lot of back and forth by emails without knowing if there was a real person at the other end They asked for all the minor details even down to the complete wiring scheme of the wall connector I am not an electrician and the connector was installed by a Tesla recommended company I suggested Tesla to send someone out to inspect the connector themselves in order to confirm that the devise was truly faulty There was no reply no response complete radio silence This matter is still unresolved and I still can't use the wall connector It is quite an eye opener about how Tesla treats its customers

Title: Worst service of any car company
Content: I have a Model 3 It is without question the best car I've ever owned But then it needed service and Tesla's service system is SO AWFUL that it truly ruins the entire experience It's not just slow it how rudely customers are treated and how they hide behind a mask of technology It is impossible to speak to a human and their text messaging system usually just involves repeated canned answers They constantly reschedule try to blame me for not responding even at one point blamed me for rescheduling when it was their system Tesla how can you treat customers like this And how can you not have a person available to resolve matters when you buggy computer system fails

Title: Can't get ownership transferred
Content: Can't get ownership on my Tesla transferred going on 5 weeks Previous owners transferred ownership and removed themselves Tried the app and there's a glitch and it won't complete because it says to connect the car to the internet which it is as indicated by the green check Told to wait 5 days just for an email took over a week Uploaded the required documents and told to wait another 5 days It's now past that and still nothing

Title: Tesla Model 3 2021
Content: Tesla Model 3 2021 battery failed after 17900 miles still under warranty warning alert that max charge and range maybe reduced ok to drive book service soon Booked service request told wating for parts 1 month later still waiting for parts which turns out to be a new HV battery pack Max charge dropped to 70 then 39 and refusing to charge car unusable and been unable to use for work and need a car to get to the airport in 2 weeks Trying to sort a loan car from Tesla but no one cares no service or support Given run around through endless telephone menus Shocking Given the issues we've had with the 3 Tesla's the business purchased we won't be buying new Tesla's when the lease is up in a years' time unless they do something amazing to sort out this mess Shouldn't expect this after only 17k miles but apparently reading online a widespread problem

Title: Customer service is an Oxymoron
Content: Tried to contact their customer service multiple times for a Powerwall after 2 calls of over 1 hours on hold I gave up Customer service is non existent I'm sure I'm not the only one as well with over two thousand reviews and 73 being 1 star

Title: Service process and reschedules are horrible
Content: First off the quality of this vehicle is way behind the Big Three in the US Delivered with hidden issues like a loose nut that rolls from side to side and a rip in the lower part of the dash that wasn't seen until a week in Scheduling service has been miserable appointments get rescheduled every time so far now from January 4 times out to July 8th This is horrible

Title: Mr Musk asking people for money like a
Content: Mr Musk asking people for money like a begger by investing in her Plattform After I signed up to get information for investment I found out that his concentration is on investing in Crypto coins and oil companies which all are anti environment All of what he told about green energy new environmental solar panel and etc was a big lie His social credit is minus zero to me

Title: I'll never use another Tesla product
Content: I'll never use another Tesla product again in my life I've used Tesla Solar City solar panels on my home since late 2017 In mid 2024 my roof suffered extensive damage due to high winds and hail So I had Tesla remove my solar panels prior to the roof being repaired It cost 1 640 00 to have Tesla remove my solar panels I was informed that the cost of 1 640 00 was the total cost to have the solar panels removed and replaced But after my solar panels had been removed which was unavoidable only then was I informed that it would cost me 4 160 00 out of pocket to have the solar panels reinstalled on my roof I find that to be deeply dishonest It reminds me of what scam artists do Paying customers should be informed up front as to all costs incurred in a transaction Tesla did not inform me of the total cost until after my solar panels had been removed Tesla lost a customer For life By the way since I had the solar panels installed Solar City was bought out by Tesla the customer service phone number ceased to exist and all ALL communication with Tesla had to be done via an online chat through Tesla's website That meant you had to be stuck at your desk for upwards of half an hour while the Tesla employee took minutes to respond to each inquiry I typed in Now even the website online chat is gone and a customer has to download a Tesla app onto his or her phone just to communicate with someone at the company but still only via chat People use solar panels to save money Tesla apparently doesn t agree

Title: Tesla is the Best Car I've Owned
Content: I'm 72 and I bought my first Tesla 18 months ago I absolutely love my Model 3 Performance Over the years I've had several high performance cars but this one is by far my favorite It's so much fun to drive and much more practical than all the other cars I've owned Love that I can charge it in my garage while I sleep at about one third the cost of gas Love that with over the air updates the car keeps improving Love that it can drive itself Etc etc etc My wife was meh when I bought the car but now she drives it whenever I don't need it and her car remains parked Tesla's are leading the car market into the future

Title: Non existent support extremely long wait time
Content: Very long wait time Service and customer support will give many reasons why the vehicle is normal and do not need repair Phone agent will get you to other departments to get you off the phone The support is basically non existent It is painful to get problems resolved

Title: Service a China company on Amazon would be proud of
Content: Our car has been in the Tesla shop for over a month and counting They do not communicate they do not have consistent answers on status when you drive there to get a response This company is brutal on customer service You could not provide a more incompetent and infuriating experience if you tried If i did not know better I would think i was on candid camera Please do not buy a Tesla if Elon knows the S is going on shame on him

Title: I will never buy another Tesla because
Content: I will never buy another Tesla because they have the worst customer service I ve ever experienced After my car would not start and I called their roadside assistance to get to an operator they told me they could not help me and the best I could do is call 911 Every service agent treats you like a number You can only talk to them via an app They don t care Highly recommend buying a different car

Title: Paid the 250 order fee for a Tesla Fake finance
Content: Paid the 250 order fee for a Tesla model Y for the 1 APR promotion offer Tesla pulled my credit through capital one Auto Credit approved up to 92k Tesla refused to finance my negative equity on my model 3 trade on that I bought 3 years ago The funny thing is that the negative equity was only 9k Bad business I requested the fine print that states they will not finance negative equity on their TESLA TRADE INS Received no response Will not be buying another Tesla Thanks Tesla Seattle Lynnwood

Title: horrific customer service at the
Content: horrific customer service at the London based Tesla it takes forever to make an appointment they barely ever communicate with you effectively and they're rude to boot They fixed the wrong thing on our car and then had the audacity to ask for more money in order to fix the correct thing It takes weeks to get a part in It takes weeks to get an appointment You are unable to talk to a human being and must go through their app to make an appointment It is terrible terrible terrible customer service

Title: Overpriced iPad with wheels
Content: I had bought a 23 Model 3 on October 2023 long Range Everything about this company is a lie and every claim is a half truth The quoted range is 341 miles nope it is recommend you charge at 80 so it effectively the mileage drops to 267 miles Why not say that to begin with Then you drive it and the remaining miles drops significantly even with moderate acceleration While I had the Full Self Driving subscription the car didn t receive any updates Once I cancelled the subscription I received 4 updates in a row After 9 months of ownership I traded in my EV now worth 80 of its value and went back to a reliable hybrid I just wish they will be will be more honest

Title: 120K Model S with 8K miles has water
Content: 120K Model S with 8K miles has water leaking on driver's floorboard and I was told by Tesla the next available appointment is about 45 days out Their excuse major cutbacks on mechanics Absolutely inexcusable for a company that profits billions BEWARE of TESLA I own 3 and would never buy another due to all their BS nickel diming not to mention HORRIFIC CUSTOMER SERVICE

Title: Last Tesla EVER
Content: I have been a loyal Tesla customer for 7 years first a Model S then a Model Y My current Model Y will be the last Tesla I ever own In the past month I have experienced such horrific customer service from Tesla that I ve decided to sell my Model Y and purchase a BMW i4 If this is the way Tesla treats its current customers I m not even sure if the company will be around long term Elon Musk doesn t seem to care about Tesla anymore

Title: The good 4 5 experience about TESLA
Content: This is very amusing and attractive company it s very efficient and good with its liabilities I refer you to there and every one is very nice and the would take deals this is the best and smartest car company because it s the fact that their cars are so futuristic and powerful I just got the tesla model x and it s amazing This is very amusing and attractive company it s very efficient and good with its liabilities I refer you to there and every one is very nice and the would take deals this is the best and smartest car company because it s the fact that their cars are so futuristic and powerful I just got the tesla model x This is very amusing and attractive company it s very efficient and good with its liabilities I refer you to there and every one is very nice and the would take deals this is the best and smartest car company because it s the fact that their cars are so futuristic and powerful I just got the tesla model x This is very amusing and attractive company it s very efficient and good with its liabilities I refer you to there and every one is very nice and the would take deals this is the best and smartest car company because it s the fact that their cars are so futuristic and powerful I just got the tesla model x and it s amazing and it s amazing and it s amazing

Title: The service can only be as bad as it is because there is not effort
Content: Try as you will You will never find worst service regarding repairs anywhere on the planet earth Tesla corporation has no interest at all in service The disinterest can be found on every level and I have seen it at every Tesla repair shop I have brought my car too It is bad on line too It is simply horrible No company could possibly have service that bad with out deciding that service does not matter Dont believe me test it Google Tesla Service You will find it nearly impossible to get anyone on the phone number what number you call try it The drive by service is horrible Never prepared will not show up with little notice and the will tell you to wait several weeks before the next appt

Title: My faulty brand new modelY no after service
Content: I have my brand new Model y Since I have my car nothing is going right All the sensors and all can not working no Cruse control air bag night on And the car stop charging constant Technical team and Road assistant Two of the girls hand up the phone no palatine no after sale service Have to wait for 1 months to Reprogram my car

Title: NEVER purchase a certified used car from Tesla online UK
Content: Purchased a Tesla used car from Tesla Certifed UK Arrived with damage and evidence of substantial body repairs Returned it immediately but having paid in cash this company has no interest in refunding my money It's been 4 weeks over 30k withheld They hide behind a system that does not allow you to phone the person dealing with your query You leave messages and they do not respond When they respond they say they are processing the refund They are in breach of UK Consumer Rights Act they do not care one bit No response to complaints nowhere to escalate I wish there was a zero star option

Title: From an owner since 2018
Content: I ve owned a Tesla Model X since 2018 and currently own 6 Teslas They make the best cars if you can call it that Driving anything else after driving a Tesla for at least a month feels like you stepped in a Time Machine and went back to 1900 Service centers can be a bit hit or miss Some are amazing and I ve seen people complain about others Personally I ve not experienced any issues When I had to have a trim piece replaced out of warranty Tesla service drove to my home replaced the piece and charged me 11 55 for parts and labor Besides tires windshield washer fluid and that 11 I ve not had to spend anything on service for any of our Teslas since 2018 They are the top 5 most American made cars as well if that s important

Title: I made the biggest mistake by choosing
Content: I made the biggest mistake by choosing Tesla Their customer service is terrible The charger I bought only worked for 14 days and I've been struggling for the last 4 months to get a replacement Initially I was told to drop it off at their location in BHx but upon arrival I was informed that I had been misinformed After two weeks of email exchanges Chris called and suggested I put the non working charger back on the wall or pay for it to be put back and only then would they send an engineer This approach is impractical and absurd It feels like dealing with robots instead of humans I strongly advise everyone to steer clear of this unreliable company at all costs Nikita

Title: STRANDED IN FRANCE
Content: WE RE STRANDED IN FRANCE UNBELIEVABLY BAD SERVICE IF YOU RE THINKING OR PURCHASING A TESLA DONT We are stranded in France with two young children 3yo 10yo without a hire vehicle or way of getting home Reached out to Tesla for assistance and welcomed with very unhelpful and rude staff When asked to speak to a manager was told against policy Back and forth for 3 days and I ve never seen such an unorganised company The lack of communication is unparalelled No one whos said what We are exhausted trying to resolve this ourselves and have been left trying to find our own alternative transportation and our own way home We have a 2022 Tesla model Y STILL under warranty Will be selling this car ASAP Avoid this company

Title: Speechless
Content: We had a booking via the app for a service tech to come and carry out a soft recall part We also drew attention to the rear lights alignment He said he will return with new lights and he noticed the spoiler was delaminating and ordered a new item as well Extremely polite very time efficient and im just floored by the level of service He also said i can text or call him with any issues or questions about the car as im new to Tesla and anything i need to know he will be there to help If i could give more stars i would This is night and day compared to Audi who i spent many many years with buying a number of cars The techs name was Graham sent out from the Norwich branch If you ever see him arrive your in very safe hands Well done

Title: No responsibility for sending wrong item
Content: I ordered a 32A adapter and on finally having the need for it opened the box to find a 16A instead I phoned customer service to arrange an exchange and to start the operator tried to explain to me multiple times that 16 32 are the same After much discussion he finally saw they were not Rather than apologising he operator said to start the exchange through the website but unfortunately it s the first time I have needed the adapter and 30 days have passed On telling the operator this information he wasn t sure there was anything he could do He also added the lovely remark it s weird to not check the item within the 30 days I think if the wrong item has been sent then it s on Tesla and not the customer Standard poor customer service

Title: I purchased or at least try to purchase
Content: I purchased or at least try to purchase a Tesla 9 weeks back now I finally picked it up today I cannot put into words just how dismal and dire the entire process has been Tesla are inept work shy and totally disjointed It reduces you to a sub human level Even the so called handover today just appalling No welcome no eye contact just instructed to walk around a miserable car park at Brent Cross whilst they repeatedly beep the car horn remotely until you find your car I have never ever experienced consumer customer service this bad If I could give 5 stars I would You need a certain tenacity to force yourself through the process if this is a sign of an automated future then help us all

Title: Tesla supercharging at Newark
Content: Tesla supercharging at Newark Notts has been closed for approximately 10 days Every day we go to use it as their website says OPEN but it is closed There is no information on site I meet people who've come a lot further than me who are also outraged I've just called Tesla 3 times the attitude of the customer service is the worst I have encountered Thursday 27 06 between 4pm 5pm It took 20 minutes before a human being female sales supervisor even though I selected supercharging wouldn't connect me to a service supervisor because they don't have phone lines so put me on hold for a further 20 minutes the 2nd call was disconnected and the 3rd female hung up It seems unless you're buying a new car there is a total lack of interest I was considering a new Y but why would I their customer service is non functional

Title: I ordered a car from Tesla and had a
Content: I ordered a car from Tesla and had a pretty poor experience I have previously bought 5 cars from Tesla without problems but they have really gone downhill now I ordered the car and paid my deposit for a car that was said to be available for almost immediate pickup I noticed that online the expected delivery date simply slipped a day every day for weeks on end Every time I phoned to see when I could pick up the car I was told a delivery manager would phone me back and I was promised emails to update me At one point I was told that the car wouldn t be able to be picked up anywhere near me and I would need to travel for a few hours to pick it up None of the promised callbacks ever happened and in then end both I and my local Tesla centre gave up I ended up without a car for a while and bought a car somewhere else If their customer service has become so bad they can t even contact me to keep my business as a repeat Tesla customer I wonder how they expect to attract new customers

Title: LOVE vs HATE
Content: LOVE my car DESPISE the lack of communication and help on the customer service department I ve needed a human being several times and it has always been next to impossible to reach anyone who can help solve problems They even sent me the incorrect title for my vehicle and didn t even apologize HORRIBLE I wanted to put ongoing in the date line below but that was not an option

Title: I can't emphasise enough how bad it is
Content: I can't emphasise enough how bad it is to own a Tesla Latest issue of many the key fob required to start the car has stopped working and the car is stuck unmovable The car can switch on it just won't drive because the connection with the fobs is broken Tesla's response is for me to wait two weeks then tow the car in These cars and the service levels are so unreliable it's really not worth any benefit you might imagine from owning one

Title: CS needs to be more active and responsive
Content: Tesla should do better on their customer service I love their cars and business model but without a good cs network there will be convolutions between manufacturers and users

Title: Tesla is for kids and not real car lovers
Content: I am in a love and hate relationship with Tesla I like the exterior of the updated Tesla with new sharp looking headlights and tail lights but interior is same as funfair 'bumper car' with no real car feelings

Title: From great customer service to really bad one
Content: First of all love the cars I am on my second Tesla And at first the service was great as it should be when you spend large sum on a vehicle But what my experience was with a simple warranty claim when tesla demanded me agreeing to a full payment for what they are responsible before even seeing me that is a hard no After this experience no more Teslas for me something would have radically change in their customer service to even consider Regardless how good their cars are Without CS all of that great tech is meaningless

Title: I can open my windows remotely on my
Content: I can open my windows remotely on my model S when it's hot outside but then when pouring rain starts suddenly the windows won't close remotely I wish there was a option to bypass to close them

Title: Impossible to get to the info you need
Content: Impossible to get to the info you need when its not on their site and you need to speak to someone No customer first type of customer service It feels like the moment you have bought the car youre on your own any issue you encounter are your issues Really sad best car ever but worst customer service which is enough for me not to buy again

Title: Unreliable car with wobbly panels
Content: Unreliable car with wobbly panels inside which kept rattling and the company is owned by a neo fascist Regretting my purchase on both grounds and cannot wait to sell this thing

Title: Nice tech but terrible staff
Content: The products are nice but the scumbags selling them are terrible As soon as you transfer the payment their attitude changes and they simply want to get rid of you I received a new vehicle that had too many issues and was incomplete because the options I had specified were not installed I was then ignored and blocked simply because I was asking for what I had paid for If you value your health and time go elsewhere

Title: Poor customer service
Content: Poor customer service Online chat just disconnected Expecting a delivery that never showed up between 12 4pm on a Saturday and a nightmare getting hold of anyone Should have gone to other EV manufacturer

Title: Very poor customer service
Content: I bought a new 2024 tesla 3 It quit running on the way home from the dealership It had 55 total miles on it After it was towed to service center we heard nothing from them No update no indicating what was wrong or how long my brand new car would say the service center The only time we got any info was if we contacted them Trying to find a person to talk was impossible Finally found a number on utube not on any Tesla app that let me talk to someone I love my car hate the service Tesla needs to do some training on customer service for their employees

Title: TESLA SALES SCAM THEFT DECEPTION
Content: TESLA SALES APP SCAMS1 Attempted Conning into buying a knowingly damaged vehicle by Tesla Sales Advisors Cleaning damage marks pointed out Told these were sorted and then when i checked and 3 were not was told yes we knew that 2 No communication during appointment or apology let alone offer of recompensation for wasted time expense and effort A drink was not even offered tho other customers were offered this 3 False trade in offer by Tesla to secure a deposit to then subsequently with exact same information reduce trade in amount by 14 000 4 Refusal to refund money Sales advisors saying Tesla App and processes meant this not possible Hiding behind the faceless system Tesla operates Then when escalated to manager told it would take 2 weeks then no communication other than attempting to force buying a car 5 5 emails and texts in 3 days asking for details of my refund NO RESPONSE WITHHOLDING 55K CRIMINAL ACTIONS OF THEFT DECEPTION

Title: Absolutely terrible service fromTesla
Content: We have bought many cars over the years but never have he had such a bad experience as that received with Tesla They changed the colour of the car without even asking then they cancelled our lease agreement when they changed the colour again without telling us The pickup date was wed and we have taken the day off work to collect we check the app today and it's changed to Saturday again without notification useless service and we are questioning going ahead with the purchase now as maybe this is a sign of things to come by I spoke to a college and they said they had the same experience I know you wouldn't receive this treatment from another manufacturer Tesla don't give a damn

Title: Bought a new 24 1 Tesla 3 Highland
Content: Bought a new 24 1 Tesla 3 Highland Arrived in March 2024 By April the list price had been cut by 3k Bad form to cut price but not honour lower price to existing customers given model just rolled out Also on collection the car had just 11 charge and no charging station nearby Terrible way to treat a new customer My first Tesla and probably my last

Title: Terrible customer service
Content: The car has some issues but my complaint is with the terrible customer service My nearest Tesla Service Centre is Stratford on Avon Their response time is shocking It took 2 weeks to get a response then another 3 to get my car booked in They told me on the day that it should be 'back today' but it took 1 month with me keep asking for updates For a separate car problem I got fed up with being told everything is ok so I asked how to complain and got a call from an irate person who complained at me Still no details of their complaints procedure received after asking twice

Title: I have not even received my car yet and
Content: I have not even received my car yet and I am having exceptional difficulties getting through to a warm body First of all they see my phone number and says they have no information about me even though I purchased a car last week I am trying to get through to them It's 2 30 in the afternoon and after going through the whole rigmarole of their automated answering machine they tell me to call back during business hours Well their business hours are from 10 00 a m till 7 00 I believe I'm within that window I sure hope that the car they manufactured is better than the customer service You would think somebody who owns a social media company would be able to have software that can direct you to a warm body

Title: Ripped off for charging of written off car
Content: My Model Y was allegedly written off in May 2023 It has unbeknown to me repaired and has been charged twice at my expense Tesla are refusing to refund me the cost as they say it s still registered to me

Title: The cars fit and finish is not good
Content: The cars fit and finish is not good I have owned the car for 2 5 years and I purchased it new The steering wheel is peeling I had 2 reflectors and 2 different doors sealing fall off If you re going to spend 50k on a car you re better off purchasing from a more reputable car manufacturer not a boutique software company

Title: I have been waiting over a week to
Content: I have been waiting over a week to obtain quotes for repairs to a vehicle we currently have in stock Have chased numerous times to be told I will get an email confirmation on an appointment then will be contacted a while later with a quote for the repairs that I have asked for Two appointment emails but still no phone call to give me the quote i desire

Title: Awful Trade In Practices
Content: I have been a loyal Tesla customer since 2018 I requested a trade in estimate for my Model 3 which is in excellent condition The estimate was right in the range of other companies so I decided to trade it in with them Only AFTER I paid the non refundable 250 deposit for a new Model 3 did they ask to do a re estimate The final offer was 25 lower than the original about 7000 00 CAD with NO EXPLANATION The person I have been texting in Vancouver BC doesn't seem to care about it nor is he willing to provide a proper explanation Now I am forced to cancel my delivery and lose the deposit Awful business practices I have always been such a supporter of Tesla now my buying experience is extremely disappointing

Title: Terrible delivery experience
Content: I ordered a new model 3 Tesla in February I was told it would be available in March then April then August and then suddenly became available in May Two hours before my pickup time I was notified by text that my trade in was 1400 less than agreed upon Can t talk to anyone Go into to delivery place and waited 4 hours Was told that they would honor the trade in price previously agreed upon but would need to reschedule Notified a day later that she was wrong and they will not honor it Very difficult to speak with anyone If I cancel my order lose my deposit I wound up putting a hold on it Worst car buying experience ever Hopefully some other car company will be able to have the tech of Tesla but also a better customer experience

Title: Tesla Solar
Content: Tesla Solar After taking over ownership on solar panels I've tried making the monthly payments but was told I had to wait for an account to be set up online I waited 4 months to get set up online and finally receive my first bill only to be billed for everything in 4 months owed now in one ok understandable its still owed As updated a company as I would think Tesla is this is not made easy to use the online system or anytime I've ever called in You can't set up billing online and can never get through to an agent rather than an automated system when you call When you do get a live agent its after hours of waiting on hold At this rate there is no way I would ever recommend this headache or experience to anyone Cant wait until I no longer have to deal with Tesla will definitely stay away from all Tesla products as I imagine their service is the same all around

Title: Customer service
Content: Customer service terrible Quality terrible I got a crack in my roof and have no idea how it happened Also the paint chips way too easily Self drive used to be amazing but now it beeps and shuts off every time you look the other way for 2 seconds completely defeats the purpose of self drive Price I payed 70k for my Tesla model Y in 2022 and now the prices have dropped drastically and there is nothing I can do to get some of that money back

Title: Expect zero customer service
Content: Expect zero customer service You will be pushed to a bot that does not understand your question and will not get you to a human to talk to Good luck ever getting a hold of a finance or warranty person

Title: This is disgusting the way they
Content: This is disgusting the way they advertise mileage is not even close to the estimated mileage lie lie lie in the long range 331 mileage you'll do less then 200 miles Big mistake bought tesla And the customer service is nutcase

Title: Their customer service is the worst I
Content: Their customer service is the worst I have dealt with as I have had many new cars and I can say the experience of picking up a new Tesla is the worst I noticed an issue and because it is over the week you have they don't want to know and trying to get hold of them is extremely hardWhen my car comes up for renewal I will not be thinking of another Tesla and definitely would not recommend

Title: Customer service is terrible
Content: Customer service is terrible No direct line to service centreEach message you send will be answered within 48 hoursCustomer service line not helpful at allThe vehicles are great but I wouldn t get one again because of the service

Title: Tesla nice car poor customer service
Content: I was looking forward to getting a Tesla but the customer service experience is terrible Everything is done through the app If you ask a question good luck getting an answer I canceled my order because of the poor customer service

Title: Not satisfied with Tesla
Content: I bought tesla car in 2023 and yet there is not delivery time it's more than 9 months now I paid them all the amount and now there customer support is not even responding to mails I bought the car because of Elon Musk but now feeling regret that I bought it

Title: Unbelievable bad customer service
Content: Unbelievable bad customer service I have already placed an order in Greece and I can t find anyone at the phone It s not possible a company like Tesla has this bad service So disappointing

Title: Crappy customer service they should
Content: Crappy customer service they should only operate in china

Title: Pick up location was terrible
Content: Pick up location was terrible They been running with more than 1 hour delay but notification wasn't send Emploe also ignore pick up customers They just been intrested in new customers to sell a car's

Title: After six months of driving a model Y
Content: After six months of driving a model Y the thread on the tire is falling apart Tesla has not provided any information with regard to the tire warranty and says that they can t do anything about it

Title: I'm on my 3rd Tesla and love it dearly
Content: I'm on my 3rd Tesla and love it dearly It's a love h8 situation The power and tech are unmatched However the build quality and service from Tesla STILL leave a lot to be desired They try kinda They fix things kinda Still can't take away my Tesla

Title: Sales team in Portugal are not
Content: Sales team in Portugal are not professionals They don't answer the phone or emails The delivery advisor does not know what he is doing My purchase of a new car became a nightmare

Title: I recently purchased a Tesla Model Y
Content: I recently purchased a Tesla Model Y for 37 000 which came to a total of 44 000 including Vat with a 3 600 deposit and monthly payments of 299 Excited for the delivery which was estimated to be a couple of weeks away I received a notification asking me to accept a change to the vehicle the removal of ultrasonic parking sensors in favor of cameras I accepted as there was no indication this would affect the price and there was no other option to proceed A week after that I received an invoice showing the vehicle now cost 2 000 more and my monthly payment had skyrocketed to 683 I immediately contacted Tesla only to be told that the original deal was no longer available as I hadn t picked up the car the previous month The representative suggested I purchase a different car or cancel the order entirely but I wasn t looking for a new deal I simply wanted the car I had already signed for at the agreed price Tesla s response was dismissive and unhelpful offering me no resolution other than a refund The lack of transparency unexpected price hike and poor customer service were incredibly disappointing I no longer trust Tesla to honor their commitments or provide a straightforward purchasing

Title: Avoid the Tesla brand Reviews tell the story
Content: You are left in need of a straight jacket after having need of a Tesla part I have been waiting two months They keep moving the date Expect no human contact for help after your purchase 0 10 for customer serviceElon Musk has lost the plot people please stop lining his pocket with your hard earned money and buy another make The Tesla drive is not worth your sanity

Title: Frustrating Experience
Content: I recently had a frustrating experience with Tesla service After booking a back glass replacement a month in advance I traveled two hours and booked a hotel only to be told at 6 pm the night before that my car couldn t be serviced the next morning I was advised to reschedule in two weeks closer to my house with no guarantee it wouldn t happen again While the staff was polite there was no flexibility on a resolution beyond there s nothing we can do and we didn t make you book the hotel which is true But the lack of alternatives especially after spending significant money on prior services was disappointing For a company like Tesla I expected more reliability and consideration for customer investment I would love for Tesla to handle this service and all future services but currently considering other options I m used to traditional dealership service from Toyota but not sure if I want to continue paying what seems to be the traditional dealership premium while receiving less than dealership quality service

Title: Service Experience
Content: The people processes and technology are not coordinated and consistent There was a warning in the app to have y 12V battery replaced but otherwise the car was working great Since it was a warning I made an appointment when it was convenient That appointment got moved and cancelled a couple times without explanation One time less than a couple hours before the mobile service team was scheduled to arrive When I called the representative explained that they did not have mobile service in NY for what needed to be done That was a waste of 2 days I got in touch with the Mt Kisco Service center and I was able to bring my car in that afternoon Not sure why anyone would use the app it is terrible But it gets better my 12V battery was replaced only to have it die 2 weeks later I had to have the car towed to Mt Kisco and they gave me an estimated time to repair 5 days out and then the afternoon I was to pick up my car moved that another 3 days with no explanation No one answers in the Tesla app and I have been on hold for more than 3 hours over the course of the last 5 days I do have to say the people that answer the phone are great but unfortunately have no way to help customers

Title: Worst customer service
Content: We have leased two Teslas over the past 5 years The customer service on this current one has been horrific We picked up the car on March 30 and never received the plates We sent multiple emails over the last 3 months to people who we were in touch with prior to our purchase so they were valid emails to a variety of people and never received a response Finally we were able to get in touch with someone who said apparently an email was sent but for some reason it did not go through We were then told that the plates were delivered on 4 16 and it was no longer their responsibility and we would have to contact the DMV to report stolen lost plates We never received the plates they have no proof it was delivered and they are unwilling to help us get this resolved The lease cannot be over fast enough This will be our last Tesla

Title: Do not lease cars from Tesla
Content: I leased a Tesla Model 3 Long Range AWD for three years from 2021 to 2024 The process to return the vehicle at the end of the lease is stress inducing and extremely disorganised as well as specifically structured to rinse you of every penny they can I returned my vehicle to Leeds Tesla Showroom where I was made to wait over 30 minutes despite having a booked appointment for weeks The salesperson Awais was condescending and rude Prior to the appointment you are required to use the app to take countless photos of your vehicle for prior inspection which took hours The outcome was there was no damage to the car and no additional charges to pay Then at the time of dropping off the car Awais spent ages walking round every panel of the vehicle pointing out minor blemishes that were obviously just standard wear and tear for 3 years of use Awais could not tell me how much I would be charged because the info has to be sent to head office but forced me to sign paperwork to say I would accept the charges despite not knowing what they were and how this would impact me at a time of increased cost of living Later an email informed me they were a staggering 800 despite being so minor that the photos didn't bring them to light The treatment of customers by Tesla has dropped off dramatically and I would strongly recommend any driver to seek out a car from a more caring and less ruthless manufacturer at all costs

Title: Avoid them
Content: The car is ok but the customer service is disaster I can t get my deposit back for over a month now and every day I hear it should be with you now So if you get a problem with your car purchase or delivery time just forget that someone will help you with it

Title: Tesla Does Not Value Its Customers
Content: Love both of my Teslas but despise their pretentious inept dis service team who quite obviously follow marching orders from misdirected managers attempting to monetize off of slow haphazard response time to legitimate concerns Sorry to report they re inefficient lackluster attention to customer satisfaction will end up being Tesla s loss in the end Suggest you stay clear I know we will down the proverbial road

Title: Great if you want to fund far right
Content: Great if you want to fund far right white supremacy

Title: Bait and switch car manufacturer
Content: I got my brand new model 3 in 2020 and it was great Then the problems start You can't book a service job quickly delays are terrible Then you don't get your car back for weeks My 4 year old warranty just expired and there were quite a few issues driver seat and aircon Booked it in drive away take it to the car wash put it in car wash mode go through the car wash and a torrent of water comes out under the glovebox on the passenger side I never had this before so it has to be the fact that they did something with the aircon ventilators They now tell me I have to go back through another service booking which will take several more weeks I previously owned a Volkswagen and I could get an engineer to look at my car the next day I'll be going back to them after this car

Title: Terrible experience
