Content: Terrible experience I bought a new top of the range Model S Plaid that was delivered with several obvious faults which should have been corrected pre delivery Scratch on phone holder trim coming off boot lid poorly fitted The delivery rep said No problem just use the app to request service and it'll all be fixed Well it's now several months later and I am still without a car It was finally collected to be repaired almost 2 months ago and has been sitting in the same spot in the Tesla Chelmsford car park since then not moved once I can see the location on the app They haven't fixed the major issues and I have been completely ignored on the app message system for 7 weeks I have called many times it's impossible to speak to anyone except call center staff who always promise to sort it out then never do Absolute shambles I was a huge Tesla fan before this this is my 4th Tesla and I own TSLA stock yet this experience has soured me to the brand and I will soon sell I support the mission have spent hundreds of thousands on Tesla cars invested my hard earned cash in the stock yet I am treated with absolute contempt by the useless UK team Extremely disappointing

Title: Untrustworthy and Immoral Company
Content: Untrustworthy and Immoral Company The product is not very good at all in fact its awfull MR MUSK I Hope the share price does nt drop yet again

Title: Whenever I have an issue or problem
Content: Whenever I have an issue or problem with my Tesla I go to Tesla at the Christiana Mall for help They are so very helpful and pleasant and solve our problems Today Erica helped us and she was the best I would be loss if they were not there Debbie DiTomasso

Title: If I could give this company 0 stars I
Content: If I could give this company 0 stars I would The customer service is appalling don t want to help and completely fob you off If you re thinking of buying or leasing a Tesla please think twice They really are the worst company to deal with

Title: Was trying to buy a tesla
Content: Was trying to buy a tesla Was on hold for over 1 hour Tried several more times with no success Bought on line with my questions unanswered figured I won't pay if they won't help me when I go pick it up Getting there to get the car people are friendly agree phone support sucks but no way to fix it But even at the place I waited hours they are very understaffed This is greed to be understaffed in my opinion

Title: I went to tesla burbank ca dealer to
Content: I went to tesla burbank ca dealer to buy Y model testa I apply to purchase one they told Y model was running a promotion for low rate A P R 0 99 interest I got good credit I paid 250 to order the car I waited couple days my app said complete approved but My order was not approved to pick up my car I had a delivering waiting for me never happen I stopped to dealership again to see what happen they said my application was not being approved I asked why they didn't have a answer I told them my credit is over 786 score they told me they will summit my application to other banks soonest I walked out 1 hrs later chase calls me said tesla has just send my application so my application was never beind sent no where than Monday Capitol Bank approved me for high rate 8 25 I got very upset cause I wasted my time plus they told to get co signer I told them I don't need co signer I had got cars on the past with 0 down payment I told them to cancel my order and they said I will loose 250 for what I paid this send time loosing total 500 now they said not refundable bad service no o e to talk about the problem the phone numbers no one answer Mail box full only answering service very bad tesla will get sue for fake advertising

Title: Tesla lost its respect to the customers
Content: Experiencing the bitter bite of Tesla's discount department it's clear that unexpected charges heartache are becoming the norm for us the consumers On May 17 2024 I decided to return my leased vehicle excited to purchase a new one Little did I know a hefty bill of 4500 was lurking around the corner landing in my inbox just four days later No prior warning no explanation just a cold robotic response It's as if the human element the very essence of customer service has been completely replaced by algorithms Transparency once a cornerstone of Tesla's brand now seems to be lost amidst the shuffle of layoffs and restructuring Where is the service that was once promised Where is the respect for the customer that was once a priority It's disheartening to see a brand I once admired now seemingly indifferent to its customers' experiences It's high time Tesla revisits its commitment to transparency and customer service rather than leaving its customers in the dark grappling with unexpected charges Let's stand against these UnfairCharges Let's voice our TeslaTroubles Let's demand better CustomerServiceMatters

Title: ServiceCenters repair work near Montreal are terrible
Content: Owner of a Tesla Model Y AWD since 2022 also share owner since 2019 Tesla is an amazing tech company Their electric car are easy to use comfortable imho beautiful and they have ton of modern tech I expected on my past Audi A4 Quattro 2018 full option While this is amazing ServiceCenters near Montreal are terrible Which is surprising has talking to them is easy Delivery was awful good experience at first but car was full of packaging waste with lot of misaligned parts we had to ask to fix While removing a packaging part they have degraded a part they had to order to change Then wireless phone charging was not working and we had to ask them 5 times to fix it They even asked for a proof while they usually don't but as we had lot of services requests because of all issues we had When they replaced the wireless phone charger they also broke a part and told nothing so we had again to ask for service Really you don't want to have to deal with Tesla ServiceCenter near Montreal or in Montreal They will always smile but work really badly Beside that the experience with Tesla where you don't require service is quite great Don't buy their winter tire they are not that good noisy but at least you can have rims for cheaper as a package and their rim are not much heavy which helps with range

Title: Don t Buy
Content: Don t Buy Avoid at all costs Awful build park assist went faulty 3 times for me costing me over 1k to repair The car then stopped working all together Only 4 years old and I ve spent over 5k in repairs It s basically scrap now They won t take it in for repair or tell me what s wrong with it 30k piece of junk Horrible company

Title: I am very disappointed with Tesla 'Customer Service'
Content: I am very disappointed with Tesla Customer Service I have had a few problems with my car and have had to ask them for help via text as there is no way of speaking to someone All they do when they do answer your message is refer you to the instructions Do they not think that you have already tried the instructions and are having difficulty The instructions are not always clear Sometimes a quick 5 minute phonecall with someone knowledgeable is all that is needed to solve problems It seems that once you have bought a very expensive car from them Customer Service is not important anymore so there are no phonecalls When I was buying the car many phonecalls were made to me to get the sale I wonder if the 'Customer Service' agents actually have much knowledge of the cars which would explain them just referring you to the instructions If that is the case then Tesla should train the agents on the workings of the cars so Customers can actually be helped

Title: If you take a Tesla for a test drive I
Content: If you take a Tesla for a test drive I suggest you read the small print There is a 2 500 excess on their insurance An accident could cost you dear

Title: I got me a tesla
Content: i got me a tesla and i love it

Title: Worst experience ever
Content: Worst experience ever They don t care about you they don t follow their CONTRACT and they don t care about making the customer happy in fact they are rude Would not recommend a TESLA

Title: Why is s it so hard to speak to someone
Content: I've had a Tesla for around a year and it recently started making clicking noise whilst accelerating as well as making a noise inside like the wind is blowing This is whilst stationary or moving It sounds like it is coming from the vent You can still hear it when the fans aircon is switched off I also needed to get some new tires due to uneven wear at the back Although the outside of the tires looked good The inside was down to the material Lucky I checked The above didn't bother me too much because the car is under warranty Not the tyres obviously I used the app to find a service centre and to my horror the nearest one was over an hour away I live in Oxford not a remote island in Scotland Who wants to drive for an hour to a garage There used to be one in Reading I got my tires elsewhere and decided to live with the windy interior and clicking noise Then over the weekend one of the updates failed I had no choice but get in touch with Tesla I raised a ticket and got a message saying they had reset something Now it gets stuck at 50 downloading the update I messaged back informing them of this I was told this would be sent to the technicians to troubleshoot Since then I've heard nothing It's been all day I've asked for updates but heard nothing In the meantime many of the features including FSD are not working and something is draining the battery My guess is it is continually trying to download the update I'd heard customer service was supposed to be good Why of why is it so hard to speak to someone any more Yes I know the answer Come on Tesla prove me wrong

Title: The Worst Customer Service Ever
Content: I am getting more and more fed up with the customer support Roadside guy who changed my tire told me he was going to patch my tire so I went inside only to find out he charged me for a full tire replacement and said he never said that I referred a friend to get a Tesla before the deadline Her sales rep said I would get the referral points which my friend saved the emails and text messages I never did and when I went to the dealership they said I never qualified and I have to call customer support or that specific rep That specific rep now ghosts us and avoids us at all cost and I ve given up on the customer support line as I wait over forty minutes and every rep I ve gotten a hold of tells me I have to call back and speak to someone different Today my AC was blowing hot air and my thermometer started going up to 143 degrees it s Vegas but it s not that hot in Vegas so I knew something was wrong Fortunately it fixed itself but when I called customer support again I was on for forty minutes and the lady said it s the wrong department and that I should go in lice which is a far drive and it didn t help before or just call back I m pretty close to selling my car and getting something else and never using Tesla again if this terrible customer service keeps happening

Title: Wasted my time
Content: App not clear waited for the last moment to review documents wasted my time had to wait for a month for delivery then at the last day they wanted me to resubmit and start over due to an address issue

Title: Cancelled my model Y order without my
Content: Cancelled my model Y order without my consent Then want to take up to 14 days to refund the deposit Not impressed

Title: Very very poor customer service and
Content: Very very poor customer service and dishonest aswell I have requested price of Battery same battery I bought 2 months ago in 144 and they quoted again 144 but service centre guy charged me 170 takeup matter with them through app after wasting 3 days nothing happen

Title: I purchased the auto steer function
Content: I purchased the auto steer function about a week ago based on a friends recommendation I was not aware you had to use it in a certain way to comply with Telsa I was paused from using it for a week after a couple of days So I paid a little over 100 for something that I can not even use because I am not using it the way Tesla wants me to use it I called to get a refund and was denied one I would have never purchased this upgrade if I knew I had to use it a certain way Using auto steer while having my hands on the steering wheel and looking at traffic at all times completely defeats the purpose of why I purchased the upgrade I might as well drive the car myself I spoke very highly of Tesla before and recommended it to friends and family As a result of this experience I will do the opposite going forward When I called I was expecting to speak to people that would understand my situation that logically no one should pay for something they can not use If not then give me a refund Tesla should steal a page from successful companies like Amazon who practice TRUST with their consumers They accept returns all the time without hesistation because they understand the value behind customer loyalty based on amazing customer service I highly doubt Elon Musk would have approved of how my call was handdled today Rules exists but there is always exceptions Oh well the good thing is that other manufactures produce electric cars now Bye Telsa

Title: WORSE SERVICE EVER
Content: I picked up my new Tesla Y last week and customer service was so bad All I can say is thank goodness I knew how to operate the car To make things even worse today I was charged for my old tesla They didn't even contact finance to inform them that I no longer am leasing the car When I attempted to get someone on the phone I couldn't I decided to stop by the Tesla dealership and was told they would take care of this for me WRONG I get a message saying I need to contact TESLA FINANCE However you can't get anyone on the phone They give you all these prompts and then tell you at the end to send an email to TESLA FINANCE So you pay all this money for a TESLA and can't speak with anyone If I could return the car I would immediately do so I will never be leasing or buying another TESLA If you are expecting service go elsewhere To make matters worse after being told that my 500 credit toward damages was enough they just told me that it's 560 00 Anything for another penny

Title: Sitting here now in Tesla Dartford
Content: Sitting here now in Tesla Dartford After waiting 2 months to replace two wheels due to pothole damage No ownership from any staff here Cannot engage in conversation Ignored me when I first arrived and didn t know where to sit Had to pay 2000 for a hire car because of the two month wait for repairs I would give them minus 10 if I could It s not about the car it s about the service Which is non existent Everything has to be done through an app I prefer to talk to someone surely as the paying customer I should choose how I communicate with them Wow Such a stupid approach to business They claim to be premium however they don t get it It s always about the service not about the car Two month wait for wheels at 2600 00 First and last Tesla Do not buy one You will regret it

Title: I have bought a brand new car and with
Content: I have bought a brand new car and with in 8 months I have to take to the service centre for repairs In my both visit they don't have a parts such a big company and waiting the people to get parts delivered they really don't bother after they sold the car Very bad service

Title: Tesla insurance is the worst insurance
Content: Tesla insurance is the worst insurance i ever had no one answers calls at the company i left over 10 voicemails to my claims adjuster she never calls back i email her never emails back i call straight to the company wait 1 hour hold no one answers i strongly recommend people not to get tesla insurance they are the worst company in the world

Title: Brilliant service
Content: Just had excellent service from Tesla Guildford Highly recommended

Title: Tesla customer service is the worst
Content: Tesla customer service is the worst Through the entire purchase process to now a month later every time I've tried to get in touch with Tesla for various problems created by them most recently with the new vehicle registration there was no way for me to get through to a live person without 1 pretending I was buying a new car and then waiting to see if a live person was available in delivery or 2 physically going to a dealer to talk in person All despite their pride in being a technologically advanced company that prides themselves on the latest app centered experience

Title: Great car up until your first flat tire
Content: Great car up until your first flat tire Roadside service is a joke Car is not worth the inconveniences

Title: If I could give a zero star I would
Content: If I could give a zero star I would Horrible customer service they treat you like if you bought a car from a vending machine I would never get a Tesla again Don t have the time to deal with Tesla

Title: Worst car ever
Content: Worst car ever I m forced to drive this piece of crap It runs all the time in Texas and never has enough juice Things fall apart like the mirrors No room in this car for anything My family hates this car and never wants to ride in it You can t use Waze and forced to use their stuff Stay away Far away

Title: Selling our Tesla ASAP regret buying
Content: In summary I love the actual car Tesla Y I would say it is best car I have owned However there is a fundamental flaw in the entire Tesla business model and experience that in my opinion should stop anyone buying a Tesla I will certainly never buy one again and am going to sell my current one as a result The problem is that you are at the mercy of Tesla for your servicing parts and basically any issue you have If there happens to be an available person to fix your problem then great the service experience is quite good especially the mobile one However if there noone available this is where the gaping hole in their offering exists As an example the middle seat belt buckle in our car broke We regularly need to take three children in the back of the car After booking a mobile service for two weeks in advance it was cancelled by Tesla and then rebooked for 2 months later Obviously this was not an option as we can not have anyone especially kids in the back of the car with no seatbelt However there was no alternative I offered to drive a hundred miles to another service centre Not an option I offered to fit it myself Not an option No other garage could fix it so we were dependent on Tesla They would not agree to offering us a complimentary car in the meantime In the end after hours of calls with Tesla lovely customer service personnel it was agreed I could drive 45 minutes to a service centre first thing in the morning and they would fix it I had to take half a day off work last minute and change all plans Suffice to say we need to sell our car quickly before something else goes wrong as we cannot be left in this situation again Such a shame but until this situation changes Tesla is unfortunately not a car company I could recommend to anyone in the UK

Title: Non existent customer service
Content: Bought a new Tesla to find out I was charged 900 for delivery that I have to drive 2 hours to pick up the car and a call centre that takes an hour to get through to So far not a great experience

Title: Staff are rude and unhelpful Awful customers service Con artists
Content: Staff are rude cut throat and unhelpful If you want to pay a good amount for a car then be treated like a piece of dirt buy a car from Auckland Tesla I paid for the black paint within 10 days the car was covered in chips bonnet doors front of car The paint is awful very thin and does not withhold any impact Tesla don t care they take your money say its not covered under warranty then dismiss you I raised a complaint and was told it was being investigated After not hearing anything back for 3 months I called back and dealt with the obnoxious assistant manager in Auckland He repeated what was on the notes from 3 months ago and no further investigation had been done I contacted an independent paint specialist and they said the paint on Tesla s is extremely thin and poor with many customers having the same issues since production was moved to China They advised me that many people are paying over 8k to have their car fully wrapped from new which completely defeats the purpose of paying extra money to have the car in a different colour In addition I had a rattle in the inside of the car from new I m now approaching my 3rd time having to drive from Tauranga to Hamilton to get it fixed but this time I need to wait over 40 days to get it fixed Do not buy Tesla unless you live close to a service centre it s extremely inconvenient when things go wrong You are expected to drive to Auckland or Hamilton to get anything done I was also mis sold the car under the premise of getting the clean car rebate on the website when you buy the car it told you under the finance section that the 7k incentive was discounted from the car However I never got this as I purchased in November and received the car in March Post purchasing the car they knocked the prices down by 7k in March When I discussed this with the manager the basically told me that it never displayed this on the website I have screenshots that I signed the purchase agreement and basically tough luck we reduced the price and you missed out The car is a dream to drive and lovely inside had I not been treated like dirt and had received some kind of human customer service experience post buying the car I would have probably been happy But based on the Auckland Tesla experience I will never buy a Tesla product again Now time to sell my shares I think

Title: model S rides are the best
Content: A friend of mine bought a model S ride it was awesome indeed

Title: Great car appalling service
Content: Tesla make great cars I love mine I am into EV and was really on their side so should be easy to please right but the experience has gone severely downhill since I needed to use Northampton Tesla for basic warranty issues They lied about fixing the issues something they regularly do according to Google reviews damaged my car further then after making all the apologies and promising to put it all right the gibberish talking service manager now said they arent going to do any of it and without reason even though it was agreed and booked in to be done Shame on you Northampton Tesla your service side needs some competent staff and the service manager is offensively poor at her job She doesn't understand that when all the same model car have the same visible easy to prove issue it is a blatant design fault and that if they damage something they should put it right they admitted it and promised they would too New damage every time they have it and the old issues left This time some hazing on the paint the service manager said they didn't touch it well how did they clean the car without touching it must be some kind of magic maybe the same magic they use to check steering components they drove it a bit and apparently that's enough to know what an appalling way to conduct business this is people's safety we are talking about too now I have tried to raise this with Tesla UK they don't even reply not even to subject access requests so they shall be reported to the data protection commissioner for that I'm not putting up with it any more I gave them the benefit of the doubt before now I've had enough of being messed around If they don't put this right which it looks like they aren't going to do I will persue it further and won't buy Tesla again and shall make sure I let as many people know of my experience as possible to save them the same fate You can't trust their work or their word they just take your money and the rest is smoke and mirrors Seriously be warned BYD shall evertake Tesla within the next few years by the look of it maybe that's where I shall go next with the rest of their cheesd off customers

Title: I have gone from Tesla's biggest fan to neutral to negative
Content: I have owned a Tesla for several years Over time I have gone from Tesla's biggest fan to neutral to now negative The battery mileage has fallen dramatically over the course of the last 1 2 years and the car has become increasingly glitchy over time Most troubling was a glitch that resulted in the car being unable to charge while I was on a trip and was far from my home The final straw for me however is my inability to get anyone on the phone from Tesla sales Given my very positive experience with Tesla in the first year of ownership I thought perhaps the issues I was experiencing were related to the age of the car and a smaller battery I decided I would give Tesla another try and responding to one of the promotions they sent me I attempted to buy another Tesla upgrading to a higher battery capacity I was unable to purchase the car online due to a fault in the Tesla web site despite being a current owner the system had me in the wrong state and associated my account with another order I never made preventing from placing an order I also needed to speak to someone briefly for a simple clarifying question I simply could not connect with a human being in any form phone in person dealership or even website messaging I have become extraordinarily frustrated making multiple attempts to call Tesla going through a series of extended prompts before the line hung up after a message that the Tesla phone system was down If you cannot get someone on the phone to buy a new car imagine how hard it will be in the future to find help when something goes wrong I also cannot find any form to share my feedback directly with Tesla further damaging goodwill I have gone from an advocate influencing many Tesla purchases to now the opposite I advise all of my friends and contacts be very careful before considering buying a Tesla

Title: Negative en base a los comenterios
Birmingham UK Was slow to respond but
Content: Birmingham UK Was slow to respond but good in end

Title: Tesla s Shocking Lack of Customer Service A Total Disappointment
Content: As a Tesla owner I expected the company s service to match the prestige of its brand Unfortunately my experience with Tesla's customer service has been nothing short of appalling The level of indifference and disregard for customer concerns is astonishing for a company of this stature From the very beginning Tesla s service team has failed to address my concerns with any seriousness Despite my repeated efforts to escalate my issue regarding the poor service quality I have been met with nothing but dismissive and unhelpful responses Most notably the attitude of Tesla s Customer Business Resolutions Partner was shockingly bad They displayed no willingness to listen to or understand the problem I raised Instead of acknowledging my concerns they seemed more interested in deflecting the issue entirely making the interaction frustrating and stressful I have tried to make it clear that my concerns revolve around the substandard level of service provided by Tesla but instead of addressing the root of the problem they diverted the conversation toward irrelevant matters such as my finance provider Black Horse Finance which has absolutely no bearing on my complaint It s alarming that a company that prides itself on innovation and excellence allows such a poor level of customer interaction Tesla s inability to listen coupled with the rude and dismissive attitude of their staff shows a complete lack of respect for their customers The entire experience has been frustrating and disappointing with no meaningful resolution in sight Tesla needs to drastically rethink how they handle customer service and ensure their staff are trained to listen and respond to genuine concerns as this is completely unacceptable If this is the standard of service Tesla is offering I will seriously reconsider my future with the brand I strongly urge the ownership and leadership of Tesla in the USA particularly Elon Musk to take a closer look at the feedback coming from UK customers The current state of customer service in the UK does not align with Tesla s global reputation and it desperately needs intervention from the top Until Tesla takes responsibility and drastically improves their service standards I cannot in good faith recommend the brand to others I will also be reconsidering my future with Tesla if these issues persist

Title: Elon lowered the price
Content: Elon lowered the price My model 3 is 10K upside down Musk is spouting racist right wing BS I have to get out of Tesla What an a hole F u Elon

Title: Stay away
Content: Would never recommend a Tesla to anyone and will never consider it in future please stay away I had an accident and damaged a door panel which has to be replaced because Tesla body parts can't be pulled even if it is a simple dent I have been waiting for the door panel to arrive to my Garage for more than 4 months now with no luck or even a date I have heard endless horror stories of cars breaking down and spare parts never arrive my garage has some Tesla cars waiting for some parts more than 9 months Tesla have this issue for years now so apparently they are not bothered to address it as long as they are selling their cars you will get ZERO after sale service

Title: Not the tech forward purchase experience I was expecting
Content: I am disappointed to have to write a negative review before I even take delivery of a Tesla Whilst it's clear to me that Tesla have by and large an excellent product it is equally clear that important aspects of their customer service fall very short of what might be acceptable let alone excellent For a tech forward company that has had a considerable number of years to hone its customer facing processes I was shocked to find that significant aspects of the pre purchase and delivery processes are not well integrated leading to an underwhelming customer experience and falling well short of my average expectations My complaints fall into the following categories Finance deals available via the Tesla app website are not actually available from their finance partner Santander I was for example unable to apply for a 12 month initial rental personal contract hire deal with Santander even though Tesla was happy to take an order on that basis in their app Finance approval took an inordinate amount of time by modern standards with Santander taking 4 days to approve my application and an indeterminate amount of time thereafter to file paperwork with Tesla Tesla will fix but then unilaterally move delivery dates They understandably need finance to have been approved before delivery but once approved they then introduced a new hurdle advising that they needed to await the receipt of paperwork from Santander before they could release the car introducing additional collection delays In total so far they have moved my delivery collection date 3 times the last two of which were without prior consultation This has caused me genuine inconvenience and expense Let s hope things get better henceforth

Title: I enjoy the car but since they lowered
Content: I enjoy the car but since they lowered the prices this car is worth nothing now Elon do better

Title: Don't Buy Tesla Solar Panels Until They Resolve This Known Issue
Content: I bought Tesla solar for my house after a great experience buying a Tesla vehicle and because I was shopping for solar panels anyway The purchase was made in late 2023 and the install happened around March Finally in April everything went live I noticed immediately that the wiring seemed off and certain appliances started to trip on the breaker panel Our fridge would suddenly be turned off and we'd notice it was due to the breaker Tesla installed We replaced the breaker at our own expense Next we noticed the Tesla app stating the house was using 0 kw for the entire house anytime the air conditioning came on This obviously makes no sense and it couldn't be true This resulted in our system reporting more electricity being sold back to the grid than we were actually selling back I contacted Tesla about this and they claimed that my system was running fine on their end and they showed no errors in my configuration I kept telling them they needed to send someone out but they initially refused unless I paid 300 service call fee At some point about week later Tesla then emailed me saying my system shows signs of errors and they need to send someone out Someone first came out in early June They claimed the system was running fine but that I needed a new unit that housed the fan but that the fan couldn't be replaced alone they'd have to replace the entire unit I forgot the name he called it During that visit I showed the Tesla technician the app and what it reported when the AC came on He claimed it was an app issue and if I logged out and deleted the app and reinstalled it it would be fixed I did this and it didn't work He scheduled another technician to come out in late June to replace the unit When this technician came he claimed there was an issue with the Tesla system and that he addressed it He told me that he would call me the next day to check that it was fixed and he did not The issues remained By now I'm getting bills from my electricity company TEP with major discrepancies compared to what the Tesla app shows that I'm selling back to the grid and using etc I then received a very high electricity bill for 274 the same amounts I would receive in the summer here in Arizona if I had no solar panels At this I was infuriated because I'm paying a similar amount for the solar panels and my expectation was that it would drastically reduce my bills this being the 3rd month being live I then went back on the Tesla app and chatted with service for help I told them the entire story I asked Tesla to reimburse me for the months that I've been paying for solar panels without them working properly I explained the new issues to Tesla 1 The fridge in my house is still randomly tripping off on the panel this started happening after the solar installation 2 The app still shows that the home is using 0 kW at times when that is clearly not the case It usually does this when the Air Conditioner comes on 3 At night the system is falsely showing that it receives energy from the sun It is charging my Tesla vehicle and it should only be charging on solar above 45 It charges at night somehow because the system falsely says it is receiving solar energy in the middle of the night 4 At times it shows the home is using 7 7 kW while no major appliances are on i e the AC which usually is responsible for driving up the power usage Then when the AC comes on the kW being used actually drops significantly to 1 2 kW Tesla told me that I need a Whole Home Cycle or reboot for the system The process was emailed to me and I was told to wait 24 hours to see if the problems persisted The problems persisted I then asked Tesla again to send someone out and rewire the system and investigate this properly I asked also for a refund of months paid because in essence they've sold me a defective product Tesla refused saying they don't reimburse in such instances I told them they need to either fix the problem or take the panels off and cancel the purchse and provide a refund They now have said they're sending more technicians over on 7 24 24 to invetigate the issue Meanwhile the system is still faulty I have no idea of how much energy I'm actually using and what's being sold back to the grid The system says I'm generating solar in the middle of the night without the sun This is what I would expect from a very amateur and scammish company not Tesla Highly disappointed in the service and the product's functionality I hope Tesla responds here and gets this addressed Otherwise I hope this thread warns and stops people from buying Tesla solar until they fix this very known issue

Title: Had to give 1 star
Content: Had to give 1 star wanted to give 0 had my Tesla model 3 approx 8 months and had nothing but issues with it WiFi issues premium connection paid for non existent paint flaking everywere door seals coming of not replaceable under extended warranty water ingress passenger not under warranty car thinks it at different location normal apparently constant restricted functions due to cameras fobbed of saying conditions even tho cameras cleaned daily and no othe obstruction to block Autopilot tried killing me several times randomly braking don t even get me started about the range that has NEVER been even close to what was advertised panels glass misalignments within spec I can go on and on and all that I get is excuses from Tesla Bristol Iv been buying and driving for 30years and I can honestly say with hand in heart TESLA AND TESLA SERVICE IS THE WORST CAR AND SERVICE I HAVE EVER RECEIVED I am in process of taking Tesla to the claims court I am also a member of many forums and online chats and there are so many complaints I read several daily regarding faults and excuses My advise to ANYONE considering a Tesla DONT if you are adamant you want electric you should really consider a polestar or other manufacturers

Title: I entered the Tesla motors in Gatwick
Content: I entered the Tesla motors in Gatwick in hindsight I should have listened to the customer who stormed out the 29th of March 24 apparently disappointed by their servicing department But I was eager to buy a new car to benefit the First Year Allowance Made the deposit I paid in full but a rear dented car with deep scratched to the offside door was brought to my door I declined the delivery and was offered other car to make a sale I felt it was a bit pushy and declined all their offer and asked for a refund We are now 12 06 2024 already contacted them numerous time Not easy to access as the option in their phone line already triaging and excluding you your purchase is linked to your mobile number and Ai read it very well you call may be recorded ' randomly ' not for you to have evidence against them I have sent many email but they do not reply They owe me nearly 53 000 contacted Trading standards and have been advised to seek a solicitor to demand my money Please See email below to them I made a purchase of a new car from Tesla Motors end of March I paid it through three different accounts into their one business account Tesla Motors for a sum of 53 720 200 initial deposit and they were to assist to take advantage of the first year allowance for the financial year 2022 2023 Initially i applied a loan through their financing company and this was not approved because the car I chose they later realised it was registered more than 6 months Tesla sale person made a mistake thinking the car was eligible but following non approval by the bank as car 6 months old ex display They sourced another new car On delivery the car was not New it had deep scratches to the door and dented at the back I was offered a courtesy car that Saturday to go home thank you On Sunday I went back to Gatwick Tesla Motors I asked the saleman Mr Hamza what option I had By then I realised that the car had to be returned for fixing if I were to take it that Sunday I opted to have a refund and cancel my order I was informed that because of the Easter period they will process the refund as soon as but might take few days I requested that this get sent to my personal business account or for their convenience any of the three accounts from which I paid to them from They asked for my IBAN details letter head from the bank and submitted to them Now they are asking proof of payment that I send statement to them I am concerned that they are making it difficult and not sure of their agenda I also requested for a copy of their refund policy and they have not replied to me They are holding a large sum of my money and they are not responding both the sales team and the delivery teamMy reference given 200 deposit by bank card payment RN121324263Natwest personal account paid two amounts 1 2390 2 17620 xxxxxxxx company account 3720 second company account Llyods account 4 50005 24800 All paid to their account Tesla MotorsSort Code xx xx xxACCOUNT xxxxxxxI would kindly appreciate if you could please advise As I am being severely penalised for not having the money and a car I feel misled by the company one for selling accidented car as New and retaining my money illegally Thanks I still have not heard from them

Title: RN122059154 awful experience
Content: Tesla USA Florida John young store Don't buy Tesla to whom it may concern This started when I had a car accident and I lost total destruction of my car and a friend of mine told me tryout the Tesla that it's a good car I rent it for 10 days and I liked it so I bought the home charger and installed it first before buying the car because I knew I was going to buy the Tesla I received an email on June 20 from a Tesla advisor Rachel Pilon offering a promotion that was extended until June 30 2024 where they offer the new model 3 Long Range AWD car enjoy the 7500 federal credit incentive and the option of 2 99 APR for 48 60 months attached copy of the original email without just thinking about making the purchase online On June 21 I made the reservation and paid 250 Fill out all the forms and I was approved quickly On the financial side I see that the APR was 6 14 and not the 2 99 they had offered Below I send a message informing of this situation and asking you to Honor the offer and with the long wait for an unsatisfactory answer answer on June 27 they let me know that the promotion of the 2 99APR was for the model 3 Rear wheel drive standard range which can not honor the offer Then disagreeing with the situation talking to my wife that I thought and we could do we decided to go ahead with the purchase of the offer car so we could have 2 99 APR Then changing options we decided to buy the Model 3 Long Range AWD by sacrificing 2 99 APR and accepting the interest of 6 14 APR Being 3 times at the Tesla dealership and being attended by the best Thais sales advisor excellent person she shows me the new model 3 performance I really liked the Performance and being in discrepancies with my wife we decided to continue with the purchase of the Model 3 Long Range AWD losing the insentive of the 2 99 APR that they never honored Being on deadline for the promotion to end June 30 the day before I went back to the dealer to talk to Thais because I wanted to pay for it with my own financing of a lower interest of 5 2 APR with another bank previously I talked to my wife letting her know that I wanted to change the car for the Performance and between and rounds I managed to convince her of the change Day June 29 talking to Thais sales advisor letting her know the changes she tells me that if you can make the change of the car to the new Performance and using my own financing but that you can not go over the limit of 55 000 Because you would not be given the federal credit of 7500 And that the car had to be ordered in gray its exterior and the interior white and that it had to wait between July and August for the delivery of the car accepting these conditions we proceed to the new order Thais asks my permission to speak with her manager Maria who I never saw or didn't show up Thais lets me know that he has a new proposal or offer that in order not to change to another bank for financing and stay with Tesla's financing at 6 14 APR that there was a Performance car available because another owner canceled the order on the condition that the vehicle was white exterior with white interior I had to do it on that same day because we are at the end of the month promotion but since it was white it went over the budget of 1000 and that manager Maria could take the extra 1000 off she confirmed it 2 times for the white color and that is the only way they could give me the federal credit of 7 500 Accept the offer by resigning my own 5 2 APR finance And going to see the new white Model 3 Performance car getting on it and feeling the beautiful feeling of my new car and leaving aside everything Tesla failed against me from the beginning I asked Thais to w clean my car for the delivery of the last day June 30 my son's birthday which my wife was upset with me bc not being with my son and going to get the vehicle When I left at 6 30pm on the afternoon of June 29 from the dealer and I called my brother to help me taking me to pick up the car next day and letting him know that I had bought a beautiful car that I loved and 5 minutes later after I left the dealer I get a call from the Tesla Dealership and Thais lets me know that manager Maria told her that unfortunately they had not approved the 1000 discount for the white color and for that reason they can not give me the 7 500 federal credit At that time all the love to the company Tesla is gone from love to hate there is only one step was shocked speechless and Thais tells me that we can still continue with the original order of the gray and white exterior Performance My answer was very quick and sincere I don't want to know about Tesla again Tesla at John young Orlando Florida be careful Thank you Thais for your attention Hopefully Tesla can improve and not fool people Gustavo Canete

Title: Tesla's Disregard for Customer Feedback Service Issues and Lack of Follow Up
Content: Tesla's operations in New Zealand have faced significant criticism from customers highlighting various issues related to service support pricing and overall customer experience Service and Support One of the most common complaints concerns Tesla's service and support infrastructure Many customers have reported a lack of responsiveness and support from Tesla's staff This includes challenges with getting timely repairs and maintenance as well as difficulties in receiving satisfactory customer service Reports suggest that the service team often fails to address issues effectively or offer solutions in a timely manner Additionally customers have noted that Tesla employees frequently exhibit a lack of professionalism and are not particularly helpful or customer friendly This extends to a lack of accountability with employees often unwilling to escalate issues to higher management or provide appropriate resolutions Pricing Issues Pricing is another significant point of contention Early adopters of Tesla vehicles in New Zealand have faced high costs compared to those who purchase newer models The initial prices paid by early customers were considerably higher and they often had to purchase additional items or features that are now included as standard in newer more affordable models This disparity has left many early buyers feeling that they were unfairly charged and that Tesla did not offer adequate value for the premium they paid Customer Experience and Complaints Handling The overall customer experience is marred by a lack of effective complaint management Tesla's handling of complaints in New Zealand has been described as inadequate with customers frequently reporting that their complaints are not properly registered or acknowledged The process for lodging a complaint is often frustrating as customers have found that their issues are not given proper attention and are not assigned reference numbers This lack of structured complaint management contributes to a feeling of neglect and frustration among customers Access to Management Another major issue is the difficulty in reaching higher management or more senior personnel within the company Customers have reported being unable to speak to managers or those in higher positions when seeking resolution for their issues This lack of access to decision makers compounds the problem as it prevents customers from addressing their concerns with individuals who have the authority to make meaningful changes or offer effective resolutions Even the parent company in the U S and Australia seems disinterested in addressing customer concerns They send out surveys after service appointments but rarely follow up on the feedback

Title: Tesla Nightmare
Content: Where do I start I leased a Model 3 performance The car was delivered to my home I stayed in the 3 year lease and returned it as soon as the window to return was available Some items for future buyers to be aware of as I won t be back because of it I leased from a dealer in Las Vegas and had to move to the east coast for work The process of transferring a leased title is a complete nightmare Customer service only responds via email and it took 8 months to complete transferring registration to another state Beware most states require registration within 30 90 days I broke that and the only way around it for me was to have the dmv place my car under an exception status This costs about 400 Customer service is hands down the worst I ve had to deal with You can t get a hold of a physical person You can call all the numbers you want and follow the prompts but everyone ends up at the same point Email Tesla and wait for a response Super annoying when you have time pressing issues Service side was equally as bad I had to use it twice and both times was a complete nightmare First I blew a tire was stranded in the side of the road You call Tesla road side assistance I was on hold for 2 hours Finally got a tow truck beware Tesla requires the car to be fixed at a Tesla service center The closet one was 5 hours away They didn t have the tire had to wait 3 days to get one Had to find a place to stay for my wife and 2 year old son Trip was ruined Tesla could care less They offered us water when we arrived which was nice 2nd time service appointment was because of self driving issues It didn t matter what I was passing on the road it would randomly brake hard 75 mph down to 10 mph Tesla said they grabbed some log files and noticed a glitch in their software They disabled full self driving until they could get a patch in place This took 6 months or so It didn t fix the issue completely Didn t use self driving much after that Cold weather is hard on Tesla My fully electric Volvo does just fine in the same temperature Battery will drain fast 80 to 10 in 24 hours Plugged in it drained 80 to 30 in 24 hours Tesla said the car is required to be in a heated garage in the winter Turn in day finally Everything is done from the app Take a bunch of pictures and submit them to Tesla It took about 3 days for them to get back to me If you tinted your windows 375 per window to remove I got this down to 350 for all 4 I tried to get someone to do it cheaper and Tesla fought me on it Said any repairs or modifications to the car has to be done through a Tesla service center If you scratch you wheels it s common Tesla charges 125 for every inch of scratch Their website says 3 inches Tesla fought me tooth and nail on this one Ended up just paying it I lived about 12 hours from the nearest Tesla dealer FYI there are no Tesla dealers in Montana Wyoming North South Dakota If you live in those areas you will have to drive to Denver Salt Lake to return it Total pain and I had to fly home to get home after it all Tesla said they will be opening up dealers in this states starting in 2030 FYI I got charged a window washing fee due to bugs on window after driving 12 hours to Denver They ended up removing the 250 after I went outside and cleaned it myself All in all the first quote to turn in was priced at 14 3k Took a while to get Tesla to understand the charges were BS Final bill costs me just shy of 4k to return my Tesla It had 15k miles It was practically brand new I have pics of it all and the charges emails if anyone wants to see I won t go back Sorry Elon Stick to shooting stuff into space Best of luck everyone

Title: After purchasing two vehicles from
Content: After purchasing two vehicles from Tesla in recent years I feel compelled to caution others against making the same choice While Tesla's cars may have impressive features the lack of adequate customer support and devaluing customers current vehicles to make sales are glaring flaws that should not be ignored Our attempts to reach out for assistance through the app have been met with silence leaving us frustrated and without solutions to our problems The phone support system only adds to the frustration leading us in circles and often ending with unhelpful responses from representatives who lack the necessary knowledge to address our concerns Most concerning is the significant devaluation of our car which has plummeted by 49 000 from its original purchase price This drastic drop in value raises serious questions about Tesla's pricing strategies and the long term viability of their vehicles in the market Furthermore despite having several Tesla chargers in our medical office for other vehicles to use we have decided to permanently remove them Our concerns about Tesla as a company and our reluctance to promote anything related to their vehicles have led us to this decision For those considering an electric vehicle I strongly advise exploring other options before committing to Tesla The subpar customer support concerning devaluation of assets and broader company concerns are red flags that cannot be overlooked A company's commitment to customer satisfaction ethical practices and the resale value of their products should be key considerations when making such a significant investment

Title: Tesla service and reliability
Content: Brand new 2024 Model Y with 1 173 miles had 7 alerts come up at once Needed to find a safe parking space Could not get vehicle to go into P It was shifting between P and N on its own I could not leave vehicle because I needed to keep my foot on the brake or it would roll Waited an hour for Tesla roadside When they arrived back wheels were locked and front were not Due to electronic failure the vehicle would not engage tow mode Roadside confirmed that tow company would have special equipment to properly tow as Tesla states you cannot drag the car Tow company and local dealership service manager both said the only way was to drag onto the flatbed Tow company had to shake the car off at the dealership Google it Kind of a violent way to remove from flatbed Service manager roadside supervisor both acknowledged this was done as I shared the videos I am concerned about the longevity of my vehicle with the breakdown and tow Service had it for a week No explanation on what happened even though the service manager promised to share My only contact was a message in the app saying it was ready for remote pickup Service tells me to call roadside but roadside tells me to call service Obvious stonewall tactic as they do not take responsibility for anything This was at Tesla Pittsburgh Presto in Bridgeville PA I understand that a Model Y is a good vehicle However you are taking a risk if you use this location Worst customer service experience that I have encountered I will be happy to share videos as a warning

Title: They do answer the phone
Content: They do answer the phone but are never helpful advice changes depending on who you talk to and you can t contact a dealership directly Very few businesses have good customer service these days and Tesla is no exception It s really annoying because the cars depend on digital technology without customer services you are really stuffed if you have a problem

Title: We had a horrible customer service
Content: We had a horrible customer service experience in picking up a new Model 3 in Chesterfield Mo on March 29th We are previous owners of a Model Y and were buying a new Model 3 Once we were notified that the new vehicle was at the dealership THEY scheduled an appointment for pick up We live about 2 hours from the dealer On the appointed day March 22 we drove and sold our Model Y at a different dealer in St Louis When we were completing the sale we received a text message telling us that the new car had some paint chips and would not be ready for pickup at the dealership Now we are stuck in St Louis with no transportation home 2 hours We asked about a loaner vehicle or reimbursement for rental car expense denied both So we rented a vehicle and our new pick up date was scheduled for a week later We arrived on Friday March 29th to pick up the new vehicle as scheduled by the dealership and were told the vehicle would not be ready for another 3 1 2 hours When asked to speak with the manager to again request reimbursement for the rental not to mention our time and inconvenience he made excuses and said that there was nothing he could do My husband is a huge Tesla fan and has sung the praises of Tesla since 2021 even getting his brother to purchase one But this experience has certainly left us with bad feelings about the quality of Tesla s customer service or lack thereof When we call the for Customer Service there is no link for our type of problem I hope you can pass along to your dealerships the need for EXCEPTIONAL service We need to talk to someone at a higher level to share our experience and displeasure

Title: Appalling customer service
Content: Title Disappointed in Tesla's Service A Customer's PerspectiveAs a proud Tesla owner for three years I've always sung praises for the brand until now My recent experience with their service support for cracked rims has left me feeling incredibly frustrated and disappointed When I encountered an issue with my rims I expected the same level of prompt and efficient service that I've come to associate with Tesla However what followed was a nightmare of being bounced around from one department to another with no real solution in sight Despite reaching out for assistance it felt like I was being pushed from pillar to post with no one willing to take responsibility for resolving the issue Requests for a technician to replace the rim were met with resistance and I found myself stuck in a bureaucratic loop between breakdown call outs and the vehicle service part of the app The entire ordeal has been needlessly protracted taking nearly three days to sort out a timeframe that is simply unacceptable especially when I'm away on business and relying on my vehicle This experience has genuinely shaken my confidence in Tesla as a brand As someone who has been a loyal advocate I never imagined that I would be driven to consider switching to another manufacturer But the lack of support and resolution in this instance has left me with no choice but to explore alternative optioMoving forward I hope that Tesla takes customer service

Title: Can not recommend Cars or Chargers
Content: Over 3 years of ownership multiple issues and services centre visits The car was lease new from Tesla direct the problems started from day one on build quality the car has been in over 5 times now for what should have been quality controls pickups Boot electric lift has failed multiple times and other electrical components around the car But it s not just the cars that give issues a Wall Charger Gen3 has been problematic for months now not being reliable for scheduled charging Ask Tesla support to look at it and after about 5 emails they stopped answering for over a month leaving us with no charging solution I chased this multiple time and only got a reply after having to replace the charger with a reliable brand As the charger is faulty 2 different Tesla models has same issue asked for them to replace after new charger installed and Tesla one packed back in the box Seems that a lot of the support staff don't understand that having to wait a long time is unacceptable Having to now escalate as a formal complaint but looking at review dont hold much hope that customer service will be given Luckily the car is due to be replaced in 6 months so I after all the poor build issues and support service I guess will not be another Tesla now as lost faith in the brand Tesla needs to focus on good customer experiences or will see sales dive further in the future
