Content: Listen I haven't even bought a car from this company before but I know what you are doing The stuff going on in Congo I know you've got a hand in it Maybe your cars are good that's not my concern but what you're doing is SO messed up

Title: Really cannot recommend
Content: Really cannot recommend Great car and sold the dream we needed the car promptly but due to Q1 offer they are way behind on there finance Advised the salesman in Cribbs Causeway timescales and promised if it was not we would get the 200 back Timescales not met and Friday at 4pm when there was still no clarification we were processed and finance agreed I had to cancel so I had a car I was told hopefully I would get the car on Tuesday but no guarantee we had 3 changes of collection time already Went into the shop today requesting the 200 refund we were promised I was told that as I cancelled as I had no refund I needed a vehicle for Wednesday this week Audi has got a car and resolved quick an effieciently with no deposit Be very wary of the sales techniques currently with Tesla Cribbs left 3 messages for customer services still not reply so we are down 200 through mis selling Wont be back ever shame liked the car alot

Title: 5 Terrible Customer Service
Content: The car is great Customer service and miss selling is worst I have ever come across I was told I had to buy the car by end of 17th and get delivery this month to get a free home super charger Assumption is the mother of all F k Ups I assumed the charger would come with the car When I picked the car up I asked where the charger is The girl knew nothing about it and said I would get a code in a few days Nothing arrived so I text the AI customer service and told it would be 2 weeks I went on Sunday to showroom and they said a manager would call me tomorrow morning It is now Monday afternoon and no one has called I am waiting for my solicitor to confirm if this is a big enough reason to return the car under mis selling on consumer credit act as they are the introducer

Title: Such a disorganised company
Content: Such a disorganised company Everything is drawn out and over complicated for no reason The cars are decent value but the service and the company itself is just shocking to deal with compared to any other car dealership I ve dealt with in the past

Title: Please becareful when placing orders with this company
Content: On the 27th February we placed an order for Blue Tesla Y AWD Long range My husband transferred money from account 15 300 plus 200 00 Name Tesla Motors Limited Reg on Car LG24 XAK We brought this car through Paul at Tesla in Milton Keynes he even checked with his supervisor and Brent Cross supervisor the car was definitely available We told Paul if he wanted this order we had to have the car before 7th March 2024 due to Full No Claim Bonus on my wife would expire on 7th March 2024 However we were told you had to pick the car up from Brentwood We got told as long as we did the paperwork quick the car would be ready for collection on the 4th March 2024 My wife arranged insurance for the 4th March 2024 costing 78 00 a month On Sunday 3rd March 2024 got a text message for CA Auto saying Hi Darren I have checked with CA Auto finance confirmed the signature of the contract had not been done we will keep you updated They had rescheduled you for pick up Wednesday What a load of rubbish we got confirmation I had been approved on the finance on the Thursday Next minute it was rearranged for Saturday on the Thursday 7th March 2024 we got another text we regret to inform currently experiencing delays due to backlog As a result from CA Auto we have had to reschedule you to Thursday 14th March 2024 Why did your company make your staff lie you had stock false advertising on built inventory We don t even think this car was even built This order has been cancelled since 9th March 2024 we have still not received our money back Your website states refund with 7 10 days 2nd april 2024 and no refund Even Paul in Milton Keynes doesn't know whether we will get our refund Had a response from Tesla Customer Services Please note our refunds our processed from Amsterdam take up to 14 days This is a joke Refunded on 3rd April 2024 no apology nothing and never spoke to human

Title: Can t be less than 1
Content: Can t be less than 1 Tesla is a car selling company and not an ongoing good customer services company Naturally when buying a Tesla they are fantastic That s not when you need them You need them when things go wrong AND they are definitaly not their when they do AND THEY DO The only vehicle company with NO official complaints handling team Or none that will get back to you Especially when THEY CAUSE problems with your car and charge you for them AND YOU MUST PAY OR YOU DONT GET YOUR CAR BACK Then chase the problem with the none existent complaints team DONT BUY THESE CARS Think about it Buy an electric car with a company that already has the support in place Porsche VW Ford Hyundai Kia Vauxhall bmw Mercedes Not one with no background support

Title: Disgraceful service
Content: Disgraceful service Returned a model 3 the day after collection as i just wasn't happy with the awful condition of it 5 weeks later and i have yet to receive refund of my deposit which is multiple thousands of pounds Chasing repeatedly and told i had to wait until past the funds return window Did that still nothing and was then told that the finance team closed down the refund without any action Now awaiting the whole process to happen again and still out of pocket At this rate i am going to have to go to the store and sit in protest until i get my money back along with reporting to trading standards

Title: Very Unhappy with the new Model 3
Content: Very Unhappy with the new Model 3 Dual Motor Long Range and the service from Tesla up to now Our concerns issues still outstanding as of today a week on from the last email response from Tesla I have managed to speak with them today and hope this leads to a satisfactory resolution Delivery when I spoke with the Brent Cross team they told me our car would be delivered on the back of a flat bed truck I specifically asked this question When it actually arrived it had been driven 30 miles if driven by road this should only be 5 7 miles BUT according to what I was told it should have been minimal for loading and unloading I was prepared to overlook this previously but with everything that has happened since we no longer are prepared to accept that A new car should not have 30 miles on the clock and I should not have been lied to by the Brent Cross delivery team Rear Park Assist an incident happened on Sunday 3 March at 7 30pm was very concerning as there were no alerts beeping as I was reversing towards the object whilst it annoyingly keeps beeping at almost everything else I checked subsequently the park assist sounds were on measure of distance not working and screen of surroundings all blurred I also notice there is a software alert that perhaps needs to address this fault It would appear Tesla is aware of the following issues and is looking to make improvements with the system 1 FORBES INNOVATION CONSUMER TECHTesla s Vision Park Assist Surprisingly Bad Exceptionally Inaccurate John Koetsier Senior Contributor Journalist analyst author and speaker Published Apr 18 2023 01 50pm EDT2 Why Park Assist With Tesla Vision Is Doomed to Fail Published 25 Mar 2023 22 29 UTC By Gustavo Henrique Ruffo Gustavo Henrique Ruffo Given the view out of the rear window is not great if there is any issue with the park assist system that makes it really tricky knowing how close you are to objects behind you As I explained to your service team we feel very disappointed that we have damage on the rear bumper and light as the result of issues with the park assist not working effectively This is not acceptable in a 52k car It also has massively tainted our experience with Tesla the first time we have bought one and potentially our last Our Skoda Fabia which cost 1 5 of the price of the Tesla has better park assist sounds images We request that Tesla undertakes the following for us a investigate and remedy the park assist function on our car to make sure it is working effectively and as it should b undertake the repair to the rear bumper and light at no cost to us the front number plate is extremely flimsily secured it looks like it's missing some securing screws and really feels like it could fall off at any time indicators impossible to use on roundabout and not able to test drive this at time of purchase It feels very dangerous when you have to take your eyes off the road to find the indicator switch on the steering wheel whilst turning left in the middle of a roundabout We could not test drive this function when we ordered as it is new poor interior shows dirt dust really quickly The seats look very dirty already and its almost new We had our two BMWs previously and the interiors were far more hard wearing We have not treated this one any differently and have actually tried to be extra careful wearing clean shoes etc when we go in it The trim for the drivers left hand foot rest area keeps coming loose too there's an issue with the valcro fixing of it This is actually pretty dangerous as it gets in the way of your feet when driving windscreen wipers auto function ineffective and dangerous when it does not work properly whilst driving The auto windscreen wipers are very inconsistent difficult and unsafe to change on the screen Sat Nav delay in update leading to going wrong way and poor route It provides silly routes and the sat nav regularly freezes resulting in going the wrong way auto heating ac control results in unnecessary high fan most of the time the main light dimmers on Auto are very inconsistent AND otherwise very difficult to operate without taking your eyes off the road which is dangerous The way we feel about the purchase of this Tesla right now we would prefer to return it to get our money back in full can Tesla arrange that The immediate original key point that is still outstanding and with Tesla along with the above is for the issues with the park assist to be fixed and for the bumper damage fixed by Tesla free of charge

Title: Ridiculous
Content: Ridiculous awful gas lighters The cars are great when they work but as for the service and after care It would be difficult to create a worse service by design I thought buying a used vehicle directly from Tesla still under warranty and with very low mileage would be a good idea I was wrong Firstly they kept delaying the pick up date without consult you have to keep checking the app for changes they will do this last minute without warning and will never apologise for the inconvenience They sold me a car that had been subject to a prior major repair Before handing over my money I directly asked them if the vehicle was 'ex repair' to which they lied and categorically stated over the phone that it was not I have finally thank goodness sold this vehicle and I feel immense relief It's like getting out of a bad toxic relationship The lovely co who have bought the car from me cited several things wrong with it that should have apparently been addressed before Tesla ever sold it to me this includes faded headlights Luckily these are still under warranty otherwise that's a 3000 fix I took the car for repair last year after I hit a curb causing a flat tire and a small dent I referred the car to Tesla when it came back they had not addressed the bodywork and refused to remediate this gaslighting me and then just completely ignoring me They also by policy refuse to correspond with any insurance companies whatsoever so its impossible to make a claim unless you mediate it yourself and dedicate enormous time to this dozens of hours lost utter frustration and you really do need to know your rights in common law to get this done at all I went to collect the 'repaired' vehicle form the Tesla centre but immediately noticed the key and charging cables were missing I asked if I could have these back to which I was advised by a Tesla employee there that no one could help me and that I should leave and come back another time What This actually got me and my GF stuck at Christmas unable to find a charging station that had the old type 2 EV hose Yes they sold me a car in 2023 without the CCS adaptor upgrade and then stole all the adaptors and I didn't see these back for 4 months Ever since then things got even worse There has been issue after issue with often dire and obnoxious service From their side there has been blame gaslighting and they have even miss 'quoted' me back to myself with either completely 'out of context statements' or blatant falsehoods If I had any energy left I would make a claim for damages and extortion The repair itself didn't address the body work so I was left out of pocket having concluded my affairs with the insurance company obviously They replaced the wheel with a different colour grey not black and the front fender was still bent When I complained I was told the service centre should never have accepted the repair in the first place as they were not suitable to carry out 'that kind of the work' What the AF When I then asked how Tesla proposed to remedy this they simply said there was nothing they could do I even tried to book it in for a service and they then deleted the conversation on the app chat One week later the heater blew up Went to get this fixed at a different service centre Following the initial repair I noticed rattling vibration noises Went to have this looked at again by Tesla twice was told I was imagining things Twice Since then charge port broke Then wing mirror Both issues were covered under warranty but Tesla tried to charge me through the app they will do this hoping that some will pay They will try to weasel out of any warranty claim or gaslight you by telling you the issue does not exists I had this with the wing mirror and the charge port In both cases being sent away and told the problem wasn't present Eventually they did replace these This general narrative has occurred every time there has been an issue I have many examples of their B S but I now feel myself 'ageing' writing this review I am not overstating things when I say that owning this car and dealing with Telsa has taken me to some emotionally dark places these interactions have made life genuinely unbearable at times Never an apology I was fobbed off and lied to they'll even steal your cables and keys and then ignore you when you ask for them back Utter disgrace They will never take responsibility for warranty issues or bodged work and to make things even worse the value of my car halved since I bought it only 10 months ago due to their terrible reputation and known dreadful service It was of course overpriced in the first place I feel an enormous sense of relief having finally gotten rid if it Never again Mercedes EQS next A company that actually cares about their customers

Title: Absolutely atrocious service
Content: Absolutely atrocious service RIP off prices and very poor knowledge Wont repair and check anything just quote new and thousands of pounds Don t care also and never respond Sink this ship and do not buy Tesla s Wait for the Chinese superior cars at half the price

Title: Appalling service from Tesla Norwich
Content: I popped in to Tesla Norwich to view a model 3 advertised on Autotrader as available at NorwIch The customer service rep knew nothing about the car and I had to show him my saved Autotrader ad for him to track this down The car was in Birmingham and between 10 00am when I printed out the ad and 1 15pm when I visited the store the price had increased by 6K When I queried this he said that they most have carried out work on the car this despite the car having covered just 19k miles and being 4 years old with a recent clear MOT This changed the price from fair to very high Be very very wary about buying a secondhand Tesla direct from Tesla if the very high prices don't put you off then their poor customer service should

Title: With the stewardship of the great Elon
Content: With the stewardship of the great Elon Musk this company is getting amazingly unstoppable

Title: Positive car buying experience at Tesla
Content: We went to the Tysons Corner va Tesla dealer for the first time We were wamly greeted by a young lady named Tiare or T She was the perfect sales person because she was very knowledgable courteous and patient with us We had no experience with electric cars and had a lot of questions however Tiare was able to answer all our questions easily T even brought the model x to our home to make sure the car would fit in our garage Also the young manager Kenny was helpful and polite Our car buying experience was very positive We recommend this sales lady to anyone buying a Tesla car Loved the cars too M David Leesburg Va

Title: Received a car with various dents
Content: Received a car with various dents supposed to be a brand new car Tesla don t care and are extremely unhelpful My advice is reject any car straight away as they don t care about the inconvenience caused by them telling you to have it repaired

Title: Absolutely disgusting
Content: Absolutely disgusting I bought a 32a blue plug through the app in December i was sent the wrong one which i was told to return which I did I was then told the one I need was out of stock and would be sent to me as soon as it is back in I saw that it was showing in stock a few weeks later and called them to be told they would send the correct one straight out to me I waited 3 weeks and still no delivery i called again and they appologised and said they thought it had been sent They assured me it would be sent that day another 2 weeks later and still no item delivered Again I called and was told they didn't know why it hadn't been sent already and would send it out Guess what 3 more weeks and still no delivery I expected so much more from what is seen as a prestigious brand The after sales experience is one of the worst I have ever known

Title: Tesla Bristol
Content: Had my model 3 in tesla Bristol service centre twice for noisy osf wheel bearing that should of been covered under warranty Kept telling me it was the tyres after i tried two different sets of the correct tyre for the car As being a bodyshop and mechanical tec I found it easier to do it my self Fitted new wheel bearing job done Stay well away from this place as they have no clue what they are doing

Title: I'm really disappointed how buggy this
Content: I'm really disappointed how buggy this car is I own the latest model 3 I don't recommend this buggy car to anyone I will get the rid of it and I will buy a car from another manufacturer No Tesla anymore

Title: Bodyshop Owner Advice
Content: Bodyshop Owner Advice Under no circumstances would I recommend proving services to Tesla we had a nightmare experience when we provided bodyshop services to them and 3 years on still await a significant payment from them Regards repairing Tesla's for off the street customers this is equally challenging To order parts you require to be accepted onto their Parts Portal you then require to pay up front and the delivery date changes each day so that you can't give your customer a booking date and therefore receive payment the money back for the part you've ordered If I was a conspiracy theorist I'd suggest they seem to like holding onto your money perhaps for their own cashflow false accounting benefits Absolutely awful company to deal with

Title: The tesla Team in Ontario the Good The Bad the Ugly
Content: After my experience with the Tesla team in buying a new 2024 tesla model Y I came to the conclusion that traditional dealers are far better than tesla personnel in dealing with their customers They are well trained in making you feel important unlike tesla personnel who rely more on the reputation of the product and it looks like their real subconscious motto is you take it or leave it Don't expect good communication regarding step by step requirements along the process Also don't expect consistency when you talk to more than one person In my case I was asked to provide a lein release letter for my trade in car but only a few hours before the delivery time Because it usually takes the lending bank a day or two to provide that letter I was told I could go to the branch to get proof that the trade in car was paid out But the Tesla representative in Oakville Ontario had refused to accept that stamped document from the branch To make my story short the bad thing about the tesla team is the inconsistency in their communication practices but the ugly part lies within their subconscious motto take it or leave it

Title: I went to cork service centre to get
Content: I went to cork service centre to get door opening closing issue they put in invoice motor replaced and charged over 1000 week later same problem back went back there and they told me motor is dead and they need to order new one and when they will receive it unknown over month gone they went silent they took money and didn't do nothing they didnt replace any parts its very bad how they literally steel money plus there is no way to contact them or make complaint for me tesla is dead and better not to have any contact with them and explore different electric options

Title: Worst Customer Service EVER
Content: Had terrible service since they took the order I placed an order which prior to placing on the phone I was told would have a turnaround of around a week which was perfect as my vehicle was going back on 4th march so I placed the order on the 20th Feb for an inventory car in Manchester plenty of time considering it only takes a week That night I looked on the app and could see the car Registration number etc So confirmed the car was there for me The next day 21st Feb the registration disappeared and I was given a date of the end of march I called to query and was told you never had a vehicle assigned to you I gave them the registration number and they went away A few hours later they called me back and said oh yes that's in Bristol you can collect from there if you want No that's why I bought a Manchester vehicle as Bristol was too far away They then said leave it with me and someone will call you back I then received a call from a person at the Manchester branch who stated oh yeah I can see you have been assigned a car for the end of the month I have one coming in next week you can have earliest I can book it in for is the 5th I thought that's fine I'll be without a car for one night and will pick this on up Tuesday morning Didn't hear from them again for nearly a week then today I had a text I hope you are well I attempted to call but the line went silent We are still waiting for a Purchase Order from CA Auto Finance Because of this the vehicle is not going to be ready to be released to you on Tuesday unfortunately I do apologise for this I have been advised to re schedule your collection appointment for Thursday 7th of March More than happy to give you a call when convenient for you I didn't receive any missed calls and this was clearly an employee who couldn't be bothered making the bad call and decided to put it in a text I responded immediately asking for a call back from a manager as I need the vehicle Tuesday Nothing I then tried to contact drivalia and CA auto who are supposedly the same firm yet have two different numbers and webpages Only to be told they don't work weekends So I contacted the sales person who was great called me in 20 30 minutes took the details of the issue and got someone to call me back He pretty much said nothing I can do you have to wait until Thursday I explained all the issues I've had so far and he didn't sound bothered I'm now going to be left on Monday when my vehicle is taken off me making calls chasing up CA Auto Drivalia and Tesla trying to organise a resolution to there mistake I'll be looking to make a formal complaint about the entire experience hopefully the car isn't as bad as the customer service

Title: Sound fibonacci and Mandalis
Content: FAO Elon I hope this message finds you well I am writing to express my appreciation for the innovative steps Tesla continues to make within the automotive industry particularly with the design of the new Model 3 Your teams efforts in advancing electric vehicles are truly commendable and contribute significantly to human evolution However I wish to address a particular design choice regarding the new Model 3 that has sparked considerable concern Specifically the decision to replace the iconic simple Tesla logo at the vehicle's rear end with the brand name spelled out While I understand the intent behind brand visibility and recognition this change seems to detract from the elegant simplicity that Tesla is known for I'd like to offer a perspective that considers the broader implications of design elements Sound as you know is a form of vibration and vibrations manifest shapes harmonious sounds create beautiful coherent patterns akin to those found in nature or in the intricate mandalas that symbolise mindfulness and focus in various cultures This principle of harmony and simplicity resonates deeply with the human psyche echoing the elegance found in the natural world By extending this analogy the Tesla logo in its singular form serves not just as a brand identifier but as a symbol that conveys a multitude of meanings and values a testament to innovation quality and sustainability Conversely spreading out the name 'TESLA' into individual letters across the car's rear could be perceived as a regression to a more conventional and less inspired form of expression It suggests a return to the literal when the power of a symbol lies in its ability to evoke a spectrum of ideas and emotions much like the transition from noise to music or from form to essence In essence what I wish to convey is the beauty inherent in simplicity an attribute that Tesla has exemplified across its product lines and brand ethos Reverting to the singular impactful logo could reinforce this principle aligning the visual message with the profound values Tesla represents Thank you for considering this feedback Your work continues to inspire and drive forward not only the automotive industry but also broader discussions on sustainability and the future of technology Warm regards

Title: I own a Tesla Modle Y
Content: I own a Tesla Modle YPoor quality car screen crashes most of the time Engineers talk frequently of software update that never fixes the problem I would strongly recommend no one should buy a Tesla Waste of money

Content: If your cars were as good as them pies that you guys stiffed maybe there wouldn t have been so many recalls losers

Title: Shocking service
Content: Shocking service Paid cash for a Model Y ex dem just a few miles on clock already registrered supposedly just needed a wash and a quick check over 5 weeks later it was still not available despite dozens of emails and calls eventually I have it what a disgrace bumper and door obviously repainted by an absolute novice they couldn t care less bring it back if ya don t like it or book it in for a service and let s have another go at the paint job Not an apology in site Disgraceful service My 6th Tesla and trust me The courtesy and customer service is at an all time low

Title: Sale of damaged vehicle Used
Content: I arrived to pick up my new Tesla Y and I was informed that my car had chips in the paint on the boot This is not surprising as there were hundreds of dusty Telslas sitting outside completely exposed to the elements They offered to do the repairs They were surprised when I said I actually wanted a new car not one that was damaged and that I would have to get repaired It's hard to believe that they actually wanted to sell me a damaged car and then expect me to waste my time getting it fixed

Title: Even 1 start is too much for them
Content: Even 1 start is too much for them am waiting 2 months to resolve the issues still not happen Really bad customer service

Title: Service is extremely disappointing
Content: Total disappointment with service First time requesting roadside assistance for a flat I sent a service request through the app While making a call to let family know I had a flat I received a text regarding the service and moments later another text saying since I did not respond to the initial text my service request had been canceled I actually spoke to someone and I was told that if I didn t reply to text they were to attempt to call me which they did not It just so happens I am waiting for tire repair replacement at home while I have a service appointment scheduled I have not heard about my tire repair and I am not sure if I can arrive late to my service appointment or if I need to reschedule It s unfortunate there is no possible way to speak to someone and messages go unanswered Had so known service communication for Tesla s was this terrible I never would have purchased a Tesla Service is the time when consumers are in need and the best time for any company to make a lasting impression unfortunately Tesla does not appear to have the same point of view Think long and hard about not being able to get a response when you may be most in need prior to making the decision to purchase a Tesla

Title: Horrible customer service
Content: Horrible customer service avoid at all cost Danny from Cambridge store never gave information about how useless were their agreed 3rd party credit lenders first company CA Auto declined the application for no reason despite high affordability and credit score I was going to cancel my order and ask for a refund they convinced me to try with other lender Blackhorse which is also not responding I was assured we were going to get a quick answer I've been messing around with these lenders for nothing for a week when I was urgently needing a car No communication no return no update they just paint you a picture to place order and if things take longer for making a decision they try to sell the reserved car to the someone else living you in limbo I lost time by not going to another brand Lender tells ask Tesla Tesla tells ask lender

Title: model Y with enhanced not ready don t waste your money
Content: I bought model Y with enhanced autopilot 3400 extra Nearly a year and the software isn t ready to use I contacted the customer service since 2 days after I picked it up They kept telling me that they are working on the background for software updates Asked for refund after 2 months and they simply refused Trading standard can t do anything Waste of money

Title: I'd like to express my sincere
Content: I'd like to express my sincere appreciation for the outstanding service provided by Senior Technician George during my recent visit to the Tesla Service Center in Milton Keynes George promptly addressed all the issues with my car and demonstrated remarkable proficiency in diagnosing and resolving the problems His meticulous attention to detail and thorough approach ensured that every aspect of the repairs was handled with precision and care Moreover George's commitment to keeping me informed throughout the repair process was truly exemplary He provided regular updates on every step of the repairs ensuring that I was well informed and reassured about the status of my vehicle His clear communication and transparency greatly contributed to a positive customer experience

Title: I would highly recommend to not buy a

Title: No help available whatsoever
Content: It is totally impossible to talk to a human in this company The contact us page sends you round in never ending circles Worst customer service I have ever encountered

Title: Unhelpful
Content: When taking you car to service the service centers rarely have the parts in stock that you have booked for replacement despite it being clear for several weeks from the service appointment If they do have the parts they might make mistakes You then still have to go through their app'maze again and wait another 3 weeks or more and in my case drive far back and forth No compensation and apoligies are made I have been driving two Tesla S and one Tesla X the past 12 years I've only put up with this treatment because of the lack of competition The salesmen are equally unhelpful seemingly oblivious that several manufacturers now have comparable or better electric cars The competition actually will provide you with genuine service by phone e mail or app

Title: Definitely not a great experience after
Content: Definitely not a great experience after order up to point of collection Let s hope things get better

Title: I left my Tesla into Belfast 12 dec got
Content: I left my Tesla into Belfast 12 dec got back 20 Jan From I got the car back I have a noise that they say will cost me 400 to fix Hard to believe they worked on the car and now it s got a problem No words for customer service Hope people read this and don t but a Tesla Poor show all round Useless staff and all done on email is very distracting and frustrating

Title: Absolutely horrible customer service
Content: Absolutely horrible customer service Cars continuously are breaking and the repair facilities are a nightmare to deal with All of which is really disappointing because it is so close to being a good car if only their customer service was even just average

Title: Poor service

Title: Worst experience in a car shop ever
Content: Worst experience in a car shop ever Rude aggressive floor manager Delivered the car before time Only half of the 4 issues fixed when closing time even if the calculated time was less No communication that the car wasn't done as planned The cost for travelling to get my car after the weekend 100 on me even though it was the repair centers that waited to long for my planned repair

Title: delivery is horrible
Content: delivery is horrible don't look at the indicated delivery dates upon ordering always postponed but insurance paid and license plates already at pickup location What a mess

Title: Horrible Customer Service
Content: Extremely rude customer service I think her name was Danielle I booked Tesla on 12 29 2023 paid for insurance but canceled on12 30 2023 and also canceled insurance through the tsla app Igot charged again in Feb 2024 So i called customer service OMG This women dont know who she thinks she is The rudest person i ever spoke She wanted me to explain the steps on their app i took to cancel How the heck do i remmeber the steps i followed a month ago and she says she doesnt have time to listen to me and kept cutting me off Even an electric cuompany customer service is more professional than Tesla I will not buy Tesla ever in my life Will take my business somewhere else

Title: Absolutely horrific customer service
Content: Absolutely horrific customer service Three times our car has went into Belfast service centre and came back out with new issues that didn t exist before it went in This in itself is not where my main concern lies This now being the most recent occasion and I cannot even speak to someone at the service centre Instead I have to fight to get a response from their Tesla virtual support via their app I have to wait hours or longer at a time for any response at all and when I do get a response it s just generic patronising nonsense This being despite the fact that I am simply trying to get Tesla to fix a fault with the car that they created I tried asking for the phone number for their Belfast service centre and they refused to give it to me I expect this level of customer service when I spend 8 month on a mobile sim card but not when I spend tens of thousands on a car To be clear this review is only regarding their customer service The car itself aside from the few minor issues that had it back at the service centre has been mostly perfect

Title: Tesla support
Content: This morning around 10am I was going to go to the market but I realized that my Tesla Model 3 was turned off even though it was charging I was super surprised because this had never happened before I tried to contact support through the Tesla app and they sent a tow truck to supposedly tow the car to the nearest Tesla dealership but the person Tesla sent was from a third party company and he just opened the car and charged it for 3 minutes on the battery in the front of the car and said it was fixed and there was no need to tow it to Tesla I told him I had to work in the afternoon and if it was safe to drive he said yes and left When I went to work I was surprised again with several alerts on the car saying that it was not safe to drive once again I contacted support and the attendant Adrian told me that he could not send another tow truck because I denied the service for In the morning the person who came told me that there was no need to take the car so I asked the supervisor Daniel who told me the same thing that if I wanted the towing service I would have to pay and Tesla would not provide it After more than an hour of calling and NOTHING being resolved I still can't use the car and no one can solve my problem at Tesla I am very upset with this situation I believed that Tesla was attentive to its customers I'm disappointed with this and feeling punished for something that I wasn't informed by front support that they would only send one tow truck a day and here's a tip for anyone looking to buy a Tesla I recommend looking for another brand

Title: Panel removal not reinstalled
Content: Had my solar panels removed November 2 Roof replaces on the 2nd Now Tesla keeps pushing out the reinstallation for various reasons I am forced to pay for the panels in my garage and to the power company It is not my fault they didn't get it done the first scheduled date of Dec 7 Now again they pushed out reinstall to end of March I will lose 1000 due to this Unacceptable Very uncooperative service

Title: Tesla is an unregulated entity in UK
Content: Tesla is an unregulated entity in UK They are not registered with the Motor Ombudsman and do not have any code of conduct for customer service They do not have any mechanism to register any complaints They are using the loophole in motoring industry as perhaps the only business not having signed up to regulator So you cannot take your grievance to any regulator The only way to escalate would be to take legal action which in most cases is disproportionately expensive and time consuming If any of you can succeed in even registering a formal complaint with Tesla that would be a great triumph This is all the more important as their customer service is absolutely appalling British consumers should know this before buying Tesla but they don't That is scandalous in my view I discovered all this after experiencing serious customer service issues on several occasions There are much better electric cars out there now with good customer service attached

Title: Innovative company
Content: Without a doubt it's an innovative company which has changed the world of automotive Props to the genius Musk who has managed to build such a big corporation with billions dollars turnover and yeah nowadays many people around the globe stick to the green agenda and the concept of electro cars perfectly fits society's sentiment I personally have no Tesla car but I have watched tons of reviews and videos in the youtube and I believe Model S is the future of automotive

Title: A Rocky Road with My Tesla Model Y
Content: As a new Tesla Model Y owner I embarked on what I hoped would be a seamless journey with a cutting edge electric vehicle However my experience has been anything but smooth marked by a series of unfortunate incidents and what I perceive as inadequate customer service Windshield Woes Within the first month I encountered a mysterious crack in the front windshield Tesla's assessment attributed it to a rock strike an explanation I found perplexing and somewhat unsatisfactory The responsibility for repair costs amounting to approximately 2000 fell entirely on me a disheartening outcome for such a new purchase Tire Troubles on the Road My drive from Redmond WA to Portland OR was abruptly interrupted by a blown tire a stressful situation exacerbated by a blizzard Tesla's roadside assistance was far from comforting their suggestion to book a hotel and wait for service was impractical given the severe weather conditions and my family's well being Although they eventually sent a service truck to replace the tire their insistence on taking the damaged tire to their service center was another point of frustration Compounded by the discovery of a second damaged tire with an additional cost of 420 for replacements the ordeal was a significant inconvenience It disrupted our family routine causing us to miss work and school Comparing Experiences Reflecting on my ownership of cars from other brands like Nissan Toyota and Honda I can't recall facing such issues My decision to switch to Tesla was driven by a desire to embrace environmentally friendly technology and to benefit from the purported long term economical advantages of an electric vehicle However this series of events has led me to question my decision As of now I'm left with the task of coordinating the retrieval of my tire from Portland and addressing the bubble in the second tire which renders my car undriveable It's a reminder that every purchase especially one as significant as a vehicle comes with its own set of challenges In Conclusion This review is a candid account of my experience as a Tesla owner It's not just about the technical difficulties but also about the expectation of support and service that should accompany any high end product I remain hopeful for a resolution and believe that sharing my story might help others in making informed decisions My journey with Tesla continues and I'm eager to see if the coming weeks bring about a change in my current perspective

Title: The car has far exceeded my
Content: The car has far exceeded my expectations The ride quality has been so good and I feel completely safe whenever I'm driving and I have never had any major issues at all

Title: Online app and support and customer service is appalling
Content: Tried to book a service for the vehicle first service after 2 years and you cant do it like normal garages you need to use the app talking to a pre set computer that has no purpose and cannot help at all They have messed me about for weeks before xmas booking and cancelling the appointment three times and eventually booking a home visit on the 02 01 24 between 8am and 12pmI had to take a day off from work unpaid I should say for short notice and they never turned up no calls or emails to advise on that and I had to stay at home like an idiot all day waiting for them not showing up obviously they never did as day after new year s I assume someone was too hungover to provide the correct service But hey what do I know I could be wrong For the records they costed me 279 for that unpaid day they made me take I complained to them and told them exactly what I thought about their pathetic cyber service and how p I was because of their doing For the records also when I took the car in few months back for a rattling noise took me over a month to book the appointment and their messaged me via the app for weeks asking me to drive the vehicle and record with a phone the noise the car was making just to give you an idea of their level on intelligence and accuracy when assisting customers and their cars This was at the North Shields branch at Vroom Orion business park Units 6 7 North Shields NE29 7TE Pathetic so called mechanics that have no clue on how to interact with people let alone servicing a vehicle Like I said they asked me to drive the vehicle with that noise I reported and record it whilst driving so that they could hear it absolutely morons Any other respectable garage centre would have asked to bring the car in for assessment and they would have test drive it themselves to find out the noise and what it may have been at Tesla NORTH SHIELDS you need to record the noise whilst driving very safe advice The online app support and customer service is appalling You cant speak with a anyone at all as the system its set up to force you to use the app and cant interact with any person either at your local centre or at H O Total non sense because the tesla app seems to be manned by chatbots and robots that only knows how to reject without even saying the problem atrocious customer service again and again Keep cancelling mobile service appointments after making us wait the whole time last one booked for the 2nd of Jan 2024 and made me take time off work that cost me 327 they never showed up never contacted me to tell me they weren t coming nor emailed me or phoned me Absolute bunch of cowboys at the North Shields centre total ignorant rude and unprofessional There is no way to lodge a complaint conveniently as they purposely void those consumer rights nothing on website no postal address no email address chat is not answered by anyone other than a default computer that gives you pre set answers do not seem to subscribe to any regulator like Motoring Ombudsman again convenient This is effectively an unregulated business which is scandalous Tried to book a service via the tesla app and I keep receiving a message I am guessing from the default computer saying that they are rejecting all services and cancelling all appointments in my name as a spite because I challenged their poor pathetic service They cant handle been found wrong and take childish actions against you by denying services probably because they impaired to carry them out to be fair

Title: Helpful Receptionist at Tesla Collision
Content: I brought my Model Y to Tesla Collision in Paramus NJ The receptionist Valentina was so helpful She helped me sign in the car for repair She advised me about how to get a ride home from Uber I had never used a ride system before I tried to use Lyft but had difficulty When she saw me struggling with my phone she came over and downloaded Uber for me and arranged for a ride She made sure that everything worked okay Valentina is a great representative for Tesla

Title: Tesla Legal Scam
Content: Warning Tesla Legal Scam Read this before you take Tesla to court Tesla has two companies One is called Tesla Motors and the other is called Tesla Financial Services If you purchase a car it will come from Tesla Motors When you have a problem with the vehicle you will speak to the sales and customer support departments If the dispute becomes legal you will likely get transferred to the legal department as I did This is where the big scam begins The legal department is a different company called Tesla Financial Services They will engage with the complaint and if you are still unhappy they openly encourage you to take them to court However you are taking the wrong company to court The judge threw out the case because I needed to take Tesla Motors to court instead of Tesla Financial Services It's a very sneaky scam Don't buy a Tesla The car will go wrong and then Tesla will do everything they can not to help you Customer service is awful

Title: Car is pretty good but the infotainment
Content: Car is pretty good but the infotainment system and app are beyond useless I thought Tesla were a tech company but guess I was wrong Perhaps they employed the guys from Fujitsu that worked on Horizon

Content: The 12v battery died I arranged an appointment to replace it the evening before I get a message that the part wasn t available that was after 9 phone calls 5 messages via the app 3 emails and a tweet to inform Tesla that I was stranded 40 miles from home Absolutely dreadful service Let s see if this review prompts a reply from someone

Title: I dont believe why 1 star reviews here
Content: I dont believe why 1 star reviews here i owned Tesla Model Y a month ago and it is one of the car the safety features car features are beyond my expectations Thanks heaps to Mr Musk for bringing it the great car

Title: Extremely deceptive dishonest and unsafe company
Content: I recently had my car serviced at Tesla Nottingham and unfortunately I encountered several concerning issues during the process Despite multiple visits and attempts to address the same issue I experienced repeated delays and a lack of effective communication from the service center The recommended replacement of rotors and pads did not resolve the initial problem and I felt frustrated by the lack of a prompt and satisfactory resolution Additionally I found it challenging to get in touch with the service center as my messages were often ignored and there was no available phone number for direct communication This lack of accessibility added to the inconvenience of the overall experience Furthermore I was deeply upset by a past incident where the service provided by the company led to an injury to my daughter This neglectful experience has left me extremely dissatisfied with the level of care and attention to detail from the company's management and staff I hope that by sharing my feedback the company can take steps to improve their service and prioritize effective communication and customer care in the future

Title: dealing with tesla is a nightmare
Content: dealing with tesla is a nightmare We just gave back 2 leased tesla s for 2 new tesla'sMusk does not feel customer service is important and the CS experience is terrible in everyway Also had the car into the shop as a sensor was not working Now worse than before As most people have heard that Hertz stock took a big hit due to the tesla s that were costly to maintainLove the EC the good news is that for my next car there will be lots of choices from many companies I also had a 3 year lease with 30 000 miles and turned it in with after 20 000 miles and was charged 375 for excessive tire use DO you know if any other companies that work that way

Title: Telsa had my love and gave it away
Content: Driving a Tesla is like being a parent to a special needs child I have owned my Model Y for under a year Their business model has been to produce in volume Elon's philosophy about procreation too and then que sera sera You will have problems like for instance my car refused to unlock needing Tesla's roadside assistance to tow my car If you have a backup car for use when things go wrong you'll be fine It is a fun car lust not one on which you can depend They used to provide you a loaner or Uber credit when you needed service but with so many customers needing it it is on it's way out It is too bad I really wanted to see Tesla succeed but since their evil side revealed itself I am vacillating Before buying my Tesla I owned 5 Priuses never needed a repair and got spoiled Some people get lucky and don't have problems just remember YMMV

Title: Don t buy a Tesla on their finance
Content: I love driving my Tesla so ordered a new replacement last month with their finance which I now know is through Blackhorse I ve tried to change the deposit amount by countless calls emails and texts over the last 4 weeks without success I ve even contacted Blackhorse but they are just as useless as they can t helpMe and refer me back to Tesla It s seems you can t talk to someone directly and you re simply promised someone will sort it but they never do

Title: Tesla s leasing institution Tesla
Content: Tesla s leasing institution Tesla Lease Trust and their customer service is one of the worst ever to deal with You either cannot get anyone on the phone to speak to and assist you or if you do they say you need to leave a message or email some department When you do they pick and choose what and when they want to respond to Tesla Lease Trust doesnt handle lease transfer properly timely or legally They refuse to follow state tax laws no matter what the state tax dept tells you re what taxes you owe or what tax credit is due to you Tesla customer service reps will tell you and email you that they re not doing it that way and make you pay taxes that the state does not charge you for nor require you to pay Even if you send state laws off the state website available to the public emails from the state tax dept stating what you owe and don t owe or anything in writing from the state tax dept Tesla reps still will tell you email you in writing they re not doing it that way and you need to pay taxes that don t align with laws Literally tax fraud These ppl Tesla think they can do whatever they want I would never ever lease another car thru Tesla again if it was almost free

Title: Tesla is a computer first car second Worst car ever
Content: I can't begin to tell you how much stress all the bells and whistles that don't shut up Change lanes stay in your lane pay attnetion to the road Harness failures Omg and don't get me started on how they royally screwed up their rip off of a 15 000 full self driving feature only to have it taken away by tesla strikes when the system deactivates You know what I shouldn't have to get a tesal strike if I'm trying to find my way on a map on the car or changing the radio Hate tesla Worst car I have ever driven bar none and I have leased many vehicles in my time but this takes the top as the cheapest worst car I've ever driven I'm sorry but I should get a refund for the FSD I purchased It doesn't work properly anymore I bought a car and youre punishing everyone for a 15 000 purchase they made by taking all cruise control away for a week Sorry I will never buy a tesla again I'm going to rag on it to anyone who asks me if they should get one I was considering tesla solar but from the customer service to being HORRIBLE Getting a lease ending termination lease of 13 000 with 4 payments of 600 left on my lease Why would I pay 10k more to end my lease early I tried contacting them and they said that was only option or just pay off the remaining balance HUH Tesla sucks Don't get it

Title: Tesla's are overpriced
Content: Tesla's are overpriced unreliable garbage that are impossible to sell used because of it's battery lifespan Now I'm off to buy a Mercedes diesel

Title: Great service from the Tesla team in
Content: Great service from the Tesla team in IrelandColm and Jim were especially helpful in enabling me to complete an order and receive delivery right at the end of the year Really appreciate it

Title: I booked my model Y back in May 2023
Content: I booked my model Y back in May 2023 based on the numbers given to me by the dealership At the delivery time they raised the number by about 20 I cancelled based in that and I was told by the dealership and the manager that I will be refunded by deposit I have text messages saying that my refund is in process Six months have passed and I have not received my refund back

Title: Tesla made my life hell from the day I spent circa 110 000
Content: Owned a vehicle for 3 years It was honestly the worst time of my life 110 000 and never once was it problem hassle free Tesla repaired the wiring loom in 2021 and ever since it s had issues After 16 service visits for electrical and drivetrain issues which never got fixed I took it upon myself to strip the vehicle down and I found the repair from Tesla service centre in Milton Keynes was to blame At this time they repaired this loom although I asked for it to be replaced they assured me it would be fine and they are not willing to replace the loom I found this very strange on a car under 6 months old Anyway at the same time they repaired this loom they damaged the whole side of my model X and it needed a full respray I requested they took the vehicle back at this point but you can not speak to anyone who cares or listens and had no choice but to have them spray the vehicle They NEVER want to help always looking for that way out I absolutely hate this company with a passion Great product idea with terrible business outfit Service from Tesla has made my life a misery for 3 years My car had constant issues It still groans and feels very unsafe They have replaced driveshafts multiple times wheels tyres drive units They still cannot tell me why the car feels unsafe and it s something I apparently have to deal with because it s within Tesla tolerance I hate this company and have evidence and feelings as to why Nobody should ever experience this in their life Do not ever buy one of these problematic uncomfortable vehicles

Title: I turned my vehicle in for body work and still don't have it back five months later due to Tesla not delivering a part
Content: I turned my vehicle in for body work on July 31 2023 It is now December 27 2023 It has been in a Tesla approved body shop since then waiting on parts to be delivered Here's the reason you should pay attention to I live in AUSTIN TX the GLOBAL HEADQUARTERS for Tesla and there is a 10 million square foot Gigafactory located here I have been paying 800 month for my vehicle which is being repaired at a Tesla authorized body shop that is adjacent to the leasing returns center on Pond Springs Road in Austin I have saved all my communication between the body shop and Tesla am still waiting on a SINGLE PART I will never ever ever ever buy or recommend a Tesla vehicle to anyone or procure another for myself Look to the traditional manufacturers as rapid chargers for all vehicles are being rolled out nationwide I know people complain when something goes wrong but I have given them ample time to do right and keep getting the run around after five months of paying them to not have a car It's crazy fun to drive and I appreciate how they jump started the EV revolution but the customer service is not worth it when you're paying for two cars at once and the lease return team constantly harasses you for not turning in your vehicle because Tesla can't deliver a part to finalize an insurance claim repair Terrible customer service at a minimum and gross negligence at most Spend your money elsewhere

Title: I don't know why people are dissing it
Content: I don't know why people are dissing it so much It is a relatively new brand and in a lot of countries poeple love tesla cars They are effectively transforming a whole industry and leading the way for many other market participants We are witnessing a technology revolution with them

Title: Incompetence beyond belief
Content: I recently had an incredibly frustrating experience with Tesla in the UK that compelled me to rethink my decision entirely The incompetence displayed in their communication process is beyond belief First and foremost the finance figures presented on their website did not align with the reality I faced a mysterious increase of 31 per month with zero explanation To add insult to injury the app requested exhaustive part exchange details only to inform me later that I couldn't part exchange my car because I was ordering a contract hire vehicle This lack of coherence left me questioning the entire transaction Attempting to communicate with Tesla over text messages proved almost laughable It felt like a pointless endeavor as I found myself endlessly repeating the same information without any resolution in sight If this is the level of customer service before taking delivery one can only imagine what the aftercare might entail Regrettably my experience has led to a complete loss of confidence in Tesla prompting me to cancel my order My advice to potential buyers think long and hard before diving into a relationship with this brand The pitfalls in communication and discrepancies in financial information are red flags that shouldn't be ignored

Title: This place is totally rubbish Dodgy
Content: This place is totally rubbish Dodgy Big looters I went to get my car checked My Tesla heating was not working And guy name Gary lied about getting my car fixed He ripped me of with 225 bill 5 minutes later I found out my car was not fixed it heating issue was still there I went back and I have asked the guy to refund my money back Because you could not fix my car You lied to me about fixing my car Problem is still there He refused to refund my money back So I would strongly suggest to avoid this place And they are not even Tesla specialist as advertised Totally fraud and dodgy Avoid this place

Title: HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE
Content: I love my Tesla but absolute hate the Tesla buying experience and Tesla customer service experience There literally is zero customer service I purchased a 2023 Model 3 which was in itself a very much technology driven experience which wouldn t be bad except that complete removal of the human element leaves one having to rely on unreliable sources to answer questions Currently I have been facing an issue with obtaining the documents I signed at purchase I asked the Tesla delivery person for copies at the time of delivery and was told they had no way to give me copies However I was assured that all of the documents would be uploaded and available via my Tesla account Well they aren't My insurance company is requiring a copy of the NC odometer disclosure statement showing the vehicle was new and the mileage at purchase Of course this document has not been uploaded When I try contacting my local showroom where I purchased the vehicle I get a voicemail saying no one is available to take the call and to leave a message and someone would return my call However the mailbox has been full for quite some time and I have been unable to leave a message When you call the national customer care number it asks for your zip code then routes you right back to your local showroom There is absolutely no customer service whatsoever I replied to the after sale survey and blasted them with very detailed responses of my experience and of course there has been no response to that The online chat is for sales only and the minute you ask about post sale issues the chat representative says they will have someone reach out to you and then they immediately end the chat Of course no one ever actually reaches out It is very sad to see a company with so much potential and such a great product being run in such an abysmal fashion with no care or concern after getting your money This is my first and last Tesla and advise anyone looking at purchasing one to stay away That is unless you simply do not care about customer service

Title: Severe Critique of Tesla Service Center Ålesund
Content: I regret to express my profound dissatisfaction with the Tesla Service Center in Ålesund Norway an experience that has compelled me to share my grievances in the hope of alerting potential Tesla buyers to the pitfalls they may encounter My interactions with the service center over the past few years have been nothing short of a nightmare On multiple occasions when I entrusted my vehicle to their care for servicing I received it back in a worse condition than when I initially handed it over It is disheartening that a company of Tesla's stature cannot fulfill its commitment to providing reliable and effective service One of the glaring issues I encountered was their blatant disregard for timelines and promises Time and again they made assurances they could not keep leaving me frustrated and disillusioned Their inability to adhere to deadlines not only inconvenienced me but also highlighted a lack of organizational competence Moreover the service center's understanding of technical issues and their subsequent resolution is questionable at best It is alarming that a company at the forefront of technological innovation fails to address fundamental problems within their service operations The repeated instances of returning my vehicle with more issues than initially reported indicate a systemic failure in their approach to quality assurance Equally disappointing is the woefully poor customer service Dealing with the Tesla Service Center in Ålesund has been the worst customer experience I have ever encountered The lack of empathy communication and accountability from their staff exacerbates the frustration and disappointment customers feel when facing issues with their vehicles In light of these experiences I can no longer endorse Tesla as a reliable and customer centric brand I strongly caution prospective buyers to reconsider their plans to invest in a Tesla vehicle The allure of cutting edge technology should not overshadow the fundamental aspects of customer service and reliability that are sorely lacking in my experiences with the Tesla Service Center in Ålesund

Title: Nothing but bad things
Content: We have a model Y long range Autopilot is the worst FYI we had a 7yrs old volvo v90 before and his autopilot was 1000 times better In a Tesla you cannot switch lanes with autopilot on it brakes out of nowhere is oversensitive Windows washers are detecting rain on a sunny day or normal weather conditions there is no possibility to deactivate them when using autopilot So when we drive on the motorway on a sunny day the windows are constantly getting washed We have 2 isofix seats for our children they are not detected so we also need to plug in the seatbelt if we don't want a sound playing the entire time Charging stations always are besides mc donalds or burger king When the lease for this car is over we will never have a Tesla again I wouldn't even want it for free

Title: We have a 2022 Model Y long range
Content: We have a 2022 Model Y long range We waited two months for a service appointment due to a malfunctioning A C The night before the appointment my wife drives the 2 5 hours to the nearest service center spends the night in a hotel and is there early for her 9am appointment She spends 15 minutes trying to find someone to speak with then 5 5 hours waiting for them to diagnose her car The manager finally tells her after she walked into the bay to actually find someone to speak to again that they will not be able to diagnose her car and will need to keep it for 5 more days When she asked to have a loaner he said no When she asked if she could be reimbursed for super charging fees to get there and back he said no When she asked if he could send a mobile team to us he said no When she asked if there was a number she could call to get some type of resolution he said no So now she s wasted two days and expenses and we still don t have a functioning a c with no means to get it fixed except do it all over again and hope for a better outcome

Title: I rented a Tesla for the weekend and it
Content: I rented a Tesla for the weekend and it was amazing No issues at all I was a bit skeptical due to the bad press but I must admit I loved the car it was my first time in a Tesla and it is indeed an experience Space age technology and a very smooth ride

Title: I loved my Tesla before I needed servicing
Content: I loved my Tesla When it works it s amazing comfortable fast stylish It was reliable But on Nov 4th 2023 I had my 12 volt replaced on my Model S They came to the house and replaced it in about 2 hours The guy never talked to me but then I got a message in my Tesla app saying I had to bring it in for service I thought that was strange having just seen the Tesla worker in my driveway Apparently he had stripped some bolt that the battery connects to the fuse box I bring it to Tesla on Dec 4th and the service department worker tells me oh so sorry you should not have come today we don t have the part and we don t even have a date of when it will arrive So I ask what part How much will it cost He said I have to replace my entire fuse box and it will cost over 800 Why am I being charged for the service workers actions I ve never even seen this bolt or fuse box he touched it and presumably damaged it and I have to pay for it So they rescheduled my appt to January 8th Yesterday my car is giving me an error Unable to drive voltage too low I reached out through the app because Tesla refuses to make it easy for customers to talk to factory employees and it s been almost 24 hours with no response Meanwhile I have a very expensive car sitting in my driveway that I can t even move it to a more convenient location Teslas customer service is the worst I ve ever dealt with when it comes to cars I was thinking of buying another one a couple months ago but seeing how they treat me through this ordeal is making me second guess

Title: Bought my Y a year ago and they didn t
Content: Bought my Y a year ago and they didn t explain what the Tesla offers However today I went and had the best customer service with ULYSIS He was very detailed in helping me with all the bell and whistles that the Y has Tesla is lucky to have him employed

Title: Worst customer service
Content: The problem is with my 6 months old Tesla Model Y After few months of driving a rattling sound developed in the car that comes from within a dashboard to the left of the steering wheel When i picked it up from the dealership I did not have that issue The car is still under warranty When i took it to the service to rotate tires and fix the issue the technician was able to reproduce the issue within couple of minutes driving the car They sent a message the same day stating that the car was ready and the rattle noise is a normal sound of that particular part I told them that I did not have that noise upon picking up the new car from the dealership and now i get this sound They refused to fix it and continue stating that it is a normal sound I have lot of friends that have Teslas same and different models none of them have this 'normal' noise I did some research on this and lot of users reported this issue online Some of them got it fixed by the service When i brought it up to the service manager and asked why am i being discriminated since it has been fixed for some in the past he hung up the phone on me When i tried to call back they recognized my number and put me on hold right away I was on hold for 60 minutes then they just disconnected the call I paid over 60k for the car that i hate driving since it sounds like an old carriage while riding on every little bump There is a way to fix this Someone recorded a great video how to do that but this is something that should be covered by the warranty and not something that each driver would have to do I could not insert a link here but posts about the issue and resolution can be found if you search for 'teslamotorsclub that notorious driver side dash rattle'Would i recommend anyone buying a tesla anymore Hell no Service center Address 3371 Brunswick Pike 100 Lawrence Township NJ 08648

Title: If there is a Zero star I would mark
Content: If there is a Zero star I would mark zero instead of 1 After I confirmed the delivery date and time for the car I then proceed to upload the insurance info no issue When the message of PAY NOW TO AVOID DELAY IN DELIVERY I then proceed to link my bank account Plaid linked the account except I could not pay the app keeps looping me back to pay now I keep going through the process to confirm Plaid has my bank account info Delivery was scheduled for Saturday at 4pm I started the banking process on Monday By Wednesday I walked into Tesla in Las Vegas told the Tesla rep that Tesla app is muy stupido he looked at me and said I would not called it stupid He then asked me to wait till 24 to 48 hours perhaps Plaid has issue Otherwise I can go get a certified check Today just got a message saying delivery was cancelled and next delivery date will be next Saturday This is not acceptable since I had to buy an emergency flight ticket oversea to arrive to Vegas so the transaction can be fullfilled What happened if next week delivery was rescheduled again Would be all fair Tesla refunds my deposit money so I can go on with my life Currently Tesla car generates BAD ENERGY

Title: Absolute con
great car BUT
Content: overall it s a great car tesla X love it sm good for carrying a lot of people and has bunch of room i have a big complaint though the side doors drip water onto the seats when it s raining when you open the doors then the water fall right onto the seat that you were planning on sitting in sometimes it s a bunch of water sometimes it s just a little bit but either way very frustrating this is a big flaw in the design in my opinion did they not think of that again i love it but also very frustrating

Title: Model 3 Tesla is the worse car ever
Content: Tesla is the worst car ever Despite some built in safety features the 2022 Tesla Model 3 was a nightmare to drive for a rental or to buy for the following reasons 1 I would not pay 75k for a car that is terribly noisy to drive because the seals around the windows do not work Worst than my 20 years convertible Mercedes Lexus and Toyota I have or had in my life 2 In addition it is not the most friendly and intuitive car as Tesla believed they have manufactured I had an opportunity to rent a Tesla on my trip to Texas for a house hunting trip The Hertz rental company offered me a Tesla for a week at a very reasonable price I thought Wow how lucky can I get Wrong They had no one to give me a quick 5 min lesson on how to start or operate the car They handed me a scan code for me to download the operating manual to my phone and tried to figure things out on my own Ok so it was not as intuitive as they think It took me half an hour to figure out how to turn the car on and maneuver through their navigation system and where to find all the buttons to operate this car 3 Tesla charging stations were a night mare compares to high gasoline price we had to pay in California As a new comer to Texas I had no idea where I was going let alone which area is safe in the early morning or late at night to go and find these stations to get the car charged up Also once I found a near by supercharging station it took me over an hour to charge the first full power at 34 cents a kwh that's over 18 for a full battery which allowed me to make 2 round trips from Houston to Humble with a about 8 power left to make you nervous enough to start driving to a charing station This equates to about 3 full hours drive The 2nd charge only took about 20 minutes for me to fill up the battery to return the car on the way to the airport The only available super charging station was actually the Tesla Customer Service building about 20 min round trip out from the George Bush Airport That was fine until I found out that the max level I could only charge at this station is 80 Ok at 3AM trying to return the car and get to the airport to make my 5AM flight I was not about to drive around to find another chargimg station I explained this to Hertz but I don't know if they charged me 35 for not returning the car with full battery power I am still waiting for my final bills from Hertz

Title: worst customer service EVER
Content: nice car but when it breaks let the nightmare begin you have to book via the app no one will talk to you you message for an update no one ever answers You look for a phone number when you eventually find one and listen to copious menus you speak to someone who knows nothing will not help will not escalate it I went to the local branch in Crawley service reception know nothing and say they cannot help When you ask to speak to a supervisor there is no one who will talk to you It has been 4 days since I placed the service request and I know NOTHING more than 4 days ago Utterly useless

Title: Sales team really needs to learn facts
Content: Their sales team really needs to learn either to say I don't know or to learn what is correct information for each state if there are any difference We got one after another misinformation only to find out that all we were told was wrong after we put 30k downpaymet and went to pickup our brand new Model Y 1 Rushed us into making reservation online without promo code that we had saying that all can be rectified later It couldn't same person that told us it could said I'm sorry we can't add promo code now unless we are willing to lose those 250 we placed for reservation so we lost perk they offered at that time 6 months of free Supercharge 2 Said we will get state tax deducted from our price That was not true When we said it's not true so we will be paying interest on full amount he said we will get it when they deliver the car Again NOT TRUE You get everything when you get your tax return Other EVs deduct full amount from the price point just fyi 3 Said insurance bought through Tesla is about 180 a month it's well over 200 à4 Never explained the difference between owner and driver on the app and it is such a pain in a neck if you set up person incorrectly Owner whoever made reservation has access and smooth connection to everything driver secondary person who joined via link this may as well me main driver of the car has to have card ready at all times and can't see charging stats just aomw of thw things feom the top of my head just keep that I mind I know their employees are burned out but come oooonnnnn Elon Musk hire more people who can actually dedicate the time to answer truthfully customers' questions I was under the impression that sales people at Tesla don't need to do sleezy work of a salesman because car sells itself but I feel more swindled than ever in my life Second car will definitely be some other seller no way we are going through this nonsense again

Title: Worst customer service ever
Content: I like the model3 but Tesla have the worst customer service I have ever experienced The App is useless nobody responds to any messages and you cannot get hold of anyone on the phone There is essentially no customer service My recent experience started by booking an appointment on the app to have the MOT done on my model 3 When I arrived after some confusion I was told that they did not do MOT s I was told to go to a local MOT place I then had to book my MOT and wait another 3 days The MOT place was very good Car failed on a couple of tyres and a tyre pressure sensor Returned back to Tesla for them to fix it Again confusion Eventually the accepted my car It has now been 4 days including a weekend no information or update and no response to messages on the app There is officially no number to call them on Eventually called road side assistance who were no help they said I would get a call back but that has not happened I will essentially have to get drive to the service centre to find out what is going on and when I can expect my Tesla to be fixed What a complete joke

Content: We have a model 3 And model S The cars are decent as long as you are not experiencing troubles As soon as you need customer service or want to make claims regarding fault brace yourself for a roller coaster ride of Tesla claiming no responsibility I must say that Elon Musk's political stance on the Palestine issue and his ability to not being able to read the room and showing his unsolicited support to Israels genocide of Palestinian people makes me want to get rid of both my Teslas I was planning to sell my Tm3 before the five year warranty runs out next year and the S has so many hiccups now that we either need to scrap it or sell it to someone interested in fixing it Either way no new Teslas on us just because I can't support a brand supporting genocide
