Content: Waited 3 months for changing a windshield basically because they have a monopoly on spare parts and nobody else does it and charged me 240 euros more for it than the inicial price There was an approximative cost 3 months ago that I agreed to 895 euros and 0 costs for labour to mount it I was like well it is already expensive enough so I guess they include labour costs in the windshield cost or something Today after repair I receive final invoice which is 240 euros more 2 types of special glue which apparently they did not know they were gonna use and labour costs So total for a windshield 1100 something euros and 3 months of waiting It is a bit insolent and hard to believe they did not know there were gonna be labour costs for replacing a windshield It is the modus operandi of a conman from a small time garage repair dude not of an international corporation like tesla What did you expect the work to be done for free by robots and in the meantime decided to give the work to real humans who need to get paid Such a shameful act I expect Tesla to contact me for a resolution but so far nothing received Like all businesses very quick to take your money but very difficult for a refund or have someone discuss the issue about it So far the worst after buying service I've experienced for a car

Title: Poor customer service
Content: I recently purchased a Tesla Model Y Performance MYP and while my initial experiences with the car were promising and exciting I've been nothing short of frustrated with the service I received On the night of October 17th I encountered system errors in the Tesla app Unfortunately I didn't think much of it at the time but my world came crashing down the next morning when I tried to get my kids to school and head to work only to discover that my brand new EV had completely shut down I couldn't even open the doors In desperation I contacted Tesla's roadside assistance who promptly towed my car to the service center During that call I was informed that the issue was likely a faulty V12 battery and I was assured that they would quickly replace it allowing me to get back on the road the same day Hopeful I checked in at the service center and was told that there was an isolated event that needed attention and my car would be ready for pickup on October 19th They provided me with a loaner and I thought my woes would be short lived Unfortunately the nightmare had only just begun The next day I received an update informing me that my car was still under diagnostic and the pickup date was rescheduled to October 20th This pattern continued The date was pushed further to October 23rd and as time passed my frustration grew When I asked for details about the issue I was informed that they needed to replace the drive unit which sounded serious Despite my protests and concerns they assured me it would be a quick fix since the car was already partially disassembled and they were awaiting the part's delivery As the week progressed the pickup date kept shifting with no end in sight I was shocked that a company known for its technological prowess couldn't seem to track their part shipments effectively On Friday I received multiple messages detailing the service progress and they promised to have my car ready by 6 pm However my excitement was short lived when I received a call at 6 45 pm informing me that they were working overtime to complete the quality control checks I expressed my frustration explaining that I couldn't just wait around for an indefinite period The person on the phone understood my concerns but suggested I could pick up the car over the weekend or the following week if I was too busy This was frustrating especially as I had already been forced to cancel a road trip due to the limitations of the loaner vehicle which could only cover 200 miles per day Finally I received a text at 7 pm stating that my car was ready and I was provided with contactless pickup instructions However this was marred by the threat that I would be charged for the parking spot for my car and the loaner if I didn't pick up within 24 hours which directly contradicted what I had been told on the phone When I picked up my car on Saturday I was greeted by a dirty interior with shoe marks on the liners and greases on the inside of driver's side door This was a stark contrast to my previous experiences with car services where protective measures were taken to ensure the vehicle's cleanliness Overall the entire experience left me extremely frustrated and dissatisfied My brand new Tesla Model Y Performance was rendered inoperable for a substantial period of time and I was provided with no clear explanation for the issue Additionally the service I received fell well below expectations and it was evident that little care was taken to ensure the customer's satisfaction and the car's cleanliness This experience has left a bitter taste in my mouth and I hope that Tesla can improve their service standards to match the caliber of their products

Title: My experience with Tesla
Content: My experience with Tesla particularly in purchasing my Model 3 was nothing short of amazing From the moment I set foot in the showroom I was met with a level of service and innovation that exceeded my expectations The initial step of configuring my Model 3 online was a breeze Tesla's user friendly interface allowed me to tailor every aspect of my car to my preferences from color to interior finishes and even performance features This customization made me feel like I was truly getting a unique vehicle that matched my personality and needs The in person experience at the Tesla showroom was equally impressive The staff was incredibly knowledgeable about the product providing detailed insights into the Model 3's performance capabilities safety features and the technology integrated into the car They patiently answered all of my questions making the entire process informative and enjoyable The test drive was a highlight of the experience Feeling the Model 3's instant acceleration responsive handling and the regenerative braking system left me in awe It's not just a car it's an exhilarating driving experience When it came to the purchase Tesla's transparency in pricing was refreshing There were no hidden fees or surprises and the absence of haggling was a welcome departure from the traditional car buying process The online ordering and payment system were straightforward and efficient Delivery day was another standout moment The Tesla team ensured that my Model 3 was impeccably clean and ready for its new home They took the time to walk me through the car's features making sure I felt confident in operating the vehicle and understanding the full scope of its capabilities The Model 3 itself has been a revelation The electric range performance and technology integration are unparalleled The instant torque and quiet operation are addictive and the Autopilot features have made long journeys a breeze Charging the car at home or on the Supercharger network is convenient and I've saved significantly on fuel costs Overall my experience with Tesla and the Model 3 has been a transformative journey It's not just a car it's a symbol of cutting edge technology sustainability and innovation Tesla's commitment to the electric vehicle revolution combined with their dedication to customer service has made me a loyal advocate I can confidently say that my Model 3 purchase was an amazing and rewarding decision and I look forward to a future filled with sustainable and thrilling driving experiences

Title: Tesla tried to rob me for 15 thousand for a minor maintanence issue
Content: Do not trust Tesla customer service for any mechanical errors After my car wouldn't charge I contacted Tesla they kept insisting I needed to replace the primary car battery on my Model S with only 67k miles This replacement would've costed 15k I took it to a 3rd party mechanic they informed me nothing was wrong with my primary battery it was my secondary battery that actually needed to be replaced The secondary battery only costed 389 So they tried to rob me of 15 thousand dollars along with my battery because when they replace the batteries at Tesla they keep the old battery in order to repair resale it which they only would've had to resell not fix in this situation It's a scam do not trust these thieves I can't imagine how many people have had to pay full price to replace their primary car battery for a problem that could've been solved for a few hundred dollars P S I left this comment anonymously because I don't trust them anymore and I don't want them to cause problems to my car remotely because they have the ability to do so

Content: Tesla has the absolute worst customer service You can never reach anyone I just had a traumatic accident and because their agent didn't know their job protocol my car wasn't towed until 730 a m from 1 a m and they refused to give me a loaner car so I couldn't get home A loaner car is standard practice I had a Lexus before this car and they treated the consumer with care I was stranded in Newberg New York begging lift and Uber drivers to please don't cancel my ride to Manhattan where I live Finally at 830 a m someone would accept the ride I was up well over 24 hours and the team's repair shop was even worse Then people wonder why others snap Imagine being alone on the New York State Thruway with no light on that highway Did I mention there are no lights it is pitch black and it's a highway at 1 a m hoping someone doesn't kill you while you look at your flat tire on the side of the road or just sitting in your car emotional distress and it was all because of their incompetent first roadside agent and no cares to help or fix the problem

Title: Great car great charging great service
Content: I love the car and the charging experience and the service has been great I have a 2022 Model Y which from my perspective drives like a sports car It isn't a cushy ride so it's not for everyone The performance however is great This is my third electric car and by far the best as the first two were what I would call first generation vehicles with around 100 miles of range good for regional use only This one is fantastic for road trips I went from scrambling to find CHAdeMO chargers that were not broken and would accept my payment to the amazing ease of backing in plugging in and watching the volts scream in to the battery at rates I'd never seen before No fussing with my phone or a payment method it just starts and works exactly as anyone would wish In California I can attest to plentiful functioning and comfortable charging stops The range at freeway speeds is not as good as the EPA number but it is far better than my previous cars and is really all I want in the seat in one stint anyway that is about three hours I also love the storage capacity of this car There seems to be no end to the places I can stash things and the main cargo area is huge With the back seats folded down it perfectly holds a twin size mattress pad which I've utilized twice to camp out at RV sites on a longer road trip Get the plug adapters for the outlets used at RV sites and you can also get a free full charge overnight Sweet The service has been great although I haven't had major issues to really test that Firstly when I bought it one of the wheel covers disappeared during a drive They came to the house and replaced it for free Then I called about tire rotation They came to the house and did it in the driveway Amazing And I have a narrow cramped driveway Oil changes and tune ups Yeah good riddance to those And with the car leveraging the generator more than the brakes to slow it down even the brake pads seem unlikely to need service What's left Apparently only tires and washer fluid My only gripes would be the occasional discomfort of the ride and the fact that the wheels are wider than the tires Take a glance at most Teslas' wheels on the curb side and you'll see the ugly mess that results from aluminum upon concrete Apart from that though this is by far the best car I've owned at 63 and my experience with Tesla has been great

Title: I hope that nobody is going to busy a
Content: I hope that nobody is going to busy a tesla Car I recently bought a brand new Car and i used it only for 3 weeks and the power steering did not work while i was in the road This is really dangerous especially of you are on the highway Ik hoop dat niemand een Tesla auto gaat bezetten Ik heb onlangs een gloednieuwe auto gekocht en ik heb hem slechts 3 weken gebruikt en de stuurbekrachtiging werkte niet terwijl ik onderweg was Dit is echt gevaarlijk vooral als je op de snelweg bent

Title: Tesla power steering and customer care failure
Content: Had a Model Y for less than 2 months and the power steering has failed while I was driving Technician has attended to say it should not be driven and arranged for it to be towed to Manchester Service Centre Not been able to drive the car for a week already and have no idea how long it will be until my car is returned Tesla say that they don't have any loan cars available and will let me know when they get one I need this car to do my job All comms via the stupid App Really poor customer service Had I known I would never have chosen a Tesla not to mention the clearly poor build quality Premium brand my rse Stay away

Title: Good luck
Content: I have been trying g to add a vehicle on the tesla app Uploaded all documents it s stated 3 5 days 2 weeks later re uploaded documents again but still no vehicle or access on the tesla app Very poor customer service no communication or updates No one really knows what s happening Extremely disappointing Good Luck

Title: No support at all
Content: Bought a used M3 Trying to add it to my account for a week now No support at all Try to find an email to contact incredible How can one buy a new car after such experience

Title: Do business with people Don t do business with a computer
Content: I just returned a Tesla model S long range off a three year lease I can put aside that you never can speak to anyone when you have a problem with the car They always give you a month before they will fix it and after about 2 3 weeks fix it through the internet Seems like they should have done it immediately Had a flat tire They texted me that I had to agree to three things 1 They needed to tow it to a repair shop 2 To fix it 121 00 plus tax 3 If unfixable 320 to replace it I had to agree to all three I said No They texted me back Good Luck Had it fixed locally for 25 with a 10 tip Had to replace both front tires to turn it in at 220 each locally not 320 each Good luck to them when every car manufacturer is developing better cars than them Porsche BMW and even Hyundai

Title: Not Your Typical New Car Purchase
Content: Update There has been some progress it's not the usual in person new car purchase process that I am used to but Tesla staff eventually did address my concerns My experience with Tesla's customer service has been extremely frustrating I've tried to contact them multiple times for help with my purchase but each time I was hung up on within a minute This lack of support during the purchase process makes me concerned about the quality of the service I'll receive after the sale

Title: Tesla horrible customer service
Content: Tesla Keri s disappointing Not only are their products sub par but their customer service is the absolute pits I ve owned testa cars for over 6 years and I m quite disappointed in how they age badly Now I can see that the Wall Connector Home charging station is also the pits I purchased my first one when I bought my Tesla model Y Three months after the 4 year warranty expired the charger stopped working When I contacted Tesla about servicing it I was told they do not service it and that I would need to buy another I went out and bought another for 500 and paid an electrician 500 to install it Unfortunately the unit turned out to be defective I called their tech support and they had me troubleshoot it and told me it was defective and they would send me a replacement I asked them if it could be expedited because charging my 2 electric cars at a PMU lic charger is twice as costly as charging at home They said they would request it Eight days later I received the replacement I followed the instructions to install the replacement only to find out it didn t work I called their tech supply again open only 9am 4pm Monday to Friday meeting I need to take time off work to do so only to be told this one was defective as well and would have ti be replaced again When I told them I did not want to wait another 8 days to receive a replacement and asked to speak with a supervisor they said one would get back to me in 25 48 hours It s now been 4 days and still no call back from a supervisor Do yourself a favor and stay away from Tesla as a company in general Their customer service is just as arrogant as the owner of the company and you will be suffering owning their products all along If you already own one do yourself a favor of selling it before the market price drops and you re stuck with a dud

Title: VERY Poor Tesla Solar customer service
Content: VERY Poor Tesla Solar customer service we have solar in two houses and it stopped generating electricity Called Tesla 12 times finally they admitted they pushed new software version that generated an error in our system No remote fix Yes appointment in two weeks Such a bad experience I will never do Tesla in ANY of my homes and good they are dropping solar

Title: Buying from Tesla has been the worst
Content: Buying from Tesla has been the worst experience I have ever had and I am in the automotive industry I was forced to pay fees before I could get the final numbers I struggled to get documents needed for my credit union Then when it came to pick up they needed a few days with my new car but then I only had three days to pick up or loose my money and I only had certain hours and no morning hours for pick up Worst experience ever

Title: Left with non functioning home charger
Content: I reported a fault on my home charger which is still in warranty on 21st August After spending a couple of hours exchanging emails and testing various suggestions made by the support team I was eventually asked for my shipping address It was not made clear what was being shipped but I presumed it was a replacement charger In the 3 weeks since then nothing has arrived and my requests for a tracking number has been ignored I love my Tesla Model X but am coming to dislike the company due to its poor customer service Everything has to be done their way however inconvenient that happens to be Just getting a copy invoice for a service visit is hard work They say you can download it from the app but not from my app Good car let down by multiple poor customer service experience

Title: I ve left one star as you can t leave
Content: I ve left one star as you can t leave zero Tesla Glasgow service centre is an absolute disgrace of a place the worst workmanship I ve ever seen Replaced faulty parts with damaged parts and not fitted correctly also Damaged bodywork and interior trims and try to deny it And repeatedly having to go back for the same problem Absolutely useless service centre with a workshop supervisor that constantly lies

Title: Poor QC process and customer service
Content: I purchased a 2023 Tesla Model Y in May 2023 The vehicle had so many blemishes on it at the point of delivery it seemed like it was a used vehicle I expressed my concerns to the dealership where I purchased my vehicle and they took action in addressing my concerns The problem is after Tesla had my vehicle for over a month all of my concerns were not addressed and I noticed more issues with my vehicle that the dealership assured me were rectified I also had Black Tesla badges on the frunk liftgate and my vehicle was returned to me with silver badges I wanted a Tesla and now I am questioning my decision on this purchase because I am not happy or satisfied with the results For the amount of money spent on this vehicle this is unacceptable and I believe the QC process is of poor quality Because of this I no longer want this vehicle or any other Tesla for that matter I purchased my Model Y from Tesla Motors at 1323 Motor City Drive Colorado Springs CO 80905

Title: The worst customer service I have ever
Content: The worst customer service I have ever experienced from any retail product It is almost fraudulent how bad the customer service with Tesla is If anything goes wrong that doesn't include service Good luck trying to reach someone you are most likely on your own When you call the customer service number you wait 30 minutes minimum just to be connected to a below average customer service agent that gives you a below average experience from the start My advice is stay away

Title: Model Y
Content: Model YI recently purchased a 2023 Tesla Model Y and my initial excitement quickly turned into disappointment After only 10 days of ownership I've noticed a significant issue with the battery not holding its charge as expected This problem has not only inconvenienced me but also raised concerns about the vehicle's reliability To address this issue I attempted to schedule an appointment with Tesla's service center Unfortunately my frustration deepened when I discovered that the earliest available appointment isn't until October 16th leaving me with a malfunctioning car for an extended period There is an appointment next week in Merritt Island but given the battery problems driving an hour away is simply not a viable option This entire experience has left me thoroughly disappointed with the quality of service and support provided by Tesla As a customer I expected prompt attention to my concerns especially when dealing with a significant issue like a malfunctioning battery Instead I find myself without a reliable vehicle for an extended period which is unacceptable At this point I am seriously considering parting ways with my 2023 Model Y and exploring other vehicle options I had high hopes for Tesla and its electric vehicles but this experience has left me questioning the wisdom of my purchase and the company's commitment to customer satisfaction

Title: Tesla a company you cannot trust
Content: Signed upp for a Grey Tesla Modely Y in June with delivery in July Aug In mid August Tesla calls and explains that the color is no longer availible I accept a change in color after a week It is now in mid july and Tesla has not even reverted with a new booking confirmation

Title: Endless problems with battery
Content: Endless problems with battery really regretting buying Would get future electric vehicle from established and trustworthy manufacturer

Title: I went to trade my LR4
Content: I went to trade my LR4 Inwas given a quote for my trade in They made me put down 250 non refundable then I found the trade in value offered for the second time to be very low I find it unfair and disheartening that Tesla requires customers to pay an upfront fee of 250 before providing them with a trade in value Furthermore the inconsistency in the initial trade in value quote which changed from 19000 to 15000 within just three weeks raises concerns about the transparency of Tesla's valuation process I kindly request that Tesla reconsider its policy of charging customers upfront for trade in assessments It would greatly improve the customer experience if Tesla could provide trade in value estimates before requiring any financial commitment or ordering a car This change would not only be fairer to customers like me but also align with industry standards

Title: Lousy service and no contact
Content: Had my car to service as some heat problems made the car freeze dead It arrived at tesla with a towtruck I had been in contact with Tesla they had it for 1 5 weeks it took one week for Tesla to contact me about the solution which was accepted yesterday I picked it up with error on the low voltage battery and my trunk does not open anymore So basically I can once again spend hours waiting for Tesla can fix my car I can't get in touch with anyone else than their central support Get a life and let us talk directly to the service center without using an app

Title: The Joys of Buying a Tesla
Content: Would have given 0 Star rating if possible Delivery non existent Support non existent Electronic controls have a mind of their own Be careful purchasing a Tesla

Title: Model 3 Long Range RWD
Content: I recently bought one of the new Model 3 Long Range RWD cars that entered the UK My previous cars were a BMW M140i and a BMW 330e Touring MSport I simply LOVE the Model 3 its wonderful in so many ways The speed comfort abd economy are brilliant I do not have a home charger so do all my charging on the public EV charging network This car handles it perfectly I get 340 miles out of a full charge 0 80 charge at a Tesla Super Charger takes only 18 minutes I am a salesman and travel all over southern England with the occasional trip monthly from Portsmouth to Sheffield or Leeds I just charge on the way back and the car gains 50 before I even have time to drink my coffee The act of charging actually helps me plan my day do my notes and be a little more organised The Tesla build quality is brilliant and the features inside are ten times better than the BMW's I have always had Choosing this Model 3 over the BMW i4 was an easy choice The Tesla performance and the access to the Supercharger network esp with no home charger makes this purchase an absolute no brainer Thank you Tesla Thank you Elon

Title: The worst supply chain management of
Content: The worst supply chain management of all car brands They don t have any idea where their cars are and have estimated delivery dates not even close to actual delivery Ordered model y in June when estimated delivery was mid July Then it was pushed to august Then beginning of september Beginning of august we decided to cancel that and order one from their stocks hoping that would come earlier estimation started with end august and now it is end september How hard could it be to handle your own stocks Final invoice states a delivery date of August 29 but still no car Nothing makes sense with Tesla delivery process Don t treat people like they are fool if you can not deliver a car in 1 5 month No one answers or probably has any knowledge about their internal supply chain either The worst car buyung experience No one should expect to have any model y earlier than 2 5 3 months and that is how you shall inform your customers Not with a lie stating that some estimation says in 1 1 5 month

Title: Really poor service
Content: They make it so difficult to buy a new car The website just doesn't work and is full of bugs The information is wrong and the offers are not real The after sales service is extremely poor and they just stop answering emails

Title: Scheduled way in advance no part there no notification
Content: I live an hour away from the nearest service center first problem not enough of them I had a cracked rim and scheduled the appointment 2 5 weeks in advance including detailed description of the problem model and location the part wasn't there when I arrived so had to spend 8 hours at the shop By the way I checked with them both two days before and the day before and they said the part would arrive the day of my service

Title: This problem was fixed six times
Content: This problem was fixed six times Tesla never acknowledges it is an on going issue Never had such bad service on a new car When driving the screen displays only a static Tesla No cars around me are pictured I have no screen information about my blind spot Cruise control and Auto Pilot are disabled Lane wandering warnings are disabled Turn signal when changing lanes will not turn off automatically The speed limit is not displayed The ding which sounds when the traffic light changes to green is disabled Worst of all the warning sound for a possible front rear collision is disabled

Title: Tesla brand in decline
Content: Tesla brand in decline The quality of build of the cars is poor at best Mine has had 15 issues in three years Finding available super charger points now is a challenge Shame really but tesla have taken their eye of the ball

Title: Poor Tesla service
Content: A technician came to my house to fix my windshield wiper fluid that won t come out He claimed that he wasn t there to technically fix it he was there to assess the problem Ok great so I made a second appointment for another technician to come to my house and that technician said I had to actually bring the car to Tesla because he couldn t figure it out So attempt 3 failed because they still couldn t figure it out so I had to leave my car another day with them I made this appointment 2 months ago and I dropped my car off first thing in the morning I ve never had such poor automobile services in my life and I m almost 50 years old Whenever I ve had an appointment for a vehicle no matter how complicated I ve always had my vehicle at the end of the day Communication is horrible They communicate through the app and when I ask questions they don t get back to me until awhile after The estimate was sent through the app nobody called to explain anything and I didn t even understand what was being done to fix it Unprofessional impersonal and poor communication

Title: Stay away from the insurance
Content: Stay away from the insurance Purchased a new non tesla car and the won't insure it no grace period till I can get new coverage 15 30 day underwriting period in CA waiting to see if they refund me the balance of my policy or if I need to wait 2 hours to talk to someone to pursue So now I drive a rental car with added insurance while my new car sits in my garage

Title: Horrible Customer Services and Warranty
Content: I purchased a Tesla Model 3 Performance 2022 for 70 000 after taxes in June 2022 Unfortunately Tesla recently reduced the price by approximately 15 7 causing my purchase to result in a loss as my car is now worth less than the new price When I attempted to sell the vehicle I received incredibly low offers ranging from 29 000 to 36 000 resulting in a loss of around 50 in just one year This indicates that the car's value will be exceedingly low in the market in the coming years Furthermore the warranty service provided by Tesla is terrible I scheduled an appointment due to a noise in the front but they informed me that it was normal and that the noise started a month ago When I tried to go to another dealer they wanted to charge me 167 because Tesla does not cover unexpected vehicle noises under warranty As a result I am now stuck with a 2022 car with noises that I cannot claim because the warranty does not cover it I suggest waiting for a better EV vehicle with a decent warranty that prioritizes taking care of customers over making money Tesla does not provide loan cars making it impossible to do any kind of DIY mechanic work since they are the only ones controlling the parts After all this I decided to sell the car and stop supporting a company that doesn't support the customer

Title: Extremely poor technical support
Content: MY Tesla car is only 5 months old and under warranty For the last 3 4 months I am having issues with its charging and the maps I must have reported these issues about a dozen times and once or twice a week I get answer by virtual assistant that the problem is being investigated or I am asked to give more and more information Why can't they ask me to leave the car at their local service station and check it out There is no one to talk to or arrange a call back from local service department despite my requests I have even offered to return the car and take my money back mid they cannot solve the problems i am facing It is very poor technical support from Tesla I am also about to raise an official complaint to Tesla before looking at my legal options

Title: The best roadside service on a planet Elon Musk Style
Content: I can not wait to sell my Model X and all due to their customer service I have absolutely loved everything there was about my car However their service is such trash garbage at this point I am leaving I have been patient for 8 years No time to waste anymore no more words to say Tesla you are beyond the worst human being alive You are a disgrace Shame on you I was stuck an hour away from home with my wife and 3 children asking for help because I had a flat tire It s 11 o clock at night dark cold in the middle of a highway pulled over on a shoulder Wasted 30 minutes on the phone with roadside assistance and then was hung up on or the phone call dropped No one attempted to call me back 3 days later I was blamed for not calling back myself as their excuse not to reimburse 530 for the towing I had to pay out of pocket and 141 for a taxi to get my kids safely home I used to have BMW prior 2016 and I remember their service was absolutely amazing Perhaps I am getting older just turned 40 last year and service is far more important than car features I might like in Tesla over competitors Don t know yet which direction brand I will go with but one thing is for sure and that is to run far away from Tesla Bye

Title: Trashy after sales services and follow up
Content: Trashy after sales services and follow up It is as if after they get their commission they can t be bothered with you Also their quotations are ridiculous and unreasonable For the same repair that i requested for Tesla quoted me 650 but another supplier quoted me 150 They literally marked up 400 just to widen their profit margin I like the car a lot but their service and repair team are a joke Labeling them horrible is an understatement

Title: Abysmal service
Content: Abysmal service Car planned in for upgrades and new low voltage battery originally 1 day 2 days later still no car Tesla update the App when they can be bothered Estimated completion date is 15 00 yesterday Talk to advisors who don't give a s t Never buy a Tesla poorest service delivered ever They want to update on a messaging service but they can't keep it updated themselves Only answer I receive is 'you can keep the loaner car until complete' I paid for the courtesy car NEVER BUY TESLA

Title: ZERO stars would be more accurate
Content: Tesla and FSD unsafe at any speed

Title: Tesla solar is a scam
Content: Tesla solar is a scam Stay far away from anything Tesla

Title: I was excited about getting a Tesla
Content: I was excited about getting a Tesla I asked for a return call which came quickly I paid my 250 fee opportunity to buy the car I was directed to the app and told it would be a breeze to fill out and I could get my car in a couple of days as it was in inventory and I was paying cash I was told I could call back if there were any issues The app rejected the correct insurance company code it asked for I called back innocently thinking someone would help me Nothing Five days of nothing I started a new order Someone called me oh yes sorry there was a mix up on your last order we will call you back and straighten everything out Four more days Given a new offer with a friends referral bonus that was more expensive than without the bonus Given extremely unclear explanations for things on the level of childish cover ups making dogs eating homework sound more real Decided I better read some reviews before spending on this Glad I did I never have seen so many 1 star reviews wishing they could be 0 I am older and experience has shown me that one of the worst feelings you can have is being cheated and lied to No matter how good the drive of the car might be I could see that it would take me to that feeling sooner or later as it has so many other people Saying that Tesla is making the world less contaminated is not accurate Their way of doing business is highly contaminating lacking humanity and integrity financial responsibility and training people to avoid genuine customer interface This is the Brave New World and it is not a pretty one This is not to be admired because it makes someone rich and famous it is sad because the wiz bang technology is being sold by cutting all the corners off of decent looking people in the eye relationships I am going to calm my lust for the vehicle for the moment I will lose my 250 and not be buying a Tesla

Title: Poor mechanical engineering and highway robbery service costs
Content: Poor mechanical engineering After 110 000 km about 69k miles I have already had to replace a wheel bearing trunk mechanism wheel brake rotor pads and now a steering rack on my Model S In all cases the costs were outrageous more than 3 times what they would cost on other vehicles 6200 for a steering rack after 69k miles Service CANNOT be reached on the phone and roadside assistance is useless I am recommending that my friends not buy Teslas

Title: Best electric car manufacturer period
Content: Tesla model 3 is the best option for those looking for an affordable electric car And I am also looking forward to the FSD update to see what the Tesla team can do The news that I get from Twitter is quite impressive and inspiring

Title: Bought a new Tesla with significant issues Tesla doesn't care
Content: I purchased a new Tesla Model 3 in July 2023 and quickly learned that Tesla has some of the worst customer service I have ever experienced First Tesla doesn't let you test drive your car before accepting delivery so you just have to hope the car you're purchasing from them doesn't have any significant issues I drove 3 hours away to accept delivery of my Model 3 and on the way home I noticed that the cameras would crash at times disengaging Autopilot and the GPS would freeze while this was happening as well After a few days with the car I realized this issue was occurring whenever I hit bumps in the road and I scheduled a service appointment The Service Center claims there is a bad connection internal to the car computer and it must be replaced However they said that the computer is hard to come by and have no ETA on when it may arrive It's been over 2 weeks now since my service appointment and the Service Center has not been able to provide any updates or an ETA on the replacement computer From what I've read online some have waited 3 months for a replacement So now I have a brand new car that half works and Tesla could not care less Quality control is obviously lacking for a car to have been delivered with this issue in the first place but the fact that Tesla continues to churn new cars out and doesn't care to stock parts for vehicles it has already sold says a lot about how much they care about their customers

Title: This website is not good they are scam
Content: This website is not good they are scam website

Title: If you're thinking of installing solar DON'T USE TESLA
Content: If you're thinking of installing solar and in the same thought the word Tesla pops up you are making a HUGE mistake We made the mistake of leasing some years ago before financiers were financing purchases with Solar City They were a bad enough company but when Tesla bailed them out it went from bad to abysmal We had an inverter go out for over 2 months so we lost a bunch of generating revenue Would Tesla even acknowledge this let alone give us a rebate on the monthly lease we were paying them LOL you jest surely THEY DON'T CARE AT ALL Now we have a communications bridge issue While it's not costing us money as the broken inverter did it's annoying that their product is broken and again they don't care Promises of callbacks come and go contacting them is torturous and emails get ignored If we could get rid of the system and Tesla we would HORRIBLE company Run away as fast as you can from Tesla especially for solar They may care about car owners but they sure don't give a rip about solar customers

Title: The upshot
Content: The upshotI recently left a one star review on the Model 3 based on my experience as a drunk passenger in a rental under the worst possible set of circumstances so I feel I would be remiss if I did not tell the other side of the story If you're the one driving it's brilliant It's powerful and has excellent range and efficiency on the highway vs the Bolt that's our daily driver It's also great for the supercharging system that makes Tesla really the only game in town as far as road trips with EVs go which is why we rented one The caveat is little gotchas like doors that only open electronically Great for biohazard mode Not so great for escaping a flaming inferno Pick your poison Manual override that allows your family to escape a water landing one way trip to the bottom of the Marianis Trench No thank you Ride or die sucka if you want a car designed and built by car guys go with an EV from a traditional automaker If you want a car designed and built by rocket guys go with Elon

Title: 1 on WORSE CUSTOMER SERVICE
Content: They have the worse customer service I had ever seen they make you think you're dum and on the service department they play stupid like they don't see or hear the problem and make you think the car comes with that noise and is normal thats the way the car was built OMG I regret not waiting for my Fisker Please if you don't like to talk on the phone with robot don't buy this brand You can't never get someone on the phone everything is by email and text Worse customer service ever I have 3 week with my Tesla and I hate it already and is not one thing is one after another and another and another

Title: The car is fantastic
Very delicate
Content: Very delicate poor quality equipments even nut and bolts Getting only 60 mileage Suspension system is bad When turns all items in the car is falling Yes technology wise but only it is not enough to pay high price I am really disappointed and thinking that lost my savings

Title: I am sad to report that it is so
Content: I am sad to report that it is so incredibly bad that I am actually practically in tears today Every line disconnects If you do actually wait for over an hour then they disconnect you when they out you on hold to get details of your issue And of course they do not call you back So incredibly bad I have been with Tesla for over 5 years and it NEVER EVER used to be this bad All that darn money and he can't provide decent customer service to the people who are making him rich Incredibly sad

Title: I was loving my Tesla until the update
Content: I was loving my Tesla until the update when the wipers stay on during cruise control whoever came up with this wants sacking It is irritating and the wipers squeak on the windscreen it is off putting when driving this would stop me buying one again in fact can t wait to get rid of it

Title: Urgent Complaint Regarding Malfunction in My Tesla Vehicle
Content: Dear Tesla Customer Support I hope this email finds you well I am writing to express my extreme concern and disappointment regarding a serious malfunction I experienced with my Tesla vehicle Model Y on 08 01 2023 The incident has left me deeply troubled and has raised significant questions about the safety and reliability of your vehicles On the aforementioned date while I was driving my Model Y I noticed an unusual burning smell coming from the vehicle Shortly after the cruise control system began to malfunction erratically leading to a loss of control over the vehicle's speed In a matter of seconds the display and all lights on the dashboard went dark leaving me unable to monitor crucial information such as speed battery level and vehicle warnings Worse yet the electronic power steering suddenly failed causing an immediate stiffening of the steering wheel and making it incredibly difficult to control the vehicle As a result my car veered into a curb causing damage to the wheels and suspension and fire I cannot stress enough how distressing this situation was Not only did it put my safety and the safety of others at risk but it also raises questions about the reliability and effectiveness of the various systems within the vehicle I have always trusted Tesla's commitment to innovation and cutting edge technology but this incident has shattered my confidence in the vehicle's reliability I am writing to urge you to take immediate action to investigate this malfunction thoroughly and provide a comprehensive explanation for what transpired I request a detailed analysis of the root cause of the issue and assurance that appropriate measures will be taken to prevent such incidents from occurring in the future I have been a loyal Tesla customer for 2 years and until this incident I have been delighted with the exceptional performance and features of your vehicles However this incident has left me deeply concerned and I sincerely hope that Tesla takes my complaint seriously and addresses it promptly I kindly request that you arrange for a thorough inspection and repair of my vehicle to ensure that it is safe to drive Additionally I would appreciate timely updates on the investigation and steps being taken to prevent similar occurrences in other Tesla vehicles Thank you for your attention to this matter I trust that Tesla will uphold its reputation for excellence and take the necessary actions to rectify this situation and ensure the safety of its valued customers Sincerely sabih saleem

Title: The car itself is good
Content: The car itself is good The milage on the MYP is not even close to what they claim if you do any type of ACTUAL driving interstate long distance The people at the dealership are great until they actually have to deliver and then you're someone else's problem My vehicle was delivered with stays all over the interior I couldn't see at the time of day it was I only notice 2 at the time which they cleaned and told me if I found anymore to contact them within 100 miles which I did I was then passed on to the next person Yay The service department is full of VERY rude VERY snippy individuals who are untimely messaging and REFUSE to call you and simple have a conversation I am a working individual with a career that demands many hours plus a commute to work Not to mention from the begining Tesla sends you some extremely low ball offer on my truck which in turned caused me to have to pay twice as much in sales tax when registering my vehicle because I sold it at Carmax to get the actual value not 6k less The company is honestly owned by a dirtbag and full of dirtbags They also pushed my delivery date then pushed it again and again

Title: Wish I could give 0 stars
Content: Wish I could give 0 stars Horrible company awful customer service Would never recommend to anyone Went to purchase a car at their center in Marina Del Rey Nothing about the experience was professional The car was delivered dirty and not in working condition It has been a pain rescinding the car and dealing with refunds etc

Title: Tesla service so bad it doesn't make up for great car
Content: I love my Tesla UNTIL it has a problem Then the service is so painful it isn't worth owning After a recent automatic upgrade most of the major systems on my vehicle are down regen braking ABS braking all autopilot functions temperature controls are frozen etc Things happen and I could deal with this IF service was easier With Tesla there are no humans Only text So you set an appointment usually two weeks out then plead youir case with a nameless faceless person to please help you with more urgency over text Here's how it works You text They text back in 3 hours You answer A new person texts back in 3 hours with a one line answer that isn't relevant So you text again And so on Honestly as good as the car generally is I wouldn't buy another one because of service

Title: The seats are terrible
Content: The seats are terrible I've had the car roughly a year I first encounter wrinkling and took it to the dealer They say seats are wear and tear Headrest starts to bubble and They tell me it's wear and tear from the OIL IN MY SKIN Just stop You shouldn't pay this much for a vehicle and have the interior be trash Not to mention the mileage they projected is a complete lie I'm already looking at another alternative to get out of this garbage vehicle Stop lying to consumers and let them know the actual mileage of the vehicle Use a material that will stand up to natural body oils and offer a warranty that covers it if it doesn't

Title: 3 days to fix a flat tire
Content: I have a flat tire Tesla doesn t include a spare because they provide roadside assistance Their service shop isn t open on the weekends It ll be 2 5 days before they address the issue There s literally nowhere on the Tesla website that allows for customer complaints or feedback because they don t want to hear it

Title: Thiefs wouldnt recommend
Content: Thiefs wouldnt recommend The website is so slow X

Title: Don t buy a Tesla they don t care about you as a customer
Content: Tesla doesn t care about its customers the customer service agents are trained to be rude and not cooperate with customers whatsoever To get to a customer service you ll need to spend at least an hour I bought my car back in June haven t received my self registration packet Initially when I bought my car I told the delivery team that my address changed they never cared and sent my packet to incorrect address and now they have no idea when the packet will get to me

Title: Is Tesla Keeping Up w Service Demand
Content: New tires from America Tires called Tesla to make appointment for alignment Got an 11 15 am appointment for the next week and was excited because I thought I'd have to wait longer Showed up on time at Tesla for appointment Tesla staff cheerily checked me in and said I could pick up my car tomorrow around 11 30 Asked why it takes 24 hours if alignment takes less than 2 hours was told they have a backlog for servicing Drove off and made an appointment at a local shop that is well known for working on Teslas good customer service As a new owner my concern was if Tesla is keeping up with service demands given volume of cars they're selling The answer is They aren't

Title: Very bad roadside assistance
Content: I didn't realize that Tesla road service could be so bad until we had a flat tire We had a flat tire on route 22 in NJ and we called Tesla road side assistance After zillions of questions that we had to get through we finally got them to dispatch a tow truck to come to the scene They promised 65 minutes but it actually took 2 and half hours for the tow truck to arrive But that's not the end of story After we got to the Tesla service center in Sprinfiled of NJ they told us that they didn't have the tires for our car which is just standard 19 continental tire for Model Y They say we had to wait for 2 or 3 days for them to get the tires What A Telsa service center doesn't have regular tesla tires We could have tried Costco tire shop nearby that would have immediately replaced our tires for a regular non EV car This is beyond ridiculous Moreover since Tesla does not provide spare tire we had had to already drive a few miles to get off the road which caused more problems then just replacing the tiresSince we are on a road trip we had to call an Uber to take us to a nearby hotel to stay there until they got the tires So guys don't buy a Tesla or any EV for that matter Even a routine problem such as a flat tire could cost you days and lots of money and lots of hassle to get fixed We would never have to deal with this if we had a regular car

Title: Tesla Cars are just awesome Those who boo Tesla have never driven one
Content: I test drove all the current models of Tesla I have test driven The Model X Model S Model 3 and the latest Model Y I thoroughly enjoyed every car They are fun to drive easy to operate very quick performance and low maintenance I am saving up to buy my first Tesla Model Y Those who complain about customer service should report their experiences to Elon Musk and the Management of Tesla They should improve their service Tesla is the fastest selling EV in the world Just in my local area in California I am seeing thousands of Tesla models on the roads The most common being the Model 3 and Y I have interviewed and asked questions of every Tesla owner I have met in person Most of them are happy with their Tesla car and have very little complaints One couple owned a Tesla Model X for 6 YEARs and had zero problems and only had to change their tires ZERO maintenance other than cleaning the car A model 3 owner told me he was going to upgrade to a Model Y and he loved his Tesla model 3 He wanted to upgrade for more cargo space of the model Y I applaud the risk Elon took in pioneering the EV market when no one else dared to Now there are hundreds of EV models to choose from many car makers All because Tesla dared to be the first EV to rise to the top of the EV market Thanks Elon the Teslas are great cars IGNORE the anti EV gas trolls negative comments on Tesla cars those oil car lovers and gas polluters who love sucking on gas fumes and want to spend a fortune repairing their obsolete oil cars every year I would rather save THOUSANDS a year on maintenance costs and drive a low maintenance EV time to stop giving money to rich greedy oil barons who waste their money on expensive gas guzzling lamborghinis SPECIAL NOTE TO ELON Please improve your customer support as I am sad to see the poor customer reviews on this site Tesla Motors makes a great car please match that with great service Set the example for all the other EV makers Be like Rolls Royce and give sterling customer service Eric Webb

Title: Tesla Customer service is the worst of all
Content: Tesla Customer service is the worst ever service that I have ever had They are too busy and under staff so they ignore customers I recommend to stay away from TESLA if you can

Title: Tesla's Roadside Assistance is the worst
Content: Tesla's Roadside Assistance is the worst left for nine hours on the motorway with 2 text message updates both of which were incorrect I raised the issue with Tesla and received a response to say I was lying about the details in the text messages The cars are great but the after service care is atrocious This is my first and last Tesla

Title: No money left
Content: No money left They try to slip away from the promised refund Are they in that bad economy maybe

Title: I ve had my Model 3 standard range for
Content: I ve had my Model 3 standard range for over 18 months but only done c8 5k miles and I think this is the best car I have ever had Previous cars include Mini Cooper Golf GTi s BMW 3 series Mercedes A Class etc Easy to drive and the no lag acceleration at junctions roundabouts is amazing and makes driving safer Have had no major issues and a service engineer came to my house to repair a very minor problem what other car manufacturer does that Also very cheap to run with my own charger and driveway and no range anxiety with my journeys Would buy again

Title: Most uncomfortable car ever
Content: Tesla is extremely noisy on the road The suspension suck big time very uncomfortable ride It doesn't sit in the corners You must be totally not used to a quality car when you buy this over rated nonsense If this is how environmentally friendly cars drive then it is better to walk

Title: I'm regretting buying my Tesla
Content: Firstly I loved my Tesla model 3 performance and saved up alot to be able to buy one however the customer service is shocking was told that my seat belt harness had failed after just 3 and a half years and 52000 miles to be told by customer service that the seat belt harness isn't part of the seat belt or air bag system so isn't covered by the supplemental restraint system limited warranty I mean come on now the car recorded an SRS issue the invoice said SRS issue yet some how it's not an SRS issue and the fact I asked why isn't it covered they said Tesla decision is final and then refused to answer any more questions regarding the matter I'm the customer I'm spending money with them and get spoken to like a child no conversation nothing The build quality is so poor but not as bad as the customer service having owned several luxury brands before Tesla I thought Tesla would be better than the rest but in fact they are the worst manufacturer I've had the displeasure of dealing with

Title: Nice car indifferent service quality
Content: I m at Tesla Service in Salem No one will wait on us Even though no one else is in line Our Model S is charging super slow 31 kw is the new normal Spent 500 to rebuild the port No difference No answers Paid for full self driving Another bad investment After hanging around 45 minutes car not fully charged And they have no record of FSD purchase Just a complicated set of verbal instructions on how WE can find it online So disappointing So typical of every exchange with Tesla Service Too bad When it works the car is awesome

Title: Very poor customer service
Content: Very poor customer service I was trying to get service from Tesla After an initial inspection I was told to wait for Tesla to reach out and provide an estimate While waiting there is no way to track the estimate process It is an ONE WAY communication The only option is to wait Tesla reach out There is no way for a customer to try to reach Tesla and find out when an estimate would become available

Title: Sadly I have to echo so many of the
Content: Sadly I have to echo so many of the experiences on here Customer service is incredibly poor at responding to messages and the people you can call know very little about the car collection process details

Title: Worst customer service ever
Content: One star is overrated for this company The car is great but the customer service is appalling Delay to get the car which resulted in the trade in value going down When asked about compensation they could not do anything apart from some vouchers to purchase their products online When I tried to contact them again to maybe look at the option of getting a new car no one bothered to call back I finally decided not to spend more money on them and to get another brand DM the Tesla account on twitter again no response Never been treated in this way by any company

Title: UK sales complaints should be responded
Content: UK sales complaints should be responded to within 24hrs by a senior person with authority to make decisions Allowing the complaint to fester over a week only upsets the customer even more and makes them feel undervalued

Title: Worst in Class customer service
Content: Worst in Class customer service Tesla buyers beware try calling Tesla and asking a question The hold time is infinity 4 hours Also I paid cash for my Model Y and Tesla received the title from NJ DMV more than a month ago and they will not send it to me they said they are too busy and told me to wait another 3 months then follow up this is MY CAR not theirs I want to get rid of it but I can't since they have not mailed me the title yet Absolutely uncaring and unprofessional I wish I had made another choice ELON MUSK if you are reading this FIRE YOUR CUSTOMER SERVICE MANAGEMENT TEAM

Title: Terrible Customer Experience
Content: A really really poor experience taking delivery of our vehicle Firstly it was a struggle to arrange delivery as we did not seem to have a dedicated contact Once we had arranged a delivery time I had a phone call on the morning of delivery to say there was an issue with the collection team and someone from Tesla would have to drive the vehicle to our site putting mileage onto our brand new car Later that morning I had another call to say they had noticed some scratches on the bonnet They would still have to deliver the car but said they would assist in arranging the repair works to be carried out This gave us a sinking feeling and certainly not a wow factor usually expected when purchasing a brand new car The car arrived later that day and indeed had scratches on the bonnet the lady delivering the car told us to download the app and request a service visit but was no help whatsoever with this and just left us to it We asked whether the car would be collected from us but was told no we have to take it ourselves and also there would not be any kind of courtesy car offered We managed to work out how to do this but was only offered Park Royal garage which is not suitable After several tries we managed to speak with our service advisor at Tesla and they added Gatwick centre which we have now booked in with next Wednesday Extremely disappointed with the way we have been treated I didnt realise Tesla was purely an online shop with no after sales support

Title: One of the worst experiences I ever got
Content: One of the worst experiences I ever got with a car dealer I think people who work at Tesla Guilford need training 100 I bought a car model X paid 50k was reserved online and went after 2 weeks to collect they did not even bother to clean the car dust everywhere inside leather dirty not even charged at full capacity in the day I collected On the day of collection I told them is the first time I am driving or buy an electric car they did not care not show me how to charge or how to start stop the car they only show me that you can close and open the boot and doors from the car key Maybe dealers located in other parts of the country are different but in this center they don t care about the customers As well on the day of collection nobody was there I need to wait 30 minutes until someone will show up to ask anything On top of that they put the wrong adaptor in my car and now I can t charge the car at supercharge points If you need to travel even 100 miles to deal with some Tesla representatives I will advise to avoid this dealer located in Guilford at any cost

Title: In Love with my Model 3 can't fault it
Content: Absolutely love my Model 3 Single pedal driving is an experience not to be missed 60k miles later only ever changed tyresuse my referral link to purchase a Tesla product and get cash off and other exclusive benefits ts la shaun 56117 take the spaces out

Title: The frustration can t be expressed wit
Content: The frustration can t be expressed wit words I can t even complain anymore Tesla makes me act insane Not a good buy

Title: Customer service once again has been
Content: Customer service once again has been very poor from Tesla I ve got multiple issues with my 2020 model 3 mostly build quality related There is also an issue with keyless entry via smartphone which I m told is a common problem and can t be fixed The experience with the service centre is poor from start to finish It s all done through the app so you can t actually speak to a real person They ve not actually managed to fix the issues with my vehicle as they haven t got the parts in stock despite being told they ve got what they need in stock already When the app pinged to say my car is ready for collection I turn up and then I m told that it s not actually ready yet The whole customer experience with Tesla is so impersonal Having owned BMWs Volvos Audis etc I much prefer actually dealing with a real dealership and the build quality of their cars is much better in my experience

Title: Appalling experience with Tesla
Content: I took a lease on a Tesla Y a few months ago It's a company car through my own business and was a no brainer on cost with tax savings etc The purchase was amazing Super smooth rapid availability very helpful We had planned to get two more as company cars when the other directors' current leases expire The car itself is really lovely to drive fast smooth A delight That's the 2 in the 2 10 But the after care experience is beyond appalling and would definitely stop me choosing Tesla again The car is delivered on a trailer with less than 50 miles charge There's no handover briefing so you and Google have to work together on everything to find out how to do the most basic of functions like using the wipers I get the advanced stuff being researchable but really not being able to turn the wipers on It's Tesla so I assumed it would be super intuitive and anything I did research would be easy to follow and superbly done It's not Info is difficult to find user experience on guides etc a 1 10 The charging station installed at the office was a farce Advice we had from Tesla was appalling Hours on the phone paying for two electrician visits and finally a simple solution was there all along when we reached someone with UK knowledge The voice commands are comical nothing works That means you have to use the screen for everything and that doesn't feel safe I use Siri before the Tesla voice options Last straw I've just clipped the rear tyre and I mean clipped It's immediately flat It's ok that's my fault I call the AA and they tell me there's not much point coming out as they can't do anything with a Tesla I call Tesla support always ages waiting on the phone I can't get it sorted from the office It has to go off on a Transporter to the Tesla centre 15 miles away Not very eco Waiting for the cost at the moment I could get it from a reputable tyre dealer but they probably won't stock them Sorry Tesla the product is great but support is totally awful

Title: Got outer track rod end replaced
Content: Got outer track rod end replaced estimate was for 1 5 hours actually took less than 1 hour yet still charged the 1 5 hours 165 00 per hour Was told that it was done quicker as the technician was experienced Of course a complaint is on its way to Tesla HQ

Title: Never Tesla Again
Content: For solar panels during the initial consultation it was known that HOA insurance covers my roof But I was told to pay 250 regardless They said they will send design within a week Nothing for a month after couple of followups They cancelled my order without notifying me of any reason in an email And upon reaching customer service reason provided was that HOA owns the roof And I will get my refund within a month You knew that from the get go I just landed 250 to a large organization for 2 months interest free

Title: Customer service is terrible After
Content: Customer service is terrible After placing an order and awaiting the information to confirm the delivery date no one has contacted me regarding this information The next thing I know my order has been canceled According to the representative I need to reorder and pay 250 I do not believe Tesla's customer service is the smartest propel They are not trained to solve problems but rather to avoid them I find it very sad

Title: Very very very bad customer service
Content: Very bad customer service

Title: Shocking customer service and delivery
Content: Shocking customer service and delivery service Cancelled delivery 3 times for my vehicle Paid 131k and the service is shocking Offered me 100 for cancelled delivery and then want me to jump hoops to give them proof of travel Then offered me 100 free super change miles when I have already got 3 years free superchange on my vehicle After waiting 2 5 years for this car I hope I can get better service aftersales but I doubt this and now regreting the purchase now

Title: Don t by a Tesla is absolutely garbage
Content: Don t by a Tesla is absolutely garbage I bought 2018 22000 miles on it from tesla used cars section I took it many times to their service location because of problems in the screen they fixed it right still have same problems now they asking for 4000 dollars to fix it I drove my Honda accord for over 230kmiles and still rolling like a clock

Title: Where to start
Content: Where to start Collection service was diabolical Car park miles away unceremoniously given a card a car park lot number and told to go and find my own car No instructions on how to start the car use the car open the car and they are not quite as intuitive as you would hope Car only had circa 50 miles of charge so by the time I got home I was nearly out which was incredibly stressful Tesla app doesn t work Often car goes off line and I can t access sat nav radio etc One month after getting the car it s broken down completely the touch screen doesn t switch on at all so car unusable 24 hours later trying to speak to Tesla as it s still on warranty no one answers the phone Terrible experience DO NOT GET A TESLA

Title: Car delivered with barely 33miles
Content: Car delivered with barely 33miles charged even though they brag about giving 50 at least I bought a model Y expecting to get around 285miles as advertised Instead it says 260 miles And good luck getting 260A Tesla Guy called me about this and he was so defensive of Tesla He said 285 is testing range even though you can t possibly get 280 to even show on the screen I got a bad battery from themAnd they want to cheap out on fixing the issue Haven t got the 100 miles of supercharge promised either And moreover There s like less than 10 supercharge points in London Nothing in central except Westfield where you have to pay parking to have access to it The whole thing is a joke zThis is London You should have a 100 superchargers

Title: I love Tesla
Content: I love Tesla love design and everything but it takes forever to order the vehicle pain in the ass

Title: nothing special even worse some chinses
Content: nothing special even worse some chinses e car company

Title: Tesla Where you don't matter once we've got your money
Content: As usual Tesla did not miss an opportunity to disappoint Wasted more hours of my life because the service tech didn't spent 1 minute reading the issue Just sent a bewildered repairman to shake his head and wonder why

Title: Tesla is cool for women
Content: Tesla is cool for women unless you re a man that has chosen to identify as a man

Title: FAKE Delivery Dates to TRAP you
Content: they promise 1 date to deliver the vehicle get you in their trap and then hold you hostage to buy alternative available vehicle and then look at customer service support see attachment where the agent simply says we only give estimates have an electric day and leaves the chat WAO Elon Musk you have deteriorated customer experience by hiring these agents like Marvie

Title: The worst company ever
Content: The worst company ever I have forty years as a car owner and i had several brands never imagined that a company could have a service like this it is simply horrible My experience at TESLA LISBON at CORTE INGLES has been a perfect disaster Sales people have absolutely no attention to the client never repply to phone calls or emails a disaster Never Ever Try to buy a TESLA car MR ELON MUSK OPEN YOUR EYES

Title: I've now sold my Tesla but the last 4
Content: I've now sold my Tesla but the last 4 years have been great I have had to use their service centres 6 times and only Park Royal stood out as crappy Everyone else was incredibly helpful and solved my issues without any drama or costs The service rangers that come to you are a game changer

Title: My favorite car ever
Content: From choosing my car going through the extremely easy purchase process to owning it I am blown away with each step I have an incredible car that is one of the safest on the road The technology is amazing and I love driving anywhere I can It s sad that the complainers are usually the only ones who write reviews Let s go Tesla owners tell everyone how awesome your car is

Title: Tesla service model is way better than traditional dealers
Content: Tesla s service model is very different I am sure some people have bad experiences at their local service centres but the one near me is great From delivery day to the few times I ve been in every interaction was very customer focused I like using the app to communicate And the best of all is the mobile service My local mobile service tech has been to my house a few times and he s quick courteous and does great work I won t buy another car brand This way of doing business is so much better than any dealer experience I ve had

Title: Great car horrible service and culture
Content: Yes Tesla cars are fantastic but the second you have to deal with Tesla service you will be lied to constantly You will then be forced to bribe Tesla to fix things even when it s under warranty Tesla is one of the most untrustworthy companies you can buy from

Title: Always had a great experience with Tesla
Great car
Content: Great car had for 15 months now no problems whatsoever very cheap to run no or very minimal servicing and covers all journeys with pleasure Range anxiety really is not a problem with these and their excellent supercharger network

Title: Tesla model S
Content: I have had the Tesla Model S for 5 years No issues and I only need to buy it tyres 99 000 miles battery still at over 94 and their Superchargers are excellent Tyres lasting 20 25k and average w mile 248 It s a great touring car accommodates 5 adults and luggage or 2M long benches

Title: Awesome products
Content: Awesome products After Tesla cancelled RHD Model S Plaid bookings I looked everywhere for another vehicle to take it's place No luck Eventually I accepted the compromise and purchased a LHD car in the UK the car is awesome so glad I did

Title: Model 3 P since Sept 2019 good response to issues
Content: We've had our Model 3 P since Sept 2019 from new and our interaction and response from Tesla has always been great Either with Milton Keynes or Northampton Service Centres or the mobile rangers Can't fault them when responding and fixing the few issues that we have had with the car either warranty work or minor faults with the car

Title: By far the best car I ve owned
Content: By far the best car I ve owned Tesla are the best when it comes to efficiency and technology I ve had 2 very minor issues in 3 years and booking it in via the app is so easy Both times they came to me with a mobile service technician who was brilliant When reading reviews on here you ll mostly find that people only post negative reviews as everyone else is very pleased with their cars

Title: Let down by poor customer service
Content: Tesla helpline staff by individuals who do not understand the technical issues and do no more than pay platitudes No issues ever followed up phone calls not returned promises not delivered A complete nightmare which makes operating the car a real challenge Would never buy a Tesla again

Title: Excellent service great cars
Content: I've owned a 2014 Model S85 for seven years it's a great car I just bought a replacement a 2017 Model S75 and in a continuation of the excellent service I've had in the past last week I had a Ranger come out to fix a door handle under warranty at my home Excellent service great cars

Title: hard to contact and no customer service
Content: Sadly our experience with TESLA has been very poor and I would be reluctant to recommend them Called out to assist with a German Tesla involved in an RTA collision damage to the front end and steering Tesla repair centre Edinburgh refused to accept the car saying they only do 'bumps and scrapes' Eastern Western approved accident repair centre also refused to take the car Tried to phone TESLA for help got through to their collision centre in Dartford they could offer no advice on how to proceed

Title: Wish I could give Tesla ZERO stars for
Content: Wish I could give Tesla ZERO stars for customer service and support It s as good as non existent Allegedly their EV technology is good but what s the point when the customer service and support are appalling If after a long wait on the phone you re fortunate enough to speak to a human being they don t have the requisite knowledge to assist you I m learning about the car and issues by watching YouTube videos and talking to other Tesla owners

Title: Tesla buyer beware
Content: UPDATE NO RESPONSE FROM TESLA TO THIS REVIEW SHOWS YOU HOW LITTLE THEY CARE THE TECH IS GOOD THATS ALL I have a love hate relationship with my 2022 Model 3 Drive and efficiency are brilliant However the interior build paint work and panel gaps are pathetic I am disappointed everytime I drive it as the pleasure is very quickly replaced by frustration and anger on just how poor this car really is I have to think back to my 1997 Toyota to compare a worse vehicle and maybe thats unfair to Toyota My Tesla is not a premium vehicle it comes with laughable customer service who plainly do not care or are not empowered to care The facilities are my local Tesla gargage are dirty smelly and fall far short of almost any other garage I have been in this certury the grounds around it are a mess also I have rejected my car twice now but even the finance company is ignored by them I'd request a face to face meeting with a Customer Relations Manager who can actually think for themselves who gives a moment for someone who invested 60k in September 2022 whose car is now valued by Tesla as a trade in at 25k but 35k by a rival company Even so one garage openly told me they didnt want my car as a trade in due to the up and down pricing So how about it I'll come to Holland at my expense and lets discuss how Tesla can make me believe in the brand again

Title: Very bad customer service
Content: Very bad customer service We tried to buy a Tesla After ordering and paying the order fee the person from Tesla called us on the same day evening and said you have to come in today otherwise we will give the car to another person but we couldn t because it was already late evening for us The agreement order said we had a few more days to pick up the car but they do not follow what s on the agreement Very frustrating and disappointing

Title: Booked a test drive online with Tesla Adelaide and will never deal with them again
Content: Booked a test drive online with the Tesla dealer at Adelaide airport They accepted my booking I drove 45 minutes to get there only for them to tell me we dont actually have that car available but you can test drive something else What a waste of time I was ready to purchase a car and was seriously considering a Tesla however given this interaction at the very first stage of dealing with Tesla and considering this is I assume where they are most likely to give you their best service to actually get you across the line then I can only imagine how poor the rest of their customer service is I change my Wife's and my own car every 3 years and have done so for a very long time and this rates as the worst dealership service I have come across when considering Toyota Hyundai Holden Kia VW and Ford The only benefit I see here is that the 1 5 hrs I have wasted this morning will save me 3 years of misery in the future

Title: Service quality dropped
Content: 40 mins wait time on phoneNo apologies Expected me to edit on site 4 hours no courtesy carWhat a jokeI am not thinking about a new Tesla

Title: Absolutely horrible customer service from Tesla
Content: Absolutely horrible customer service I contacted Tesla yesterday about still not receiving my 3 months of free supercharging since purchasing my new Tesla on June 21st They then referred me to my advisor who didn't help who then referred me to the Tesla 877 number I have called this Tesla 877 number numerous times in the past 2 weeks and have yet to have a representative answer Is there no way to actually reach a human to get an answer to my questions This is insane treatment for any customer let alone a brand new customer and the price you pay for these cars

Title: Absolutely awful customer service
