Content: Absolutely awful customer service Extremely disappointed Had a Model 3 bought and while it never did feel right we went through the very non personal process and tried negotiating the down payment with the stipulation all other numbers had to remain the same Down payment was adjusted but the monthly payment went up Zero communication about anything and had I not noticed it and questioned it I would have been stuck In the end I cancelled the deal Tesla took the 6000 down payment out of my account anyway I called to request the money be refunded immediately and was put on hold for over 1 1 2 hours and the only answer I got was via text message the it would take 6 8 weeks to get my money back Totally unacceptable The communication was awful The customer service was awful and the people I spoke to were extremely rude and condescending I couldn't leave a zero star review or I would have Trying to do business with this company is definately not recommended

Title: Worst customer service ever at Tesla
Content: Worst customer service ever at Tesla Peabody in MA Almost always say they have to keep the car when you arrive but never say so in advance even though they know exactly the issues to be dealt with Have increased the time to repair and now diagnostics take them 5 days Despite the poor app wait times inability to process work quickly and keep cars even longer now they don't give loaners if you're out of warranty So you have to guess that you need to arrange a rental though you may live 2 hours from dealership and pay out of pocket or just forgo the repair Their estimates do not bear up to reality and they seem to think everyone lives around the corner I have had them tell me a job would take a couple days so I had to get a loaner and after driving back home 2 hours only for them to say the job was done 3 hours after I left the car wasting another whole day in driving They seem to have forgotten the promise to not make money on service as repairs have only gotten more expensive Representatives act like you did something wrong when you register shock that a windshield and door handle repair will take 5 days Service gets worse every year and there is no one in the center who listens or takes you seriously

Title: Teslas customer service is terrible
Content: Once you order your vehicle Tesla responds to your text messages immediately Once l you pick up your vehicle they don t respond to you at all Customer Service is the worst Everything is done on the app Seven days into my lease I m already regretting leasing the Tesla Model Y I noticed yesterday that there is a chip on the dash that was not caused by me For two days I ve been texting for someone to call me and still have not received a call Three years can t go by fast enough I would rather have a gas vehicle with five star customer service

Title: Tesla customer service is totally
Content: Tesla customer service is totally NONSENSE and application they are using in back end are useless Don't know how they agreed with it Never ever get the final amount right and their application always shows wrong price to pay Managers are there but not to solve the issue and they always there hide to face the customer TESLA Customer service is NONSENSE Not helpful even though we pay the money Finally GOD knowns about the car mileage as they say one thing on website and in practical miles won't come as shown

Title: My Model 3 gave me warning that coolant
Content: My Model 3 gave me warning that coolant level was low but was okay to drive I got the car to the Service Center the next morning Here I am two weeks later no car no communication Diagnosed as Rodent Attack coolant hose and electrical lead chewed quoted 1200 to repair as this was not a warranty problem Since then these people refuse to pick up the phone or answer messages via the app I have no idea why it's called a Service Centre They are incompetent customer haters who seem to have been trained to avoid work and responsibility DO NOT BUY A TESLA IN AUSTRALIA These people specialise in disappointment

Title: UK Customer service
Content: Customer service in the UK is non existent Contacted Tesla 4 times to just be told we are preparing you car for delivery and will be in touch as soon as possible this is as precise as it gets I m really worried now whether my decision of owning Tesla was the right one

Title: Would score ZERO in reality
Content: Not only is their product beyond useless and fails regularly but their Customer Service levels are deplorable Call backs never materialise Supervisors don t take calls and there is no clear complaints process available 48 hours After their useless Model 3 broke down I m still here without any mobility they took my car to a service centre 45 miles away because the nearer one still 23miles away was busy they then expect me to undertake a journey at my cost to go and collect a loan car despite initial suggestions that a rental would be delivered to me After 42 hours of frustration they offer me an Uber voucher that covered approximately 75 of the cost this Uber voucher appears not to work to which Tesla inform is Ubers problem now if this were any other OEM they would have had a courtesy vehicle delivered me to within hours of their product failing It is evident that Customer retention is not high on their agenda

Title: Tesla has left me disappointed with
Content: Tesla has left me disappointed with their customer service long wait times for repairs and quality control issues resulting in a frustrating ownership experience

Title: Awful customer support
Content: Wing mirrors have been stolen my wife is 9 months pregnant and we cannot legally drive Have been waiting for hours to get though to anyone still no luck Called the emergency support team and they couldn't help Really really awful customer support If anything goes wrong with the car you wont be able to get it fixed quickly Really awful

Title: Super effektiv og god service ved
Content: Super effektiv og god service ved levering af ny bil Meget imponeret over rækkevidde som er bedre end rated med kørsel over 600 km opladning i en Performance 3

Title: Customer service
Content: I ordered Y model Tesla 7 days ago The app keeps telling me the car is getting ready and when I call customer service they have no information other than it's getting ready Poor customer service and communication

Title: I have been waiting
Content: I have been waiting and waiting and waiting and waiting The delivery date has been postponed for the seventh time I ordered in October last year VIN was issued in April Still waiting for delivery I am already paying a loan instalment for a vehicle that I have not seen Never trust the delivery dates Do not pay in advance Extremely disappointing

Title: great car but NO direct way to contract any human
Content: I love the car 5 5 Design and performance Service however there is absolutely NO WAY to speak directly to anyone even those known and helpful other than via a general Tesla message Why Utterly stupid to form a business relationship and the destroy it By having NO WAY to contact directly Service centres as opposed to showrooms are few and far between in the UK Great product ruined by no back up once sold

Title: Quite honestly I love our Tesla Y
Content: Quite honestly I love our Tesla Y I wish however that I had considered how far away a service center is from us about 60 miles Twice we have gone and waited all day at the center only to be told it is going to take longer and we would have to leave the car Both times they have given as a car Right now my air conditioning is not working and it is 90 plus degrees where I live I was supposed to take it in on the 14th but didn't as I couldn't wait all day I have a hospitalized family member and need to go back and forth each day to the hospital Love Tesla but lack of service centers is a negative for me

Title: Huge Impact Crack on Glass Roof Delivery
Content: I was very disappointed in the delivery experience on 6 10 23 Drove from Orange County to take delivery of my car at Tesla Burbank and there was a huge impact crack on the glass roof I was told that I would have to bring my car back to Burbank to be repaired or I could handle it myself at a Tesla dealership close to my home The staff shrugged off the crack like it was nothing and didn't seem to care about my time being wasted trying to rectify a problem that they should have caught when inspecting the vehicle at the time it was received at the dealership and before they delivered the car to me I made several attempts to contact the Sales Manager but have not received a response which does not surprise me based on the poor delivery experience I attempted several times to address the issue with the dealership to no avail I was especially disappointed because the entire Internet purchase process was well orchestrated seamless and very fast I expected nothing less than the same experience on delivery day

Title: Never buy Tesla
Content: 1 Never got 330 miles of range even with driving at a speed 70mph highway Max I got 227 with 3 battery left 2 It's been less than a year 9 months and battery health reduced by 7 00 Current health is 93 only Service center saying it is normal nothing wrong with battery Seriously 3 Contacted service center from beginning that my car consuming more power even at low speed but they check their software check and say everything looks good nothing wrong with battery 4 Scheduling service is pain in ass You have to approve estimate ahead of time even they have not looked at the issue How someone can approve estimate even it has not even been checked by technician in person 5 Poor customer service 6 Always some rattling noise from car and service center saying it will be charged to fix it

Title: hire people who know what to do at a proper salary That s why you can t keep experienced people at a proper salary
Content: Hire people with proper experience

Title: Don t workin 1 2 superchargers in
Content: Don t workin 1 2 superchargers in Sweden Edsbruk Tindered I charge here every week and more than 2 month is out service I dont know if tesla service know about it

Title: Worst dealership experience ever
Content: Worst dealership experience ever Tesla's trade in process and purchasing process is a total crap show Took an entire day at the Salt Lake Tesla dealership to take delivery of my son's car That was after several visits to our credit union to get information the trade in team needed Wanted us to sign blank powers of attorney There is not enough space on this review to state everything that went wrong Will never buy a tesla from a dealership again and do not recommend anyone else does

Title: 10 day in with a 2023 model Y
Content: We received our 2023 model Y 10days ago It seemed that the company rushed so much in their production numbers that they neglect the Quality We found out so many system faults with the machine not to mention scratches upon pick up Way to destroy owning a new vehicle experience I think a used x brand would probably have been more satisfactory imo the design is rather plain and we are scammed to purchase add on accessories if we want to make it more user friendly Anyway we will proceed to open a ticket but that s not something you want to deal in year 1 written by a custom that actually used their precious saving and paid the amount in full

Title: Worst support ever
Content: I have a problem with billing in the app it general it doesn t allowed me to charge a car with Tesla chargers I called to support send all the info And nothing They can t provide any information about the problem how it can be solved when it can be solved So if any problems you will never get support And car and app are very non stable

Title: Absent customer service
Content: Absent customer service Ordered Tesla a year ago canceled the order and asked for refund Initially Tesla refused 100 deposit refund despite their own policy that it should be issued back Than an employee Shane Lovely cancelled the order and said that refund of 100 will be made A year later no refund Tesla stopped responding to any of my emails Order RN116800337 model Y

Title: Best Cars you can buy
Content: I own three Tesla and would not drive anything else

Title: Every interaction I have had with Tesla has been amazing
Content: Every interaction I have had with Tesla since getting my car has been positive 3 5 years in and Cardiff especially have been amazing People come here to whinge Tesla don t solicit opinion here and that s why the minority push the ratings low Bear that in mind there really isn t a better choice of EV in the UK right now Charging infrastructure is everything

Title: We have 3 Teslas and FSD is costing Tesla one star
Content: We have 3 and have been through ups and downs and would have left 5 stars if not for one issue on what planet us it normal to charge 12 15 000 for FSD and tell owners it s beta and you re only testing it And then to remove it from the vehicle because the vehicle accused me of not tugging on the wheel on i684 a pure 4 lane straightaway The lawsuits against them have caused Telsa to destroy the self driving experience We just love our Tesla service station on Tarrytown Road and service is huge with us

Title: Replacement rear window for model 3 sr
Content: Replacement rear window for model 3 sr Was given a p100d model x for the weekend as a loaner

Title: I have a 2023 Model Y
Content: I have a 2023 Model Y The car itself is decent However their customer service is the worst I ve experienced The car doesn t have a spare tire and they don t come with run flats They provide towing only to their service centers where they can milk you In short Tesla s roadside assistance is only a scheme to suck more money from the car owners

Title: HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE
Content: I bought a model 3 and loved it My husband also loved it so we tried to trade in his Audi The offer was over 10 000 less than other offers they gave him the offer and refused to speak with him after that He decided to sell his car back to Audi dealership and loose 3 556 on taxes I called the Tesla number and was on hold almost an hour I asked that the store calm to make an appointment to purchase the S model car Hours went by and no one ever called I called back and was on hold another hour Still no one contacted me I just don't understand he wanted to purchase a 95 000 car and I had just bought my model 3 Its been 3 days and none will ever call back He gave up and went back to EL Paso Audi and purchased a e tron RS They just didn't care they lost nearly 100 000 Makes me wish I hadn't bought mine now from the El Paso Tesla store What if I have problem or just a question and can't get any help Wonder is I will get a response with this post I bet not HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE BEWARE

Title: The worst customer service I have ever experienced
Content: It turns out we have to give 1 star to write a review but I would give them 0 stars I was due to pick up my new car on Friday but asked to delay it for 3 days as we have had our house move date brought forward I didn t think this would be an issue They said sorry your car will now be issued to someone else In what world is that any form of customer service Horrendous

Title: Degraded customer service
Content: When I bought my first Model 3 The customer support was excellent In the name of non contact digital only service no adequate telephone support lack of access to Tesla centres practices that are really unfriendly The staff are unhelpful they probably think that they are untouchable This may be the beginning of their downfall Cars alone won't keep the company up writing is on the wall Hope they realise as a company It is a collective failure such company policies and work ethics of the employees

Title: My car is brand new 1 month
Content: My car is brand new 1 month Tire got ripped off and Tesla is saying they don t have warranty on tires I don t understand why can they fix its new car they should be responsible for it It s ridiculous I repent why I bought Tesla I advise all don t buy buy it it s hassle for everything They don t have their service center for everything they excuse It is life threatening while driving on highway all of sudden your tire ripped

Title: From ordering a car to taking delivery It was so bad
Content: From ordering a car to taking delivery from Tesla in the UK is a complete nightmare from start to finish They aren't a conventional dealership like any you would recognise think Amazon for cars You don't get to deal with a human but an Algorithm You can't speak to your local branch as they don't have a phone number and everything is routed through their Call Centre in Maidenhead You can request to get a call from your local centre but I tried 8 times and never did anyone call back After you pay your deposit you have 48 hours to complete the deal and pay the money Tesla give you the Bank details of where to pay the money in our case over 42K The bank flashes up that this could be a fraudulent account and is not recognised proceed in the understanding you could lose your money It is because Citi Bank isn't recognised in the UK Trying to get basic info was horrendous I spoke to the salesperson in the showroom and asked what the BHP of the car was they said what's BHP We tried to get the registration number for the car to sort out insurance but we were told the car will be registered only on the day of collection so entering the Reg No into websites doesn't work Tesla seem to have a thing going with Directline insurance You can't collect your car without insurance but they won't register the car with DVLA unless you provide Insurance Catch 22 Directline insurance was 700 more expensive than my current insurer

Title: Tesla Chelmsford Connor May was Fantastic
Content: Went to the Tesla Showroom in Chelmsford today met Tesla Advisor Connor May His service was fantastic absolutely second to none I have been looking for new car so have been to many car showrooms over the last few weeks my experience with Connor knocked the other sales advisors for 6 Honest friendly and patient I felt Connor had one mission and that was to help guide and support me when looking at the Tesla Model Y His enthusiasm for the brand was real and made me truly excited to get on board What an introduction to Tesla Thank you Connor May appreciate your wisdom and help this morning Can t comment on other Tesla advisers but Telsa listen Connor has got this right

Title: Not good customer service
Content: I ve had my model 3 standard plus for 5 months and I must say I absolutely loved how it drives but were it all falls apart in when something goes wrong my rear indicator has stopped working which in any other car would be a minor issue but not the case with a Tesla I took it to my local garage and had their auto electrician look at it he didn t have a clue of what the problem was and gave up so I contacted Tesla through the app and after a couple of days texting with them they finally said they would come out to my house to look at it but they couldn t get to me for nearly two weeks with an estimated cost of 450 which I find totally unbelievably and so if customer service is important to you then I would say don t buy a Tesla as their service is very hit Orr miss I will update once they come out to fix the problem and let you know how it goes

Title: Horrible
Content: Horrible fff horrible Tesla delivery the model X to my doorstep during the pandemic If something is wrong with your car Tesla will never accept fault And their service department suck ass I m so anger with thier customer service Still under warrantee but they don t give a ffff Love the car but everything else sucks Moving on to another electric car company

Title: Terrible customer care service don't fall for their product It's a horror show
Content: If I can give a negative 5 stars I would TESLA sucks They took over the solar panel company a few years ago The customer service is horrible and so ignorant There has been a pigeon problem derived from the solar panels as the pigeons like to harbor beneath them They simply told me that I am outside the warranty period and they don't care And they refuse to have me talk to their supervisor Don't buy their product You will regret Watch for their stock market crash

Title: Awful customer service
Content: Awful customer service meant to take delivery today took a day off work to be in and told at 4 30pm the car will not be delivered Cannot get through to anyone at Tesla to find out any info speak to anyone Awful

Title: I have had the Model S on order for 2
Content: I have had the Model S on order for 2 years Tesla have now announced that they will not be available in the UK for the foreseeable future I was given options I could take a left hand drive S at about 20k more then the price I had on my order well that s really practical buying a car that will have a low resale value but no discount or get 2k of a Y or 3 neither of which I want What is the betting that as soon as they have cancelled the orders they will suddenly start taking new ones for right hand drive at much higher prices Love driving the cars this would be my 3rd Tesla but their service levels loyalty to customers or plain simple integrity is simply shocking They really couldn t give a flying about customers

Title: Terrible customer service
Content: I placed an order on 03 May received text message confirming REG and VIN number and delivery date 4 days later received text message saying order has been placed on hold 20 emails later received a text saying it was a mistake and order has now been reinstated Order has now vanished from my account I have spent every day since ordering this car texting emailing and phoning Tesla and still have no answer from them on where my order is I am meant to pick it up in 2 days customer service is pretty much non existent I would strongly advise anyone to avoid this company until they sort out the customer service

Title: Dreadful customer service
Content: Dreadful customer service There was a fault when out Powerwall was installed I suspect the PCB on the gateway is faulty Needles and repetitive ideas and suggestions with a 1 week plus gap in any response It looks like an attempt to avoid any responsibility

Title: 2023 Model 3 completely dead after 3
Content: 2023 Model 3 completely dead after 3 months Can t even get into the vehicle to get my stuff out of it It has been a day and an half and they haven t been even able to arrange a tow for the car Have been given the complete runaround And they won t provide a loaner or a rental once they do get the car in to be fixed Never in a million years would I have bought this car if I knew their customer after sales service was like this Anyone want to buy a 2023 Model 3 lol

Title: I love my car but Tesla customer
Content: I love my car but Tesla customer service is simply awful They treat you as if they are doing you a favor selling you the car If you can grit and bear it the car is awesome when you finally receive it

Title: I made an appointment two weeks in
Content: I made an appointment two weeks in advance for simple service 1 Replace windshield wipers and check fluid2 Replace air filterI was at the Tesla service center in Agoura Hills Ca on time in the morning waiting in a que that stretched down the driveway I was told by the service agent that the car would be ready between 4 00 and 5 00 pm I checked updates on line and it appeared that it remained 'in service all day' I finally went on line at the end of the day and was informed that the car would not be ready for an additional 2 days They hadn't even started to work on my car This is my second attempt at service with this Tesla service center and had a truly miserable experience previously They never came to my home for a 'home' service appointment I CANNOT SAY HOW ANGRY AND DISSAPOINTED I AM AT THIS SERVICE CENTER I wonder if Elon Musk is aware of the miserable service Tesla provides If Space X were run like this imagine what the rockets would be like STAY AWAY FROM THIS SERVICE CENTER AWFUL AWFUL AWFUL AWFULLook at their miserable reviews and realize how bad this place is If I treated my patients as they do their customers I would be in jailHarlan Gibbs M D

Title: Don t return deposits they are supposed
Content: Don t return deposits they are supposed to If the finance agreement does not go through they claim they return the deposit but mine wasn t returned after asking half a dozen times Customer service is nonexistent After your order completes you ll never be able to get in touch with anyone helpful

Title: Tesla customer support non existent
Content: As a Tesla shareholder I take no pleasure in writing this review The car Amazing The customer support Non existent Bottom line You have to decide if the car is worth the pain of dealing with Tesla's shockingly bad aftersales

Title: Worst customer service ever
Content: I ordered the mobile charger on Tuesday April 25 2023 On Wednesday April 26 2023 I received an email confirming the offer On Friday April 28 2023 I received an email stating that my order has shipped This email included both the order number and the UPS tracking number Also on Friday April 28 2023 I sent an email to the order department asking for the date that I would receive my order because contrary to the email UPS via the tracking number merely indicated that a label has been created The automated reply to that inquiry stated that they would reply within 5 business days However as of today I have not received a reply from the order department and furthermore UPS still indicates that only a label has been created and no shipping has occurred Tesla has no phone number and I spoke with the local dealer here in Chicago who said that he would look into the issue i e check order status check their inventory to see if they could supply me with one and contact the service center to see if they have one and he would get back to me this afternoon Of course unfortunately I did not hear from him So I just purchased a 43 000 electric car from Tesla the car doesn t come come with a charger I have to pay for it myself but after ordering it and paying for it there has been no action and no way to communicate with them fir the purposes of getting information or resolving the issue

Title: Very worst experience buying my 2023
Content: Very worst experience buying my 2023 model 3 since brand new the new model 3 has pulling hard right and on a heavy reinning water dripping on the front driver side window and the communication with Tesla Canada it is really worst

Title: Good Charging Network Really Crappy Customer Service Fun Vehicle of Mediocre design and quality
Content: This company gives you a delivery range of two months and when it comes time for the actual delivery you are given a two day window to come and get it This two day window is really just a suggestion on Tesla's end There is a better than average probability that your car will not be there on the date of your appointment Expect same day cancellation of the appointment from Tesla which is just peachy when you have made arrangements with work ride etc to be able to be there Also don't believe the stated ability to deliver to your home if it is within 220 miles There are a lot of conditions that would have to be met to make that true And if you can't come get your car they will cancel the sale keep your deposit as a penalty and give the car to someone else Even though you already have an insurance policy on it It is a one way contract where the customer has no rights and the company has no accountability The car is fun to drive of mediocre build quality and has the advantage of the best national charging network They have dumbed down the definition of SUV to mean a low clearance vehicle with a little extra cargo room They should just call it a utility vehicle Obviously no one at Tesla has ever left the pavement or the city for that matter If it wasn't for the charging network there are better choices than Tesla It will be interesting to see how they fare when there is a competitive marketplace Will they begin to treat their customers with consideration or continue with the Heads I win Tails you Lose that defines their current business model

Title: For all the ability to move car
Content: For all the ability to move car progress forward they are absolute ZERO at customer service Gross mis quote of completion Gross misquote of cost ZERO communication

Title: i love my model 3 and model s but the
Content: i love my model 3 and model s but the wall connector support is absolutely garbage they keep asking the pictures and still they just cant help at all its horrible its been 2 weeks and they cant solve my problem

Title: Horrendous customer service
Content: Horrendous customer service Told lies over the phone just to get a sale They called me and emailed me nonstop when I was looking to get a car Over the phone the person said he was standing right in front of the car I could reserve now and pick it up anytime between April and June and confirmed the lease price that I was quoted for I said fine and put down 200 They then hounded me repeatedly about when I was going to collect when I said it would be in around 4 weeks they cancelled the car then allocated me another one without telling me any of this Over this period the lease price increased by 10 again without them telling me apparently the previous quote I got from them was indicative Right so lease this car put down the money and it might be this price but we won t tell you what it actually will be I ve received nonstop emails from so many different people about delivery but when I complain to any of them no one responds I call after an hour on hold and they say they ll get the first person to deal with it and fix it but guess what he doesn t call I m sick of it all They assured me it would be an easy and hassle free process and it s caused me a nonstop headache over the last 3 weeks I ve cancelled and now they won t even give me my 200 back Money that they lied to me to get

Title: Customer service from HELL
Content: We order a car Model X with everything on it in March 2021 finally it seems to be delivered 2 years after ordering We are bombarded with text messages about a delivery date that does not suit We reply new date again not the requested date We file a complaint with European customer service sent 2 reminders when not receiving any reply weeks later still no reply not even an acknowledgment Tesla calls us when I explain that de date does not suit they hang up This has happened twice now In addition the new policy is only 1 pick up center per country so we have to drive to somewhere in the Antwerp region to pick up a car What an arrogant customer unfriendly company

Title: You will be better of buying something
Content: You will be better of buying something else they virtually have no customer service once you buy it you are preety much on your own it has been 4 month since i am awaiting for my wall charger i can never reach a human customer service rep no response to email either

Title: My experience with Tesla customer
Content: My experience with Tesla customer service has been excellent They are courteous punctual go the extra mile to help you I bought a brand new Tesla in March this year and i have had nothing but positive experience Plus the car is a pleasure to drive

Title: car good service bad
Content: bought a used Model S not bad actually rear truck not working spent nearly 400 to be fixed by Tesla I break my mirror made an appointment confirmed then changed by them waited 10 days for another appointment technician not showing up for the time frame changed schedule without notice excuse was parts not ready Tesla does not use dealer to save money so they have no competition or supervision

Title: Do not buy a Tesla without a proper test drive
Content: Having now had a test drive provided by Tesla Cardiff I can safely say that Tesla is by for the very worst car that I have driven in over 30 years of driving Literally everything is controlled by a screen even the glove box causing the driver to be distracted from the road constantly With the inability to change the size of the fonts as every phone can do now this makes for an extremely stressful and dangerous drive The build quality of shocking too for a 60 000 car less than 6 months old the plastic was creaking the road noise was appalling The dealership staff quite simply could care less and clearly implied that I was just the wrong customer for them like it was my fault Absolute rubbish

Title: Tesla Customer Services 0
Content: Tesla Customer Services through the Services button on the App is terrible They rarely communicate respond and I would recommend everyone to not buy Tesla products If it works it'll be great but if you need assistance or the car goes faulty then you will have to waste a lot of time and energy just to get what you should out of them

Title: Wall Charger Tesla taken nearly a month SO FAR to
Content: On 30th March 2023 I had a Tesla Wall charger installed by an electrician listed on the Tesla UK website As of today 24th April 2023 the Wall charger still does not communicate with Tesla Tesla service department have until today not diagnosed the issue Their service process seems to be to drip feed instructions for me repeat the Wall charger setup process over and over again Currently no solution in sight after more than 3 weeks

Title: I must say I m very impressed by the
Content: I must say I m very impressed by the product your company lunched helps save gas money and also on a nice model

Title: New performance model Y had windshield
Content: New performance model Y had windshield leak from new Scheduled service they replaced the glass and damaged the low voltage and needed another service appointment scheduled Picked up and interior camera isn t working This will be the 4th service appointment scheduled for this vehicle and it is still not working correctly

Title: Tesla servizio clienti di scarsa qualità
Content: Il servizio clienti Tesla è di scarsa qualità Atteggiamento irritante e a tratti derisorio inaccettabile per il livello di acquisto effettuato Tesla customer service is poor quality Irritating attitude and at times derisive unacceptable for the level of purchase made

Title: Dreadful Utterly Shocking and Abysmal Service
Content: Dreadful Whatever you have read about the awful service it is probably an understatement Bought and paid for my car in full weeks ago I still cannot agree a proper defined UK collection date My on line account said the car was ready for collection just an hour or so before the defined collection time so it was wholly impossible to drive across London at a moments notice Further I have still not been told the registration number of the car so I cannot insure it anyway No one at Tesla returns calls nor do they respond to emails including those copied to one of their UK directors I now have ten messages and emails with zero reply Automated calls leave you on hold until you simply give up I am now seeking a full refund Truly this is as bad an experience as anyone could begin to believe in trying to purchase a car

Title: Can I leave Zero Stars
Content: Can I leave Zero Stars I sure hope that a Tesla rep with influence reads these reviews They depict the truth I have a doctoral degree in Electronics Automation and Robotics so when I get service done I want to know what and why So far I ve put 5500 in repairs into my new to me 2015 Model S P85D 80 000 miles Granted I upgraded the computer and carbon fiber I have unlimited supercharging and lifetime premium connectivity I ve been into service many times in the year and a half I ve owned the car I spent 3000 on a new BMS component after the car shut down and then it shut down on the way home Apparently there were more problems causing the same alarm I was told water got into something I tested the replaced component and I found nothing wrong with it A few more minor issues plus a 12v battery replacement Then all new power relays Also I ve been living with a charge port closed switch failure After a normal day of great driving I return to the car in the morning in my garage and the 12v system is down and I can t start car I jumped the 12v and the car came to life so I could put it in tow mode and spend another 400 to tow it to Tesla I m told I need a new 90kW battery for 15000 I had no distant issue or power loss I could get 0 60 in 2 5 seconds and I charged it to 80 nightly Range around 230 miles There is no way the battery is bad I asked what was wrong with it and just like every other question No reply I even had a technician incorrectly tell me how a relay worked I didn t argue but did disagree He came running out after me and said he called his dad and his dad told him I was right So Tesla service is too inadequate for the vehicles I will replace my unicorn s battery a flawless looking lifetime free charging lifetime free connectivity car and sell it I m done with service that doesn t make sense I m very easy to get along with yet very intelligent Do not fix a problem by throwing possible solutions at it I was going to buy another Tesla for the wife I don t thing that will happen and my colleagues at work are now shying away from Tesla I used to talk them up and convinced two friends to purchase them I need Tesla to work with me on a level that makes sense to me

Title: Ordered a tesla model y
Content: Ordered a tesla model y When picking the car there were scratches here and there around the car And then had to schedule an appointment to get the car fixed More worse was they couldn t get the the car fixed in one appointment They had to schedule another appointment Completely wasting of my time and money to take the car there It s a new car It s supposed to be hassle free But it just brought all the trouble to me which was not caused by me For all these troubles tesla didn t want to do anything to make up for us as a consumer No even a coupon code or a gift card They don t value their customers They don t care about our experience It s a bad company to buy a car with

Title: Tesla service in Tampa area is
Content: Tesla service in Tampa area is horrible overbooked and unorganized This is the second experience in 4 years second experience is worst than first and book me after 18 days Service took 12 days for a little thing I was without a car for almost a month Keep delaying the completion of the service three times I am really frustrated with their service I need someone to look at this and pay attention to it I love my Tesla but I don t like the service at all I think I have to walk and go back to another gas cars

Title: It REALLY is THAT BAD
Content: Ordered from Used Inventory in March expecting to collect in Edinburgh as stated on the Website Given a Delivery Date of end of March in Birmingham Oh well I can still get to Birmingham Paid in full sold existing vehicle Delivery Date cancelled via SMS no explanation spent the next few weeks being told a pack of lies from various agents none of whom can provide an ETA I'm now completely car less and have no idea when I will get my car If you are sold on the Tesla dream please please please re think Look at all these reviews I wish I had seen them before ordering this is not review bombing these are genuine customer experiences The cars may be great I wouldn't know but there are other EV's out there Polestar Audi BMW VW that are 80 90 as good as a Tesla but the manufacturer will treat you 1 000 000 better as a customer All Tesla care about is hitting quarterly new vehicle numbers to keep share holders happy This company should not be allowed to do business in the UK with such shocking business practices they should be investigated and fined by every regulatory body under the sun Please please please think about what you value most when owning a vehicle

Title: To the Mr ElonMusk
Content: To the Mr Elon Musk I am very new with Tesla buyer so I am did pay 250 what is call reservation fee I have dream about it for driving Tesla car what is good product and good CEO kindness CEO But when I am ask is 250 will be refund and the employee of kindness CEO Tesla said non refundable because it reservation fee that is ok but the last word the employee said CHEERS that very unprofessional service at very future car on earth I am very very feeling down and sad not because of 250 but the way service reply like that I hope future Tesla can be 1 electric car forever if they are have better employees representing the company Mr Elon Musk I hope you are read this one of felt bad day for me trying purchase your Car

Title: Awful
Content: Awful The sales guy at the Pasadena Center selling me the car told me that the vehicle was going to be delivered at home It was not true I got a call from a nasty representative saying that I had pick up the car at Burbank and if didn t they will give it to someone else when I had paid 20K already Never expected Tesla to be deceptive Now I have to find a second driver to pick up the car Don t trust them

Title: Great customer care
Content: Recently bought a certified used Tesla Initially the experience wasn't great as one of the tires had a slow leak But to Tesla's credit I took it to the service center and they replaced all 4 old tires with brand new OEM versions at no charge They turned a frustrating experience into a positive one and may have made me a long time Tesla customer with that one act

Title: Tesla service center has extremely poor
Content: Tesla service center has extremely poor customer service They overbook their service appointments Expect your Tesla to take 24 hours or more to be serviced They don t offer a loaner car which should be by default if your Tesla will take more than 24 hours Don t purchase a Tesla unless you are willing to accept their poor customer service

Title: Bad place
Content: Bad place and customer service totally uncompetent

Title: Best car ever
Content: Picked up my Tesla Y a month ago Never driven an EV before but love my Tesla Love everything about it So easy and fun to drive cheap to run such a clever car with every feature you could possibly want The guys at the Exeter UK branch of Tesla are brilliant They helped me to set up an online account to order it and when it arrived and I needed some help with some of the features they were super helpful and patiently sat with me in my car and showed me how to do all the things I was a bit unsure of So far absolutely no complaints

Title: From bad to worse after a complete lack
Content: From bad to worse after a complete lack of help last week during a tire blow out incident customer services rather than try to help resolve the issue and accept there was a problem have opened up a never ending e mail argument saying basically we followed procedures over and over again This has become a matter of principle now What ever you do if you are buying a tesla expect no customer service after you pay or better still buy a car from a company who cares Tesla simply dont care once they have your money and you have their car

Title: Poor Show TESLA
Content: Just bought a new Tesla Model Y collected it on 25th March and have found out if I had collected it 2 days layer i would have received 3000 free miles via supercharger credits Called Tesla they are not prepared to honour this in any way poor show Tesla

Title: Most expensive tyre ever
Content: I had a flat tyre on the motorway in my Tesla Model 3 Service took a long time to address the issue but eventually was towed home under warranty but this is not the issue I had difficultly locating a tyre Tesla have one in stock but are trying to charge me a 996 02 to replace the tyre and won't return any of my calls to discuss the issue I purchased one elsewhere for 226 Extremely poor customer service never experienced anything this bad steer well clear That would be nearly 4000 for a set of tyres Thank good I don't need tracking and wheel balancing I would have to sell my house

Title: Worst experience I've had
Content: Worst experience I've had of buying anything ever Avoid My peugot 205 gave me less grief than this f king thing

Title: I had a flat tire
Content: I had a flat tire Called for service Was told by the Tesla Dealership in WLA at 5840 Centinela Ave they would have a tire in a week Are you kidding no tires A Tesla dealership I had to take an Uber to a tire store pickup a tire It was all day affair and now it s taking an hour to install There response sign a third party waiver pay 65 installation fee which took 30 minutes to generate the paperwork and I m still waiting to have them install the tire If I could ve drove it to the tire store I would have Never again would get Tesla I owned 3 before and now I find this out about the tires Lucky I wasn t in the Mohave Desert

Title: Repeated cancellation for delivery
Content: Repeated cancellation for delivery No customer service I would give 0 if there was an option

Title: DO NOT GET A TESLA FROM THIS STOKE ON
Content: DO NOT GET A TESLA FROM THIS STOKE ON TRENT DEALERSHIP after purchasing a brand new Tesla Y Performance and driving 2 5 hours to pick up the car Arrived 10 mins early than my scheduled 2 pm slot I asked one of the younger members of the team that I have come to collect my car who informed me the manager would be over shortly 30 mins passed still no manager goes AWOL I saw a car of the same colour and was the performance model in the showroom with people in it and a young child jumping up and down over the seats I said to my mate jokingly I bet that is my car it had mud on the wheels and was in the showroom so I asked a staff member where my car was he informed me out the back and said I would like to inspect it Then he came back and apologized and informed me that the car with muddy wheels and people and kids have been jumping about in it was actually mine So I purchase a car worth over 61k and Tesla cannot be bothered to get this cleaned or removed from public use The manager of the day did not reappear the young guys that have only been at this showroom just over 12 weeks apologized and said he would take it and get it cleaned asap now over 2 hours in and the manager is more interested in trying to sell another car than actually deliver the car to me This is totally shocking again the young guys basically running the showroom were a credit however the manager for the day was an absolute joke it was like being looked after by Mr Bean if he worked for Tesla Still have two scratches in my car which waiting for Tesla services to resolve after sending pictures on Saturday via app and again on Monday to resolve this So maybe it s a case of once sold the car no need to deal with the customer anymore Do not expect a reply as could not even give customer service Oh sorry I forgot about the total lack of customer service was given a cheap plastic umbrella and two tesla mugs and sent on my way No wonder Tesla shares are down with service like this

Title: UK Review Model 3
Content: Model 3 Performance arrived from dealer scratched in multiple places vehicle delivery driver reported this on collection and was told to deliver anyway Pre inspection of vehicles prior to delivery is clearly very poor I am now waiting for a further 2 months for the vehicle to be repaired there's no room for movement on a repair date and Tesla have shown very little interest or care I love the car but really dislike the hands off impersonal approach to resolving issues The technician who visited my home address for initial inspection was pleasant and helpful but the Tesla app for all service issues feels disconnected and it's not even worth attempting to call the service centre Work to be done here as this experience is enough to cause me to look elsewhere when replacing our other car It's currently a BMW and at this point will stay that way

Title: Pathetic service and useless UK team
Content: Pathetic service and useless UK team dealing with delivery

Title: Worst car buying experience of my life
Content: Sad to say that after 6 years owning a Model S with overall excellent experience when buying a new Model Y in the UK it's like a different company Absolutely abysmal system of allocating collection dates where estimated dates bear no resemblance to actual dates offered I have now had to lose allocation of the car twice because I was unable to collect on the appointed day despite in the latest experience paying in full already and insuring the car then finding myself stuck in Europe 3 days longer than expected Tried to delay collection just 3 days and they're not interested Even reallocated my car to someone else 2 days before what was to be my collection day I'm absolutely furious about this ridiculous system and due to estimated dates going forward it now looks like I'll be on holiday cruising Alaska when my next collection week is offered although due to estimated and actual dates being unrelated I am still unable to plan another collection in what will be 2 more months Tesla no longer seem to care about their customer relations and if I could buy this car in another way from somewhere else I would If there was a Zero star rating they would get one from me

Title: If I could give this company a 1000 I
Content: If I could give this company a 1000 I would I purchased my home three years ago and inherited the solar panels from the previous owner From the moment I began to transfer this account into my name to this very moment this company has done nothing but hold things back for me Most recently I have been receiving texts and calls to schedule maintenance on my panels and each time I attempt to schedule an appointment it directs me to their app An app that does not allow me to schedule anything it only gives me options to look at their products which after what I ve dealt with with them I wouldn t NEVER purchase a thing from this company For a company that receives billions of dollars you d think they would make scheduling something so minor less of an inconvenience It s quite appalling

Title: Best electric car ever made
Tesla is a lump of brown sticky icky
Content: Tesla is a lump of brown sticky icky smell fat lump of poo hole plopenspila poo Elon musk is a fat lump of poo hole and im going to flush his head down a sticky pooey toilet Electric cars are manky like ur mum

Title: Tesla service
Content: When I bought my Model S it was one of the first Teslas on the road The customer service was great Service advisors were personable and very helpful making you feel welcome and valuable Different now the best word to describe is Horrible I had service scheduled few weeks out when I came with my car for service was told no loaner and that I am on my own for transportation talking to service advisors is like dealing with robots Looking forward to other companies coming with EV s perhaps competition will be good I do love my car so for now not much to chose from very disappointing and not encouraging to get the new one How far this company has fallen in every way is very disappointing and depressing

Title: A lesson in how not to treat customers
Content: A disastrous experience in collecting our Model Y Couldn't get the system to accept company details and had to call Reading to get them to do it they were actually helpful Then when I clicked the button to get payment details it didn't work and I had to use a different browser Call yourselves tech led you are a disgrace

Title: Poor costumer service in the Kennesaw GA location
Content: Poor costumer service in the Kennesaw GA location The salesman Eli was no help Really disappointed with the lack of customer service for such an expensive vehicle Youtube was more helpful for understanding the vehicle than those who worked there

Title: very nice
Don't expect to be treated like a customer
Content: It's clear that Tesla doesn't care about their customers The ordering pickup system is an algorithm driven by text messages They demand you adhere to their timing Car was delivered dirity They didn't even provide a full electric charge Spent absolutely no time in going over the cars operations Didn't offer to answer any questions if you had one I won't buy another Tesla and will likely trade it out once another model comes along I like despite their large lead in charging Arrogance and contempt does not a brand make

Title: Tesla Nottingham UK
Content: Tesla Nottingham UK Technician Rebeka was great 5 stars for her alone Tried to resolve my issue but Tesla had a supply issue with required tyres Generally don t like the whole experience Very impersonal Seems like sales is priority and after sales is an after thought Feels too dystopian for me Really like my Tesla but will look seriously at competition when changing cars Maybe Elon is too busy tweeting random stuff to realise that you can t just code customer service Leaving the door open for competitors who must be replicating all the great aspects of a Tesla Not too late but someone needs to advise Elon rather than bow down in subservient awe

Title: Worst experience in my life time and I
Content: Worst experience in my life time and I am 40 years old unacceptable and biggest liars I have faced in my life time

Title: If I could give less than one star
Content: If I could give less than one star I would Car is great customer service HORRIBLE I may not get another Tesla for this reason IMPOSSIBLE to get anyone on the phone I moved to another state and had to wait 4 weeks to get paperwork transferred When I received the documents there was one form lease agreement missing Yes my lease agreement is in my phone but the new state needs an original notarized document this was requested with the other paperwork Have been waiting on Tesla to get back to me as I ride around with expired tags

Title: Tesla is no longer a premium experience
Content: When I bought my first Model S it was one of the first Teslas on the road in the UK The customer service was incredible I was made to feel like a really valuable customer Now with my second car recently out of warranty I am stuck sitting in the Tesla Reading service centre exchanging text message with an engineer who hasn't bothered to talk to me looking down the barrel of 1000 for a new heating system being told I can't have a courtesy car without paying because my car is out of warranty and that I'll be lucky if it's fixed today How far this company has fallen in every way is very depressing

Title: purchase a high ticket item then they gone
Content: If you purchase a high ticket item you might expect the ability to discuss the product delivery etc But not Tesla Once you sign the contract your helpful sales person disappears and they no longer are available by phone So be aware once they get you to sign and put up funds theyu are gone you now are at the mercy of computer generated directing you to website So good luck with particulars HORRIBLE

Title: Tesla Model Y Delivery
Content: Took delivery of my new Tesla Model Y Performance from Tesla Glasgow last week The car was perfect no panel gaps poor paint etc and the handover was quick and easy The car is superb to drive has no rattles and the interior was spotless The whole process from ordering to delivery has been smooth and stress free Buying a car from Tesla is a different experience to a legacy manufacturer but they make this clear from the outset e g you have to watch the online videos about how to operate the car before delivery day So far so good

Title: Just dropoff car n no orientation
Content: Deliver guy just dropoff car on driveway after texting us that person just vanished No orientation no explanation on controls n features in the car Tesla Y Being first time owner of Tesla took us a long time even to open the car door Ridiculous service for a 65000 car

Title: Extremely poor Tesla customer experience
Content: The measure of a company is not when things are going well but rather when there is an issue that needs solving we have purchased two Tesla s in the past 12 months Tesla Car Company has and is enjoying a good run Perhaps that is why their poor customer experience has gone under the radar Or perhaps since the dealerships have been eliminated there is not a face of the company that cares enough about the customer to resolve issues Whatever the explanation Teslas end game is pay us more money so we can resolve your problem and get you back on the road That came directly from the Bellevue service manager If you are the handful of Tesla owners that never have a problem then please move to the next review If you are considering a Tesla we suggest moving on to Lexus or Audi We have owned them both both are outstanding cars customer experiences

Title: I'd rather have root canal treatment
Content: The term master slave is common in tech and engineering vernacular I've heard it's also used in certain social circles that I've seen programmes about on TV but of which I haven't had any personal experience Well that was until I bought a Model Y which I finally picked up last week Let's get one thing clear straight away I've bought an EV for tax purposes That's it Several years ago I bought Priuses but after someone tapped on my window one day and asked me if I could take them somewhere and another occasion when I was parked on the side of the road answering some texts and my rear passenger door opened and a mother and her daughter started to get in I decided to go back to SUVs of the gas guzzling type But recently I've decided to dip my toes again into the environmentally ignore the devastating consequences of mining friendly waters of the EV scene I see so many Teslas around the streets there must be something good about them I thought And the tax breaks are still pretty good And they're the longest range and best value of EV SUVs They're not really SUVs as the IRS has recently said and I have to agree with them I can get my big dog comfortably in the back of any of my previous SUVs but there's no way he'd fit in this thing But let's get onto the buying and handover experience First of all the website wouldn't take a credit card payment so I had to drive miles in my gas guzzling SUV to a Tesla store where the assistant did some website workaround because the website doesn't work properly in order to take my deposit And then I waited With weeks to go I was contacted by the finance company and did all the paperwork All good so far Tesla then bombarded me with multiple emails and texts asking me to complete financial paperwork which I'd already done And then with days to go until the handover Tesla sent me a text asking me to make the initial payment through the website So I went to the website and My car had gone They'd cancelled my order Nothing there Just an invitation to choose which Tesla I wanted to buy Now this was in the evening and you'd think that as a global tech company they'd have global 24 7 service Oh no It's 9 5 Monday to Friday in your own country I mean seriously But we sorted that out during office hours with the finance company not with Tesla and I had a collection date and time I was all excited I love it when you go to pick up a new vehicle and the salesperson who's been looking after you through the process takes you around your beautiful new machine which might have cost you over a hundred thousand whatevers You know how the experience is when you unwrap a new electronic device that's designed in California but built in China and whose name I'd better not mention here in case it gets deleted Well I expected the same with my brand new Tesla Y long range The Tesla showroom at my pick up location is a container in a car parking lot There were three standing tables with assistants standing behind each one and a small table with some gross Tesla branded merchandise including a creepy looking soiled Tesla decanter I mean who on earth in a car company that goes on so much about safety thought that a branded container for alcohol would be a good idea for merch If you haven't seen one Google it They really do exist And now let me describe to you my handover experience I was excited After giving me the black Tesla cards the sales assistant started the handover She pointed to the parking lot and said That's yours over there That was it I'm not tech slouch I've founded and built a tech startup before I'm OK with tech But it was a full 30 minutes before I could figure out how to make this thing move and find the switch to turn off the hazard lights But once I got it going it was actually quite fun to drive But it came with only 44 charge which went down to 28 after driving only 15 miles OK I thought the battery needs to be woken up a bit So I went to try to charge it I tried six different charging points but it wouldn't charge in any of them I spend around 36 hours over this weekend just gone trying to figure out how to charge the thing Eventually I came across an article talking about rebooting So I thought I'd give that a go I rebooted my car Who'd have thought that would be a thing But it seemed like a cool techy idea so I rebooted it and it worked So my brand new car with 15 miles on the clock is now re charging And it's gone from 26 to 71 in just under a day Yep 20 hours Not looking good so far which brings me back to the master slave analogy I can't help but feel like I'm the slave here and my master in California or Texas or wherever is having a laugh at my expense while I have shiny white Model Y lodged up my fundament glacially charging

Title: Tesla Lack of Customer service
Content: New 2023 models that are delivered after the first quarter no longer comes with the charging cable which cost 250 extra to purchase Charging at home requires installation cost of between 1500 3000 to acquire a qualified electrician to install the wall charger which cost 750 from Tesla That's a good couple of years maintenance cost spent which could of helped with maintenance cost on a lower cost hybrid Don't understand how companies can do this these days its like apple stating we can sell you a phone but the charging cable for the phone will be an additional 500 I was willing to overlook this and still proceed with placing an order and committing 400 However when I did something went wrong and I was unable to receive referral credits on a promotional program When I called customer service to gain assistance they advised that they are not able to assist I asked for an escalation which they place me on hold of 30 minutes and came back to state they did and the answer is still cant help you and you just have to cancel your order if you don't like it which results in a forfeit the 400 deposit

Title: Sales manager at Seaside office
Content: Sales manager at Seaside office Joseph he said would not help with getting a vin number on a car that was purchased for insurance policy When told we needed to confirm the vin on the car He refused get the owner to take a picture of the vin on the car We need it to send proof of insurance we don t give out info asks for sale manager he said I m the sales manager and hung up the phone

Title: I got a 2023 Tesla Model Y 7 seater the
Content: I got a 2023 Tesla Model Y 7 seater the windows where loose the seats have no power I requested a service call on it its been over a month they keep pushing it back and canceling me

Title: Worst service ever sounds right
Content: Worst service ever sounds right My first online shopping experience with Tesla Ordered Mobile charger from the website and received an unprotected ripped box with used or demo charger with visible marks and scratches Contacted support by submitting return request and have not receive anything for the past two days Sent additional two separate emails same thing no replies This company is not serious and I'm regretting my choice of purchasing their product

Title: Worst service ever
Content: I have purchased three Tesla cars over the last 8 years I thought I was a valued good customer I have never experienced such poor customer service from any car manufacturer ever This company does not care about customers anymore didn t start out that way but that s the reality now I will NEVER buy another Tesla not because it s a bad product because they just don t care My service center is Palm Beach Fl I have tried since early December to have my car serviced I have had many appointments and several days prior to appointment they reschedule Brought the car to them 4 times still not fully repaired because they don t have parts How do you make an appointment for service and the center gives you a date time and cost but they can t fulfill the agreement Told the service guy Rolando I m picking up my car hope to never come back He says we hope to never see you again This is what Tesla says to a customer who has spend around 350 000 with them Shamefull

Title: I thought Saturday was going to be a
Content: I thought Saturday was going to be a great day as I picked up my brand new 2023 model Y Tesla I had done my research test drove a vehicle watched a number of video tutorials I was ready to go I went to the Chesterfield MO dealership and signed the papers Everything seemed fine as I was driving down the interstate However as I got near Busch Stadium the car just started to decelerate Some weird things showed up on the dashboard about the emergency brake being deactivated and I m just trying to hit the gas and it is not moving I ended up in the fast lane on the middle of the Poplar Street bridge with a car that wouldn t move I was panicking and tried to call the Tesla dealership to ask what I needed to do I ended up getting the phone directory nightmare and pressed the number for service It informed me I needed to go to service through my Tesla app only I called back and asked to go through sales It would ring and no one picked up I called 911 as I am hearing cars slamming on their brakes around me to avoid hitting me on the middle of the bridge 911 dispatched an emergency vehicle and they towed dragged my new car off of the bridge and parked it on the median at East St Louis the tow guys were FANTASTIC I finally got through to Tesla and they just said I needed to tow it back to the dealership and they could look at it on Monday since the service department was closed over the weekend I explained again that it was a BRAND NEW VEHICLE JUST OFF THE TRUCK what on earth was going on I told them I could have been killed on the Poplar Street bridge There didn t seem to be much concern he just told me to have them tow it I said I can t even get it started it won t go out of park No help again I finally contacted Tesla support text only by the way through the app to get emergency tow service They sent me a link so I could reset the dashboard It didn t work Then I was informed there will be a two hour wait for the tow to come All via text no person talking to me The emergency roadside assistance gentleman said I should get a friend to pick me up and bring me back out to the Tesla dealership When I got to the Chesterfield MO Tesla dealership they seemed very casual about it I told him I had been trying to reach the dealership to figure out about the tow and whether I should come back to the dealership myself and no one answered my call He informed me Well we had a lot of people in here about 20 minutes ago We just couldn t pick up the phone it should have gone to the National line I m really sorry How is this Tesla service I am appalled at the terror I had to experience because no one would talk me through what I needed to do Horrible horrible frightening nightmare experience Buyer beware

Title: Just don't do it
Content: Just don't do it I scheduled a service call one week in advance for between 8am 12pm The day before the service they switched the appointment to 12 5 They showed up at 1 00 after I left with the car Apparently they had overbooked Impossible to get a straight answer and the only method of communication is using their app so every message takes an huor to get a response which usually doesn't actually answer the question so you need to write again and wait another hour for another incomplete response

Title: Will not be buying a tesla
Content: Will not be buying a tesla Placed a pre order with deposit over 14 months ago and had nothing in terms of communication from the company So I went on website to make contact to retrieve my deposit and its nigh on impossible to find any contact details for the company poor customer service

Title: I purchased solar panels with Tesla
Content: I purchased solar panels with Tesla January 2022 and since the my electric bill has not changed Tesla has come out five times in a year to energy system issue A week later you get another email saying the system is faulty My system remains faulty I continue to pay high energy bills and Tesla has done nothing to resolve the issue You purchase Tesla panels at your own risk I will highly advise againstanyone purchasing Tesla solar products It s a sham

Title: I love tesla cars
Tesla preorder is scam to make some
Content: Tesla preorder is scam to make some extra money tru nonrefundable deposit fees they discriminate buyers based on their job title They clearly said you don t qualify and denies for Tesla loan based on the fact that I m a for hire service driver and they don t approve financing for Uber Lyft drivers There are 1000s of people with same title and they are ordering Tesla wasting their deposit fees if they want to finance with Tesla Tesla knows and never mentions in their order agreement the condition that to qualify for Tesla loan there is exception for transport drivers job applications they hide this and if you apply being a transportation driver and order giving your deposit then they will definitely deny you and you will lose your time and efforts and deposit money for sure Don t spend your time and money for such scams dear drivers

Title: Customer service sucks
Content: on Jan 30th I purchased snow chains for 19 tires Model Y during UPS shipping they have been MIA and WORST tesla customer service are also MIA since they don t reply to the emails It is very dissapointing the poor ciatomer service

Title: Purveyor of junk
Content: I must ve had a frontal lobotomy to even think about buying a Tesla with all the lousy reviews of this company Membership of the angry owners club appears to be growing by the minute Their vehicles are a joke the build quality is crap they don t do half the things they claim to do for instance FSD which is just blatant make believe and the backup service from Tesla is utterly appalling The man who owns this joke of a company clearly talks out of his backside and must be either deluded brain dead or simply used to hoodwinking Americans The sooner this manufacturer of electric junk and wild fantasies goes out of business the better If you want an EV buy one from anyone else other than Tesla

Title: Terrible Delivery Experience Tysons Corner Location
Content: First let me say I do not enjoy writing negative reviews as I too am a business owner but people should know about this I do apologize about the length of this reviewI had a delivery date of a MY on Feb 6th one day prior I got a text saying the car would not be there then and moved the date till Feb 13th OK there could have been logistics issues since it was a Fremont build I get it On the 11th I go to the Tysons Location to get the car I was told once I went in the red door around the side go inspect your car and if you like it accept it and drive away I did inspect it and everything seemed fine except I noticed some issues with the paint that appeared to be under the clear coat I got a representative to come out and take pictures It just so happened she was also in charge of the paint shop and made a ticket for me and said it would take 2 5 days I left the car asked for Tesla to get an Uber as my wife came with me but had other commitments in Tysons The representative said she would be in touch with me throughout the week to let me know how the repairs were going and possibly they might get the car fixed before 5 days Yesterday I finally did get a VM from the Tesla representative that they did not have the issues straightened out and they were going to push the delivery date out I looked in the app and it is now Feb 25th Come on they can build one of these cars in like 1min I am fairly certain what happened was they did nothing and saw me on the delivery schedule for the next day and actually started to get these issues in motion to be fixed The Tesla rep did not contact me during the week and only did the day before delivery This review was earned and with this experience I would advise to pick up at a different location Their QC at the Tysons location did not initially catch the very apparent paint issues and their response has been far from acceptable Bad reviews are usually earned and they earned what is the lowest possible rating with behavior like this

Title: Yet again poor service from Tesla
Content: Yet again poor service from Tesla Called to ask the price of a service and MOT for my 3 year model 3 Told that Tesla do not do MOT's Why they don t know It does not seem customer focused to me Regarding the Service they said until they see the car they cant give a price Seems odd every other manufacture is able to give basic service costs with a caveat that parts and labour could be additional cost if they find faults

Title: They are great cars
Content: They are great cars great range and charging network Just don t have any type of accident as you will be off the road for months All the parts go into making the cars not the spare network Very painful All in all would buy again literally because of the charging network and zero fuss interior

Title: Love my new Model Y
Content: Love my new Model Y it's definitely the best car I've ever had It's like an iPhone on wheels After one month no problems or complaints the quality has been excellent

Title: Appalling customer service and buying
Content: Appalling customer service and buying experience I bought model Y in December 22 firstly they charged me more than the offer price Secondly I was offered a compensation for price difference but Tesla failed to honour their promise to give compensation still waiting and after contacting multiple times and waiting long times on the phone and talking to a different person every time and going through the full complaint story many times now Tesla refusing to honour the agreed compensation blatantly Thirdly when I went to collect the car on the agreed date and time with my little kids who were excited to get new car I was told that I can't collect car due to some documentation which they could have informed me before my collection date don't care about customers It's really hurting to make this mistake of buying Tesla Never again and would recommend others to avoid it as well and save yourself from pathetic customer service and purchase experience

Title: I would strongly recommend avoiding
Content: I would strongly recommend avoiding this company First The text they sent me says that the collection is self service so no one is expected to give you the car Second They don't ensure that the car is going to be charged When I asked why they said there is no wall charger in the dealerThird They canceled the collection two days before and they refused to give me the 200 back in case of cancellation of the contract from my side even though it was their fault I can only imagine how bad the service is going to be from now on This is a rip off when you compare it with other car dealers like Mercedes

Title: Never again
Content: Never again Have 2 Teslas Rip off Used to be a keen Tesla advocate They just don't care about their customersOrdered a model Y in July Got it in Dec No parking sensor and no body had a decency to let me know Apparently they can change anything without telling the customer Very rude customer support Never will buy a Tesla again

Title: Test drive for Model x
Content: I booked a test drive for Model xDuring my short journey a decade to stop and look at the car outside The car block me outside and didn't open I called the emergency Tesla lines and after waiting for 15min someone answered and advised me to go to the dilership somehow by taxi may be and to asc there for help and disconnect the line After another 15min I successfully explained to another person over the phone and after that the Northampton dilership call me back and opened the car Extremely unsatisfied Bad Bad customer service No explanation from the boys at the dilership Don't go for Tesla Extremely unreliable

Title: ripoff and misleading
Content: It is a total ripoff Purchased brand new vehicle y long range a couple months ago for sticker price of 60k Upon doing a trade in review after 3k miles found more than a third worth of vehicle price already gone Seems like the manufacturer itself doesn't have faith in it's own product Apart from obvious quality issues ride quality as well is subpar for the price point Genuinely disappointed

Title: 250 non refundable order fee
Content: 250 non refundable order fee I order my car with a FebruaryMarch delivery date which is needed currently to take advantage of the 7500 federal tax credit The tax credit that Tesla advertises on their site to bring in buyers Place my order and a week later the delivery date changes to April May which may eliminate the tax credit all together Best part is if I put the same exact car in my cart on their site it still says March delivery Scam Lies Sounds like a giant scam to get sales going Then the customer service is impossible to get a hold of I m going to cancel and just eat the 250 not the type of company I want to do business with

Title: Shoddy non existent service
Content: In regards to their solar panels for residential installs their service is substandard Had an issue with the maintenance where one of the workers damaged a skylight during the panel installation and was left hanging for two weeks with no update on the repair Now the fun really began when TRYING to contact support their online chat support is a joke and the rep was very unprofessional and left the chat open with no replies back on further inquiries Then came the PAINFUL roulette of trying to get a live specialist on the phone which I'm still waiting on btw after 30min Elon Musk you're going to need to go to Mars to duck the angry customers you have created with your shoddy support structure Highly disappointed but this what service is now in this whacked out time we are living in

Title: Don't trust Tesla
Content: Don't trust Tesla Tesla pressured me to take delivery of my Model Y prior to the end of December 2022 I gave them my money and took delivery December 30 Less than 2 weeks later they drop the price by 20 000 Tesla gave no warning of this and when I finally got someone to communicate with me they refuse to provide me any compensation for the 20 loss in value They have also degraded the features I thought I would get such as proximity warnings a feature I had on my older much less expensive previous car They say Tesla Vision is coming but so far it is vaporware just like their Full Self Driving FSD they have been selling and promising for years

Title: Shocking service
