weeks after that I had the vehicle wrapped in clear paint protection film In April the vehicle's security module failed which made the car unable to open or power on The vehicle was towed to Tesla in Raleigh and sat there for around 10 days waiting on the part and eventual repair Between then and June I had several more issues a piece of wheel trim literally fell off for no reason trim on the bottom of the vehicle on the passenger side was falling off falcon wing door issue was still present one of the rear seatbelts had the buckle installed backwards so the belt had to be twisted to be buckled received intermittent safety restraint failure issues and my keys occasionally would stop working I dropped the car off on Sunday night July 10th for a 8 15 am July 11th service appointment By noon on July 11th I had not heard from anyone and checked my Tesla app to see that the car had not been accessed or moved After several texts via the app they told me they didn't realize my car was there and would start the repairs soon At 3pm they told me they couldn't access the car and needed the keys my wife dropped the keys off around 3 30 and a short time later I was told the service would be performed on July 12th and car would be ready by the end of the day On July 12th I realized I had not received any communication from them and at 3 00 I checked the app and the car still had not been accessed or moved They then informed me that they were having trouble accessing the car and would likely need it until Friday July 15th They did not provide a loaner and were unable to get me a rental car so I was without a car this whole period with only 100 day in uber credits July 15th came and went with no communication and I noticed the estimated repair date was shifted to the following Monday The following Monday they shifted the ETA to Friday Friday they told me the car should be repaired by this Monday July 25th The security module had failed a second time along with all of the other repairs On July 26th I got a message that the car was ready and that due to the module replacement I would have to repair my keys with the car I texted them and asked where the keys would be located as I was picking up after hours and was told I would need to make an appointment to have my keys re paired with the vehicle and they needed at least 72 hours notice So because of a faulty part that had to be replaced which un paired my keys I now have to make another appointment at the service center just to get my key fobs repaired back with the vehicle I was also told that the falcon wing door issue is being caused by the paint protection film and will not be addressed under warranty I have tried on 3 4 different occasions to call them and left voicemails each time with no returned calls I loved the car but after this experience I have sold the car and went back to Range Rover I would strongly advise against buying a Tesla until they get their build quality issues under control and are able to hire competent staff

Title: Poor quality meets poor service This is a non luxury technology
Content: I ve had a Tesla model X for five years I ve watched the customer service deteriorate from luxury car standards befitting a six figure purchase to a standard worse than what I remember my Honda dealer gave me The build quality has always been poor the saving grace was with less moving parts there was less to go bad Over time engineering defects came to light with structural components of the car unable to bear the increased torque and acceleration the car was famous for Unfortunately as the car has deteriorated with stock bin components rusting a huge expansion in ownership of lower cost models meant that the profit margin has decreased pressure on employees has increased and the service quality has dropped precipitously Now everybody is being treated like they have bought an entry level car and should be grateful to have a Tesla at all Frankly at this point I dread dealing with service issues through their God awful app and found going to the dealership only a marginally better way of communicating the car s service needs and minimizing the impact of losing my mode of transport When I mentioned this to the beleaguered service advisor at my local Tesla service station his reply was We have too many customers coming in per day There is no comparison between Tesla today and 5 years ago At this point instead of being customer oriented Tesla employees attitude is take it or leave it As soon as there is another car offering similar technology with better quality and service trust me I will take that

Title: We ordered model Y in March and it s
Content: We ordered model Y in March and it s almost 6 months now and we haven t received the car This is not the only issue it s the amount of lies we ve been told and the lack of accountability from the customer service team We couldn t even ask to be transferred to a manger Really regret ordering a Tesla

Title: Tesla Fort Lauderdale
Content: Tesla Fort Lauderdale BUYER BEWARE AVOID THIS LOCATION AT ALL COSTS Worst car buying experience of my life Initially rejected the first delivery due to damage to the vehicle after being lied to about it then accepted delivery on the 2nd vehicle which also required minor repairs but agreed to bring in for service Overall my car was in service 3 separate times total time about 3 4 weeks because each time they repaired something they damaged something else no exaggeration have before and after services photos to prove it Staff there is so inconsiderate actually made fun of us behind our back when they thought we weren t looking and disrespectful with special emphasis on Andre the manager and not at all what you expect to get when buying a luxury car It s a shame that this is how Tesla is managing their business i e rookie employees that cause additional damage to the vehicle rude staff that doesn t really care to make your buying experience a pleasant one Bad management combined with employee negligence is all you will get from this location Save yourself the trouble and pray another location is better managed

Title: Worst Service Delay and Communication Ever
Content: I am at 11 days and counting for Tesla to still not even work on my Model 3 At Jacksonville FL service center They also made me tow it through my insurance vs their roadside for a clear defect undercarriage protection fell off documented TSB on this issue After it has sat for 10 days I get a text at 3 30 telling me they can't fix it today Tesla needs to focus not only on pushing out new cars but actually servicing their loyal base

Title: TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE
Content: TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE My left camera stopped working and I got a technician come over to replace it He left 3 dents surrounding the camera from installation and I didn't catch it within 24 hours so the lady over the phone said she won't be able to fix it because it could be from outside damage It can't I sent a picture and explained how that's clearly from the camera replacement She talks about how her Tesla has chips and dents on the hood from driving I didn't ask about her driving capability also the hood is more understandable for that excuse it's the side left camera Rocks don't come flying sideways and not perfectly surrounding the camera Please be careful if any technician comes to replace anything on your Tesla CHECK not just to see if the problem is resolved but if anything else is damaged in the process

Title: Worst customer service experienced
Content: Worst customer service experienced Waited 2 40 hours for the Roadside service to arrive and after I provided the proper wheel size they delivered the wrong wheel size loaner Based on numerous phone calls made to Tesla Service team in Buena Park it took more than three days to learn that the wheel was delivered to a different Tesla Service location and still do not have a wheel status update Terrible experience

Title: Tesla refund don t hold your breath
Content: I Bought a Tesla online and returned it within the 14 day cooling off periodI have been trying to obtain my refund of 50k since 15 April Despite numerous chases and assurances from the Company that payment would be made on various dates No sign of my money just empty promisesNow have to insruct solicitors

Title: Telsa you seriously need to inform the
Content: Telsa you seriously need to inform the Manager Janina lesson on etiquette at Crawley branch I was booked for a Model Y demo and left in plenty time to reach by 10 15 unfortunately got stuck behind few tractors doing 25 down A27 Called at 10 15 informing appointment booked for 10 30 but running 15 mins late the gentleman very kind said no problem just make your way and I shall inform the branch Reached 10 45am and gentleman in front of me speaking with the Manager on the counter I received a call from Tesla lady spoke it is 10 50am and you cannot go out for test drive rebook and we can only show you a model Y I replied excuse me I called to inform and was informed to proceed to come Lady on call said well rebook please drove 1 hour and got that response Lady at desk Jeanie I informed what happened and she straight away checked and email was received well in advance to inform but of course the Sales lady and Manager ignored email Jeanie went to inform Manager what had happened and answer rebook as fully booked are you kidding me Manager could not even come to greet me but why she cares I am just time waster Jeanie immediately spoke with Girgis and this gentleman without any hesitation said don't go anywhere let me sort this out right now Between Jeanie and Girgis amazing service 5 star but I cannot give as Janina will get credit being the Manager Girgis booked 12pm slot for Model Y and asked us why not test drive Model X get the feel and once back grab coffee and let us discuss your experience etc WOW WOW what service Once back Jeanie very kind asked the experience driving and and Girgis showed us various different specs and models available Once 12 pm handed the model y and we were away Actual fact we enjoyed driving the Model y and more important the professionalism shown by Girgis and Jeanie Booked our car I wish to ask Tesla UK I was very very disappointed with the disrespect and ignorance from Janina as if was a ghost I would not have bought a Tesla if it was not for Girgis and Jeanie please take appropriate action

Title: I hesitate to give Tesla any stars
Content: I hesitate to give Tesla any stars I want to be clear that I have owned a 2017 Model S for several years and I love driving the car However Tesla customer service is Missing In Action It is nearly impossible to reach a live human being to ask a question or clarify an issue The customer has to use the mobile app or website and then hope for a response I had a breakdown in the car in 2021 that was a drive train issue coolant system malfunctioned and shut the power off Because I was out of the general warranty Tesla told me I had to arrange for my own tow which I did Once I picked up the car it took several days to get it repaired Not 10 miles from the service center the car malfunctioned again ON THE FREEWAY Luckily I was able to exit the freeway and get to a safe parking spot Again I called Tesla and they refused to arrange a tow for me because I was out of the general warranty I explained that the issue was related to the drive train and thus covered by the 100 000 mile warranty The robotic person I spoke with could not even check the repair record to confirm that and I had to arrange a tow by myself I have not had a really good customer experience with Tesla and they want every contact with customers to be electronic Tesla is doing its best to eliminate people to assist in customer service I will be trading in my Tesla next year and buy a new EV By the way check out the ratings of all Teslas on Consumer Reports other than the Model 3 the other models are getting putrid reviews recently

Title: Tesla Solar Roof owner
Content: Tesla Solar Roof owner Technology is great hence the second star Gave a 10 000 down payment back in October of 2021 and they apparently have no idea where this bank check is that was deposited by Tesla I confirmed this by phone back in October yet they can't seem to respond or find this payment I feel like I call into a frat house every time I call and get no where This company has no support To rate their support would be impossible as it is non existent Next step is to pay a lawyer to write them a letter I guess 6th largest company by market capitol in the world How is this even possible I'm embarrassed for them

Title: Waiting 18 months for my Tesla
Content: I have been buying Teslas since the beginning of this company I ordered a new Model X in August 2021 The estimated delivery was April 2022 I thought waiting 8 months for a new car felt like purchasing in a 3rd world country In January 2022 I get a note from Tesla saying my car delivery has been moved to July 2022 Now it s 11 months to get my car In May 2022 Tesla sent me another note stating delivery of my car has been moved again to December February 2023 REALLY Now I m looking at between 16 18 months to get my car and I don t live in an economically depressed country I live in the US Since Tesla will not allow anyone to contact them only to order a vehicle nothing more and the Tesla centers are unable or unwilling to provide any help I sit in the dark dumbfounded while I wait for Tesla to throw me any breadcrumb of info at their convenience It would not surprise me if Tesla sent another note pushing my delivery out to 2 full years I guess Tesla s pervasive disdain for their customers extends beyond horrible customer service to include discarding customers by their sales department I just can t see how this can be a viable long term business model

Title: Our brand new car has 8 different types
Content: Our brand new car has 8 different types of problems 1 passenger side seat is loose and falling apart2 massager side phone charger is not working3 trunk is loose and making ratteling sound4 water goes inside the trunk5 model 3 sight has not been installed in the car since beginning6 4 people in the house hold can t connect there phone in the case7 car only turns on with 1 person in the house8 wheels had so many scratches and they had told us that they will fix it but now they are not saying they don t have any documents saying that they are gonna fix it

Title: Tesla M3 is fun to drive but after sales is non existant
Content: Tesla M3 is fun to drive However mine failed with a charging fault after about a month from new I took it to Norwich centre for repair My experience with their service team is too long and frustrating to be written here After a month my car is still being diagnosed I am on the verge of just selling the bloody thing back to Tesla The quality of customer service after purchase is just appaling Buy at your risk If you need support after buying one just forget it

Title: On June 24th we received a new Tesla
Content: On June 24th we received a new Tesla model Y After a couple of days we found damages on all 4 hinges and bolts on both doors on the driver's side have a lot of pictures The nature of the damage is such that it is obvious that they did something with the doors it seems that they hit the hinges and bolts with a hammer or like this BUT the question is why When we asked the dealer what exactly they did with this NEW car the answer is that they do not know probably on factory As a result they offer us to repair a NEW car which worth almost 70 000 I don't even have words to describe my disappointment and horror of what is happening We pay 70000 for a NEW car and I get a car with obvious and intentional damages and absolutely unclear reasons for these damages I feel like my family safety is at stake because I don't understand what exactly was done to this car We were not offered to change the car We were not offered even discount I see that tesla doesn t want to change this car but we bought it as NEW and Tesla offers me to REPAIR intentionally damaged NEW car So they sold me not new car but intentionally damaged I have never before felt so regretful that I traded my beautiful BMW X5 for this car of dubious quality more expensive than a BMW Terrible experience And I will share this my experience as much as I can people to know what they can get as a pseudo new vehicle from Tesla

Title: They keep delaying to deliver the car
Content: They keep delaying to deliver the car 1 and 1 and 1 and keep change up to almost a year no contact no phone pick up I would give them 0 for the review

Title: Tesla is fraudulent from my
Content: Tesla is fraudulent from my perspective As a business owner they delivered three 600 00 windshields to us both were completely shattered during transit They gave us silly excuses as to why they can't return the glass that they damaged because they didn't pack the glass correctly their customer service is a joke no phone number to reach anyone at impossible to work with We are out almost 2000 00

Title: Does anyone actually work in their
Content: Does anyone actually work in their Customer Service department Nobody ever answers the phone or replies to emails Customer Service is shocking I can't wait until my contract is up I will never buy or lease a Tesla ever again Those who are thinking of doing it I'd strongly advise against it it really isn't worth it

Title: Not sure how this company is even
Content: Not sure how this company is even coming out on top horrible customer service Any other manufacturers have their phone numbers labeled on their website But not Tesla Biggest scammers out there for your deposits Be aware You can t resell the vehicles you buy from them or youd get banned And technically they still own the software so any mod of the vehicle will get u sued Up until today I ve thought big companies like this won t really argue about deposits made Ya I made a mistake ordering the vehicle without reading the clause I got banned and two orders are none refundable Tesla might be the leader for electric cars But other manufactures are catching up Strongly do not recommend Tesla to anyone Not now not ever Stay away

Title: Stranded with no help from Tesla
Content: We have had our Tesla X for 3 years We drive a lot of miles each week we use the car for deliveries the tax incentive Tesla offered was great My review is about the number of flat tires we have had and the customer service being the absolute worst experience of any company The Great Customer experience used as a selling point is a lie As I was saying we have had 5 flat tires in 3 years and not one time have they ever helped us or assisted in any way They claim they will send someone to help wherever you may be but they won t Never have Yesterday I had another flat tire and called the Tesla customer service with a roadside emergency and was on hold for 45 minutes just to be told they had no service truck who could tow me and basically told me I was F Then at the end of the call he asked me Is there anything else he could help me with in a antagonizing manner I told him he hadn t helped me with anything he told me to Relax The car is barely worth the 1100 00 we pay a month but don t buy one There are virtually no shops who can help you if you get flats or break down and Tesla won t send assistance regardless of their claims they will

Title: Buyer be aware when you buy the car you
Content: Buyer be aware when you buy the car you are signing a contract that you cannot sue them if anything goes wrong with the car You can only go to arbitration which is paid by Tesla A month into buying my Tesla X I have had nothing but aggravation with the Dealer My car was in service for 40 days in a 2 year period of which I was always told most of the problems were not Tesla related I only had 31 000 miles on the car filed a Lemon Law which took 2 years to go to arbitration and I lost the case I just sold the car and it was one of my happiest days

Title: I am so disappointed with Tesla
Content: I am so disappointed with Tesla Terrible customer service Countless delays to delivery schedule and very lengthy calls waiting for customer service to present the same excuses I ordered the Model 3 early Q1 2022 I received delivery date end of May 2022 It was prefect to present my daughter her graduation gift Then the delivery schedule was moved to June 21 25 after I picked and confirmed delivery twice 1 Friday June 24 from 3 5pm delivery location my home I thought I m all sort out then next day I checked in again and delivery date changed to Saturday June 25th at 11 00am and pick up location will be Westheimer Then few hours later I went on my Tesla app and it shows delivery to be scheduled from June 30th the Jul 2nd I was furious and disappointed with all the changes I texted Alex from sale team and asked him to HELP and CONFIRM why the delivery date changed so much He said delivery date now move to June 30 July 2nd I have 2 days to pick up or the vehicle will be assigned to someone else I have planned vacation early July and Tesla will not stick to their delivery date this week I never gave any company low rate like this before I feel Tesla has NO CUSTOMER SERVICE and BROKEN INVENTORY PROCESS Refer RN116694881

Title: Bad customer service and craftsmenship
Content: Bad customer service Ordered car and waited 9 months to arrive After it arrived to Houston I waited 30 more days because it had safety issues and I could not pick it up First missing charging port that safety issue with air bag Had a scheduled pick up that morning just as leaving the house to go pick it up I got message that appointment was rescheduled Now that I received the car trunk door is off center This is crazy after driving MB's and BMW's for over 20 years this feels like such downgrade especially customer service Now that I told them about trunk door being off center they scheduled for someone to come out in 3 weeks

Title: Tesla just lost 2cars a Y and X in 1 Day
Content: My Wife ordered à model Y and myself a X Tesla has a glitch on our account so just to prepare and get the charger installed you need to order it right We can t because it wont accept our credit card even for a small amount that is for the charger After multiple Calls messages no onde calls back Finally we reach out to our sales rep he s been cut off The electrician knows someone who calls back and doesn t know the problem We tell her We are about to chancel 250k of cars with them ho Well they say you re free to do whatever you d like Well here you Go Tesla you just lost 250k of sale Can you just imagine how are things when this car has a problem Reading comments all around and this company is not going in the right direction Hope Elon realises this before it s to late For me it is to late anyway

Title: My husband and I bought a model Y dual
Content: My husband and I bought a model Y dual motor Tesla I was surprised by all the negative reviews We started with the best Jaylen of merrit island Florida He was personable knowledgeable and very patient with both of us My husband has never used a computer I personally had to call customer service to help me with the purchasing process Each time I received a person that helped me navigate the process over the phone When our vehicle arrived we were given another great experience of customer service from Jaylen He is a true company man We love this car We are considering getting another

Title: I would give a lower rating if I could
Content: I would give a lower rating if I could I ordered the Tesla on March 10th Today is June 21st I got a call today saying my car might be here on June 29th I explained I would be on vacation that week and would not return until July 1 3 days after projected delivery The sales rep in Knoxville said they would not hold it because it had to be sold in this quarter Although my contract says I have three days to take delivery He said that didn t matter because that would be in a different quarter no mention of that in the contract This person spoke to his manager and called me back to say they could not hold the car past June 30th 2 days Before today the only communication in 14 weeks other than when my wife went by the store to check on delivery was a text I received on Sunday Morning June 5th saying if I didn t call them by 5 pm that day they would release my car to someone else When I called they asked about my trade I advised there isn t a trade and that it s a cash by for a total of 151 440 00 plus taxes They said it would be delivered sometime late June You would think that a purchase of this amount would allow for a little more customer service This company is the most arrogant company I have ever dealt with I would not suggest buying anything from Tesla Read the reviews

Title: Terrible customer service
Content: Terrible customer service Constant delays to delivery schedule and very lengthy calls to present the same excuses Also will not assist me in selecting a car from their used inventory as an alternative to the car I placed an order for I massively regret placing an order with Tesla RN116968391

Title: Tesla is one of the worst for Tires
Content: Tesla is one of the worst for Tires Unlike most car tires that wear and tear after 60 000 Miles Tesla tire wear and tear after only 15 000 20 000 miles

Title: Lets start with the positives
Content: Lets start with the positivesI visited the cambridge store dealt with an excellent chap called Dan I intended to purchase a car through my business and raised my concerns about how long i had been trading for Dan passed me the no for the underwriters I called them and was assured less than 2 years trading wouldn t be an issue Now for the not so positivesFast forward I placed my deposit I then went to setup the finance and the online gateway between Tesla and Lex auto lease didnt work kept saying there was an error I wasted approx 8 hours over 2 weeks speaking with countless customer service agents Each time they cited a different reason as to the error I received several said it was a known problem Eventually I received an online link to bypass their online gateway Several hours later that day I received an email advising that I couldnt be offered the finance as I had been trading less than 2 years ie different to what I was advised originally had I been informed correctly I wouldn't have placed a deposit in the first place I chased Tesla for a refund they cited that I have no consumer rights as a business but they would speak with a supervisor and call me yesterday No call received You can imagine how I felt I went from being frustrated to being insulted I would have considered trying Tesla again in the future but given the shocking treatment forget it I chased again today and a chap said he would provide a refund I asked for confirmation in writing nothing has been received I m not so sure the money will ever see my bank again somehow I contacted Lex auto lease to raise a complaint as the whole situation was frankly a joke and totally avoidable caused in part by their underwriters Lex then made matters worse and advised the underwriter is not black horse yet every bit of documentation states otherwise including my email which details the registered office for black horse Lex have since advised a complaint has been raised and will be looked into in 8 weeks time The agent on the phone agreed about things being unclear ie acknowledged fault on their part I honestly cannot recommend Tesla as it stands I am out of pocket to the tune of 200 through no fault of my own Whilst the performance of a Tesla might tempt most people to switch to electric please take a long hard think before parting with any money I assure you if you can have these sort of issues at point of sale imagine the issues you might have when something goes horribly wrong with the car Stay well clear of this brand is my advice I hope this review prevents anyone else losing out financially and steers people to more reputable brands

Title: Tesla good at selling abominable service
Content: Tesla have been very good at selling vehicles in the UK and elsewhere I was 'happy' waiting 3 years for my new Model 3 to arrive from 2016 2019 and very excited to receive it There were few Teslas on the road and they had 1 garage in London Today mid 2022 there are 1000's more Tesla cars on the road and still today all they have is just one garage Service is absent and there is no one accountable I've been waiting 3 months for an appointment and now they have informed me I must wait a further month Disgusting

Title: Tesla doesn't refund my 44k
Content: In the mid March I paid Tesla the full amount for a delivery of a Tesla model 3 Since then the delivery got cancelled and 3 months past and Tesla doesn't return my money Every day I call their appalling non existent customer service a new person answers who has no clue about the case they tell me the refund will land on my bank account within 14 days 3 Months past and every day the same story you'll receive it within 14 days This company is a scam It's pure shamble No one is accountable for what happens The call service say they can't connect me to their finance team nor any other person who is higher ranking within the system than a pure call centre person They lie one day they say the system says your refund is done May the 5th and insist that it's already done and dusted Another day they say their system says it's done on 16th another day say 25th and so on They don't even show any evidence of bank transfer to backup their statement The huge amount of stress and many months wasted of our time here to get our money back and still nothing I even called their Netherland number and the same story They can't connect me to their factory or finance team either Everywhere you call you'll just land on another clueless call centre person that's it Stay clear from them The Tesla UK and Europe is an absolute disgrace

Title: Very bad costumer service
Tesla customer service SUCKS
Tesla changed my service appointment and wants to charge me 185 to look at it
Content: My model 3 of 1 year and with only a little over 6000 miles rattles like a baby rattle Scheduled an appointment for a tech to come to my house only to be changed by them to making me drive it to their service location 30 miles away and told it will cost 185 to look at it This should be considered as warranty work I got a flat tire months ago and they told me it would take two months to fix so I ended up taking it somewhere else Tesla has horrible customer service and should be ashamed

Title: Maybe if Tesla cars would be a bit
Content: Maybe if Tesla cars would be a bit cheaper I would be able to buy one

Title: Legendary Tesla Build Quality Service
Content: There is a good reason for all the negative reviews the service is lamentable Never have I looked forward to handing back my lease car sooooooo much The build quality of my model 3 is appalling the phantom braking tried to kill me and my son 4 times on the motorway A1 during a 250mile round trip The front suspension now makes a sound like a 4 year old child playing the violin very loud and very embarrassing Can't wait to be rid of such a sub standard car If I had paid 56k for it I would be very unhappy Service centres simply couldn't care less

Title: Gobsmacked
Content: Gobsmacked We drove 4 hours to Birmingham to collect our new Model 3 which we were told was ready When we arrived the centre was closed Friday with no notices up There were several other people there for delivery of their new Tesla as well After 3 hours on hold to 'customer service' we were told they had closed as there was a bit of weather the day before seriously We had to get a hotel for the night in order to collect our Tesla the next day Arrived the next day took delivery and off we drove 30 mins later we get a call from a panicked manager 'Please bring the car back it's not registered ' So we drove the car back and as we parked we realised there was another Model 3 with the same number plates See photos We had to drive home again 4 hours with no Tesla as they couldn't register until the following week So 700 in additional costs and 2 days of our lives wasted and do you know what their apology re reimbursement was A 100 voucher for their online store Disappointed in the brand and service

Title: Tesla buying experience
Content: Our family purchase 3 Tesla in a short period within a year and the experience was a bit frustrating getting proper designation of ownership of each individual cars when done from 1 profile beware the delivery teams are incredible great bunch of people doing a great job thanks for the alternative

Title: I have been waiting for a Master
Content: I have been waiting for a Master control module replacement for my Tesla S for over 1 year now Constant reschedules wrong modules and then finally after a year the warranty expired and they wanted to charge me 2800 00 I really want to like Tesla but it is getting harder and harder to live with the absolutely awful service system I am ready to put a Free No Returns sign on my car and park it in front of Tesla Service I don't get why such a switched on company is doing a Total Fail in the service department

Title: Insurance is too high and absolutely
Content: Insurance is too high and absolutely not quiet car it has a lot of road and air sound Look like you are seated in middle of highway Not worth it Tesla model 3

Title: This is the future
Content: This is the future short term investors should consider this stock not stable

Title: Early adopter of Tesla who is severely disappointed with substandard client experience
Content: I am an early adopter and the service for this luxury expensive car is not just bad but it is horrible and the worst in the automobile industry I have issues almost every 3 4 months with an app that I have to rely on for everything Have had multiple recalls and they have been less than professional about dealing with those too They don't offer a loaner don't provide an ETA and the cap the Uber credits to 100 dollars only I drive 55 miles one way to work and there is no way I can be capped at 100 but they offer to support or answers and have to have no accountability for their preposterous behaviors I am writing this after owning the car for 5 years and have driven an EV for the last 11 years I have owned other luxury car brands and non luxury car brands and have NEVER ever witnessed SUCH SUBSTANDARD customer service They will run their company down to the ground since there is a lot more competition in the market now with a lot of attention given to client experience I am

Title: We need more superchargers in our
Content: We need more superchargers in our country please take it seriously

Title: Cars look nice but customer service is the worst Never again would I get another one Try calling President Biden and you will have better luck with communication
Content: The car is nice and the main reason I got it was because of the Dog Mode However the customer service is horrific I tried calling their financial department several times and they never answer You leave a message asking them to please call you back about a specific problem and they send you an email thanking you for for contacting them but they never address the problem I need my car title to register it in another state I called many times about it and supposedly they have ordered it It supposed to take about 5 weeks and now it s been three months I keep on calling Tesla about it and their answer is always the same as soon as we get it we will send it to you My concern based on their horrible lack of communication and not caring about customer service is that they might still have not even contacted them about it I will never buy another Tesla again There are many other wonderful choices like Mercedes Benz or BMW where they don t take customers for granted and they respect their time and patronage

Title: Worst customer service I have ever
Content: Worst customer service I have ever experienced in my life Impossible to talk to a human on the phone People at the stores don t seem to know a thing and are rude af As soon as the real car manufacturers have caught up on electric cars these clowns will be bankrupt and I will be cheering their demise I ordered a new Tesla on the web Went to get a test drive and they told me We don t give test drives and pointed at the dealership down the road with a used on and said go there if you like Are you kidding me Wow so what do these clowns do all day Just say use the internet and drink coffee Next I go to pick up my new car and I am from a different province and don t have to pay provincial sales tax That s the law period Well they won t deliver the car to me and take the tax off despite a document from the government saying I am exempt from provincial sales tax Then suggest I order another car and pick it up 1300km away from where I am working for the next 13 months At this point to told them to f off and got an Audi instead I will never buy a thing from these clowns and can t wait for them to fail

Title: Arrogant unhelpful frustrating
Content: Worst most arrogant and useless customer service I have ever had the misfortune to come into contact with

Title: Very bad customer experience
Content: Very bad customer experience I ordered in march and changed my order to a different specification of car same model but different battery within a day of the initial order I have had nothing but grief for 1 Getting them to acknowledge the change of spec on the paperwork 2 Actually getting me matched to a car and give me a concrete date for delivery Have had a call with them almost every week and been told everything is now sorted and as it should be but 20 calls later nothing has changed in my account agreements are still showing the wrong amounts and the wrong model still and my estimated date keeps moving forward I would rather they just say they don't want my custom than string people along like this

Title: Over priced very much over priced

Content: my friend will not tell us discus so we tried to buy her a p tesla and sent it to ten downing street however she would not tell us so we are

Title: Bought a used Tesla and had the car one
Content: Bought a used Tesla and had the car one day Multiple errors reported and took in to service centre 2 weeks later and still no car very little contact from service even though we text for updates you can't phone dealership like all other car dealers Have now cancelled the purchase and claiming back credit card Great cars but infrastructure is appalling and would not recommend anyone to buy unless you want to left on your own

Title: BUYERS BE AWARE
Content: We didn t take delivery of our vehicle due to the car being damaged when we went to collect RN116838203 When we rejected this vehicle onsite we were told we will receive a refund for 56 000 00 within two weeks But it s been six weeks now and nothing We have chased various departments in Tesla and nothing

Title: The only company I've ever dealt with
Content: The only company I've ever dealt with that treats you like they hate you and don't want you as a customer

Title: Based in the UK and having had my Tesla
Content: Based in the UK and having had my Tesla 3 for less than a year they have decided to withdraw free access to data and are now trying to charge 9 99 per month to reactivate This is very poor customer service and completely unexpected as this was not sold as a temporary benefit Tesla clearly don t realise that they need to look after their customer base

Title: Terrible customer service from Tesla manager
Content: I spoke with a manager at Tesla in Bellevue Washington this morning I was voicing my frustration with the deterioration of Tesla services over the past several years expecting the arrival of my 6th Tesla and been buying Teslas since they opened She was mocking dismissive arrogant openly condescending argumentative lacked empathy and clearly had no conflict resolution skills or experience Her credibility was that she has worked at Tesla for 9 years therefore she is qualified to abruptly dispute my experiences and made broad stroke excuses to denigrate my valid points She represented herself in a very poor light with repetitive weak excuses I wish Tesla would teach managers how to communicate with the public instead of watching this manager expose her resolution incompetence through defensiveness and antagonism I left knowing this Tesla service center is inept and the manager Maria lacks fundamental skills for basic customer service I am a Doctor research scientist and read people every day My situation with Maria could have ended equitably had she exercised simple empathy and connection skills Unfortunately she was not aware of her own behavior At the end of the day her antagonistic and ineffective behavior did nothing to reflect positively on herself personally as a competent manager to the public or as a Tesla representative As a loyal customer I left the Tesla service center today confirming the consistent negative experiences from interactions with Tesla A single person has the potential to redirect or nullify negative feelings unfortunately Maria added to the growing toxic customer service symptoms by the Tesla community I brought my car to this Tesla center at my appointment time for a simple tire change I am told it will take a minimum of 5 hours to change a tire What then was the point of making an appointment

Title: This is the worst company for customer
Content: This is the worst company for customer service It is nearly impossible to actually talk to a human

Title: Terrible customer service
Content: I enjoy the car despite an interior I would expect to see in a car 1 3 the price but the Customer Service is abhorrent I need a tiny plastic rivet screw to replace one that broke it holds the cheap plastic trim piece to my driver's seat I know the part number and am willing to pay for the little piece that I would be able to install myself in under 60 seconds However to get one I need to make a service appointment drive over an hour each way and have them install it which means it'll be at least a 4 hour time period that I'll need to take off from work They refuse to send or let me order one Absolutely ridiculous To say 'its a challenge' to speak with a live person is an understatement and when you finally can get through its useless Their live chat function is equally useless I should have waited for a Rivian Maybe they'll have better customer service

Title: Waiting over 6 months for parts
Content: Just unbelievably rude and cretinous service They go out of their way not too help and seem to have a system of passing people in other teams I along with 30 other Tesla drivers in just one garage have been waiting 6months for parts This problem is just one garage I dread to think what it is like across the country Buy a polestar the service is better and the charging points are coming Elon Musk has a rude awakening coming unless he sorts this out Maybe we should complain on Twitter and he might actually listen and do something about it

Title: The worst customer service It seems like I can never get in touch with a live representative Even when you are speaking to one they do not know how to help or assist you
Content: The worst customer service

Title: Excellent service Tesla Berkeley Service Ctr
Content: April 12 2022 I was in a jam heading up to Oregon from LA the low voltage battery in my Model 3 was failing Couldn't get a service appointment sooner than 3 days out Nursed my car over to the Tesla Berkeley Service Center and despite the fact that they were swamped Juaquin and Victoria got me in fixed my car and back on the road in half an hour Very reasonable charges as well Super service compassionate professional Later that day I was stuck in a snow storm in the Cascades for about six hours Without that battery fix I think I'd have perished Many thanks

Title: Stay away from Tesla Birmingham
Content: The Tesla Y car is the most magnificent car on the road If you ask me should I buy it I would categorically tell you not to because the service is the worst I ve ever come across they have absolutely no customer service what so ever I ve recently been able to get in touch with the senior manager who has gone through all the issues I have had with the delivery when I was left in doors all day with then knowing that they could not deliver within a reasonable time because someone was off with Covid but they could not be bothered all them to contact me and just left me losing a days holiday from work When I phoned up to find out what was going on I was told there was a problem with the communications which is scandalous as this company send people into space I have millions of satellites but could not pick up the phone The guy on the phone who took 45 minutes to answer also preferred to lie to me where the delivery van was and what I ve gone on during the day When I went to the show room for some help the guy at the show room was so rude in hindsight I wish to punch his lights out They have now looked into the matter and say they re going to do something about it but with there form I don t believe a word they say They have also completely refused to offer me any compensation for all the time I ve spent on this matter not even a gesture of goodwill but apparently it s worth a 45 Tesla voucher As I said the car is wonderful but I d like to return mine because if this is the level of service on delivery I hate to see what happens during the next three years I have the vehicle I ve asked for details of the chief executives email address which I totally refused but I will get in contact with the owner Elon Musk because he needs to know how awful he Starfall to customers that spending 70 000 pounds I can t do it again When I mentioned to the rep who had ignored three emails from me that you have so many negative reviews he said that s cause we sell a lot of cars that s not the truth the truth is you realise on the product and couldn t give a cat in hells about the after service which will come back and bite you on the bum He would be unemployed if he worked for me

Title: Broke Day 1
Content: Bought day 1 broke selling on day 2 Some nice employees but mostly total jerks

Title: Exceptionally poor customer service
Content: Exceptionally poor customer service Its impossible to talk to a human at Tesla as they are always forcing you to email or use the app There is no escalation path or customer service number so no one at the company is accountble

Title: Horrible customer support experience
Content: Horrible customer support experience Called the first time the customer support and it was frankly the worst experience I had with Tesla so far I like the car I like the technology BUT be advised that any customer support request will be treated like you are an enemy of the state I have talked to three people from customer support They don t listen they are talking non stop They know everything they are treating you like you are a village idiot Horrible Frankly I am extremely disappointed Btw if they don t like what you are telling them they will hang up on you

Title: Worst customer service
Content: Worst customer service Tesla pretty much monopolized everything insurance mechanic and bodyshop repairs The problem is there is no person or number to contact We got our car and problems right off the bat System was not updating and constant notification that the USB is not working They sent a tech and he said it s the oldest software and it should have been updated However our car couldnt receive updates We had to schedule to bring it in but it took a month We finally brought our can at the Van Nuys location It was there for a week They said they reformatted the computer and it should update now But they DID NOT try to update to make sure it works if it doesnt update just bring it back in Half ass job that took a week They also left me with 18 charge Tesla is nothing but headache I should have gotten the Volvo EV DO NOT BUY INTO THE HYPE Big mistake

Title: Does not get the range that it says Battery warranties are useless
Content: Purchased the 2014 Tesla Model S 60 It's advertised to get 208 miles That is FAR from accurate The max charge at 100 is 147 miles The ACTUAL miles that I get while driving it is 110 120 miles Their warranty says that it falls under the 8 year 125 000 miles I brought it into Tesla asking them to replace it They said that they would not that the battery is at 94 I showed them photos and video showing the digital and actual miles Still no battery Completely useless warranty STAY AWAY FROM TESLAS

Title: Worst service experience ever
Content: Worst service experience ever Bought a new X Plaid and had it delivered in February of 2022 Still trying to get service to straighten out misaligned body parts dirty seats and a torn faux suede headliner Tesla has rescheduled me several times and the last service appointment time they had no loaner that cost me 400 to rent a car while they serviced my car only to find out they never completed the service four days later I m ready to sell this crappy car and get something that the car company cares and respects their buyers

Title: Fab service
Content: Fab service Just wanted to say a huge thanks to Kirk at Tesla Bristol Cribbs I have had my Y a couple weeks and just getting to know it Due to go on a business trip and wanted to sus out the supercharger process Kirk was on his lunch break when I asked him for help but was amazing Took me to the correct chargers showed me how it worked and gave lots of hints any tips A top guy Really grateful Thank you

Title: My car was recently serviced at the
Content: My car was recently serviced at the Guildford branch Service was amazing The dealership greeted me on arrival and the mechanic came out to explain what they were doing and why it was taking a little longer than they expected Dealership let me use an office so I could carry on working whilst they fixed the broken item Great service really happy

Title: Too young to buy a Tesla
Content: It seems to be impossible to buy a Tesla if you are under 25 as they will not let you test drive one No other car company has this rule so why do Tesla think they are so special or are they too stingy to pay for proper insurance

Title: Customer Service is non existent
Content: I purchased my Tesla Model S in 2015 and before the Pandemic I was putting over 20K miles year on the car It's fun to drive However Tesla as a company to deal with horrible I paid over 100K for my car and received better customer service when I had a 20K Honda In 2019 Tesla pushed out an over the air update which reduced the charge range of my car The equivalent of shrinking my gas tank There was no communication and at first they denied anything if you could contact a human being Well this past week I received my notice of settlement of the Class Action and will receive a whopping 625 Mind you this update caused me extra on road charging time when I was commuting weekly between Northern and Southern California So what next you ask My monitor died the brains of the car The replacement was going to take over a month to receive so I agreed to buy a refurbished monitor which did save me a few hundred dollars A week later I learned there was a recall and my car was eligible for reimbursement I filed the warranty claim for reimbursement over 1 300 and the online screen confirmed eligibility That was 2 years ago I have tried several times to contact someone who can help and have spent close to 10 hours trying to get this resolved I thought I finally found someone at the local location who tried to assist in navigating but they seemed to have also thrown up their hands I guess it'll come down to filing a lawsuit In summary I enjoy driving the car it's comfortable and fun to drive but I don't know if the aggravation in dealing with a company that doesn't understand customer service is worth it

Title: Worst Car Ever
Content: Is any car brands service can be suck as Tesla I don't think so I have a 2019 model X the battery was suddenly dead completely and towed to one of the Tesla dealer since then it took several months to replace the battery Guess what when finally the parts arrived and replaced I noticed they bumped my car and they couldn't even find the car key and no one cares no one takes responsibility I would never recommend this damn car except to the people I really hate

Title: To Even Call It Service Is A Joke
Content: I received my Plaid in December At time of delivery there were some observed defects not a problem I was told schedule a maintenance visit on the app and it will be taken care of I am now on my third service visit fifth scheduled service yes I scheduled an appointment a month out first available and the day prior to the appointment Tesla canceled the appointment as they didn't have the parts in stock to make the repair yes they had a month to get them At each service Tesla will keep the car for multiple days currently my car has been there five days I've asked for updates and all I have gotten is so sorry the car is still being worked on we will update more tomorrow Service is a joke Electric cars are awesome torque is amazing great to drive Can't wait for a real car company to build one I will never buy a Tesla again

Title: Lucky escape from dealing with Tesla
Content: The pre sales service I received from Tesla was dreadful After being advised of the delivery date in late March I tried to pay by CHAPS to be informed that they did not know what this meant I asked to be phoned back without success on a number of occasions Every time I phoned I had to wait at least 15 minutes which was infuriating I cannot imagine how bad the after sales service must be if the pre sales service is this bad I feel fortunate that I did not take delivery of the model 3 particularly after reading so many disappointed owners reviews Despite writing to Tesla I have not received a response which is hardly surprising The whole experience seems to be we couldn t care less about our customers

Title: I recently had a flat tyre on my Tesla
Content: I recently had a flat tyre on my Tesla caused by a large nail Two reputable tyre distributors said that I had to buy a new tyre from aTesla Service centre as Tesla hold the complete stock of unique Michelin Tesla tyres and furthermore punctures could not be repaired on these tyres because of the foam inserts I contacted Tesla Technical team who advised me that this information is incorrect Tesla Tyre punctures CAN be repaired subject to where the damage has occurred and ALL Michelin tyres can be fitted as long as the tyre size matches

Title: The most unreasonable brand I ve ever
Content: The most unreasonable brand I ve ever seen they just take your deposit and go with it even after 2 days if you want to reactivate your order they want you pay another 250 Horrible service

Title: Think twice when buying used Tesla
Content: I bought my 2013 Model S from its 2nd owner at 98k miles after lots of research reaffirming that maintenance cost was low and reliability was high I actually loved my car drove smoothly and quietly but then I didn t even reached 120k miles on it when the high voltage battery completely died on me I parked one day at work with 80 charge and got out from work to find the battery completely drained to the point of not even starting or being able to put into neutral to push it to a charging stall I left the car plugged in using 3 extension cords for the entire weekend still at my job s parking lot and it didn t take any charge at all and never turned back on again I towed it to the nearest Tesla service center and after over a week they told me the battery had completely died and it needed full replacement to the tune of 23k the car s average value in the best condition possible and long range trim is 26k I asked about warranty coverage and they told me I was out over 100k miles and just at the 8 year mark I asked hypothetically if I had the money for the repair what their warranty would be and they said 50k miles on the battery only The message is DON T BUY USED TESLAS but if you do make sure you re still within the warranty period GET RID OF THE CAR BEFORE THE FACTORY WARRANTY EXPIRES after that all bets are off it may very well become a bottomless money pit DON T EVER BUY A TESLA WITH NEW BATTERY thinking that it s like buying a new car it isn t you re only covered for 50k miles on a fresh battery completely wasteful and senseless It s a great fun and classy car while the warranty lasts service is great and at no cost for warranty covered items no questions asked But once out of warranty you re all on your own They wouldn t even buy it back from me for parts terrible customer service when things went south that leaves much to be desired from such reputable brand

Title: paid 100 reservation fee in Dec
Content: paid 100 reservation fee in Dec 21 for Model XNo delivery time for the above was ever given to me officially However when i went for a 'test drive' of a Model 3 i was told that the model X may be years away from UK availability and that someone would be in touch regarding potentially changing reservation to Model Y However as i didn't hear anything and was disappointed with test drive and lack of responses in general i decided to purchase an EV from another company The process for cancelling is not transparent on the Tesla account and it suggests that the only way to do this is to call UK customer services on the few occasions i called customer service the wait time was 45 minutes plus Who has time to be on hold for 45 mins After resorting to emails i still did not receive a response Finally i contacted the credit card company and they filed a claim for me After 2 3 weeks I received a response from Tesla with a promise to refund the reservation fee but they said that this could take up to 45 days Absolutely shocking I responded that this was NOT acceptable and now they have promised a refund in 14 days to original credit card I don't know if US customers have the same issues but to me it seems like Tesla have a very arrogant attitude as if it is the ONLY choice in EV Its not and it wont be for me

Title: Been waiting over 4 months now for my
Content: Been waiting over 4 months now for my 4 000 deposit to be refunded Every time they say it's been actioned and will take 10 days to clear but it never does Off to small claims court we go

Title: TESLA Buyers BE AWARE
Content: TESLA Buyers BE AWAREI am appalled for the treatment I received from TESLA Facts I reserved a TESLA model Y just before the official COVID pandemic announcements in March 2020 I did not take delivery after 2 3 months of waiting since I had to move from CA to Missouri for a job transfer My reservation contract DID NOT have a deadline for the reservation TESLA prices went down to 49 990 00 from 54000 and that's what I had on my TESLA account ONLINE There was still no deadline for delivery We did not need a 3rd car since my children were having ONLINE Education I was working 100 virtual We decided to wait a bit longer and adjust our new life in MO establishing job residency and schooling etc I was offered a delivery 2 times between March 2020 and Nov 2021 but I told TESLA I would not take delivery till June 2022 since my daughter would start driving by that time There were no objections In Nov 2021 I was given 1 week to take delivery in first week of Dec 2021 otherwise they would cancel my reservation altogether Finally after my email to them stating the facts they changed my final chance for a delivery for April 2022 I did not take a snapshot of my account with April delivery date and still with 49 990 price tag I go online in early March 2022 to put down payment and finance the rest of the amount I come to find that they HAD CANCELLED my order I reach to customer support and there is no give They want me to put in another order with the current pricing which is 63 000 00 TESLA breached the contract I am trying to stay positive and take this as a blessing in disguise In short TESLA never suggested a deadline gave me little time for a final chance for a delivery I had it IN WRITING that I'd take the delivery in April 2022 and that's when they cancel and try to make nearly 13 000 more from our original contract by having me start a new reservation and not honoring our original contract SHAME on you TESLA Please make sure you know what you get yourself into READ your contract thoroughly and before you sign Take your time

Title: There are excellent in lies and bad costume care in malmö sweden
Content: There are excellent in being When you book a service you have to wait 7 weeks and just 1 week before the service then Tesla Malmö Changeed the appointment so I have to wait 8 weeks again What a bad company My car was a super mistake i truly regret selling my porsche cayenne gts for this Never have i experience so bad costume care from a company So my advice is to stay away from Tesla Buy any other electric car it can't noway be as bad as it is with Tesla

Title: I am on my own here
Content: There is no one to speak to You are directed to the Tesla App and there is no option to make an appointment at the local service center I already know my problem will not get resolved with a mobile service visit I do appreciate the car itself and I am awaiting delivery of my new tesla I have some questions about the new vehicle and again I cannot get in touch with anybody nor get answers from the service center This is even after calling the 888 number on the website This is one of the worst service experiences I've ever had

Title: Great cars terrible customer service
Content: As impressed as I was with my new Model 3 the firm s customer support is woeful Parts supply is terrible even for basic items and you simply cannot escalate a complaint to a senior executive Correspondence just gets sent back to the central customer services team and you get the same answers No one seems to really care or is prepared to go that extra mile The approach seems to be that everyone is in the same boat so there s nothing they can or will do to help an individual These are premium cars but the after sales service is anything but In January of this year my car was damaged by someone else in a car park I need a replacement nearside front wing something that should be available pretty well on demand It is now the second half of March and I am still waiting It s truly a disgrace A car that cannot be repaired promptly after a minor car park impact is arguably I think unfit for purpose Tesla please get your act together or your loyal fan base of which I was once a member will quickly evaporate PS I have updated this review and re rated Tesla Despite all their assurances I have heard nothing further from them regarding the wing needed to repair my car This is a company that just doesn t care UK Customer Services are rude and unsympathetic and it is impossible to even get an acknowledgement from a senior manager Whatever challenges there may be regarding their parts supply chain their lousy communication and offhand attitude is unforgivable I can honestly say that Tesla is the worst company I have ever dealt with in almost a 50 years of motoring They should be truly ashamed of themselves

Title: Tesla customer service is dreadful
Content: Tesla customer service is dreadful You cannot get to talk to anyone just one central line and you re on hold forever Even the emergency option Rude staff that know nothing about Tesla s liars and jobsworths They can t get anything basic right and they have no answers to questions Steer clear Update my Tesla has been with them since 11th March impossible to chase as no contact had an update after weeks saying still trying to diagnose then 1 message saying waiting for a battery car is a year old and this will be the third one Loaner car they gave me model S has accelerated 3 times whilst brakes were applied No one to contact as the customer service is dreadful and there s no direct numbers AVOID TESLACollected car after they had it nearly 8 weeks to diagnose and fit new battery Put windscreen wipers on and one flew off there s a loud buzzing noise coming from under the car So again spend the afternoon trying to contact them next appointment 19th May can t speak to anyone as it s all done anonymously When I was collecting yesterday another came in that had died and the bloke said it s Tesla s all say long they re picking up Once they die it s so difficult to even recover them onto a recover vehicle

Title: Still the best UK EV at this time however
Content: Still the best UK EV at this time in terms of performance range and supercharging zero range anxiety However their customer service levels have plummeted Repeatedly cut off whilst waiting to speak to customer services Call back option does not work they don't call you back emails do not get answered Plus now being advised that my delivery date has gone back by three months for my replacement Tesla Sort it out Elon

Title: I don t have a Tesla can t afford a new
Content: I don t have a Tesla can t afford a new car I will say this tho After doing a lot of research I stand with Tesla an Elon over Biden Chevy Ford an all the sale outs That have there hidden agendas That try to monopolize I respect the fact that Elon built a empire an has built manufacturing in America I support Elon musk as far as that An at least his eyes are open to see the corruption with Bill gates Biden Chevy Ford bill gates esc Esc It s obvious that Biden is all about the investors of these corporations An the elite of the worlds plans To force going green no matter if poor can afford it An the fact we re at no position to go green An need oil an chooses to close are own pipe line down Could left open for another five ten years till we are all able to go green Again they don t care An have there own agenda of the one world order with control to push the third world nations further back I can go on an on An if you don t like this review who cares looser Ha suck it chump An I will say this as well If you think I am a huge Elon supporter I m not but at least he see s what I see about Biden an others I will say this tho As Jesus says it s easier for a camel to go threw a eye of a needle than a rich man make it into heaven Why tho would you not support a company that makes jobs in America Instead of supporting corporations that do not an build there vehicles out of America An charge a huge amount of money for them Just to build them the cheapest way they can Why support company s that take away from are economy Instead of a company that helps support Americans If you wanna give me a Tesla truck Tesla I d be happy to drive it lol

Title: Another tale of terrible Tesla customer service
Content: I ordered a Tesla about six months ago I logged into my manage account section on Tesla and I saw that my delivery was moved out two months Unfortunately the new later date did not work for me I canceled the order and wrote that I wanted my deposit back When I purchased the car I entered into a contract with Tesla Delivery date is part of the contract They totally ignored my request for a refund and also I had requested a return label to return the charger Trying to contact them is a maddening experience I finally found a phone number for them Three days ago I called I did not wish to wait for a rep so I requested a callback Three days later no callback and no email I guess I made the mistake when they said reason for the call and I indicated cancellation Horrendous customer service I will never get a Tesla knowing how poorly they treat their customers

Title: So far short of expected standards
Content: I'm 53 My first car was a Mark 2 Ford Escort An old banger but I never had a situation where I couldn't get in the car or if I did couldn't start it With the Tesla Model S I've had several such situations I've had this car for 6 years and during that time it has caused me a great deal of anguish heartache road rage and sheer inconvenience Right now the car has stopped recognising the key so the only way I can get in the car is by using my phone which only works sometimes Customer service have basically not given a monkeys Just use the app to book a service appointment they say which usually books you in around 3 weeks time Sadly this is not a one off I've had various problems over all the 6 years I've had the car The passenger door won't open from the outside The window would open randomly in the middle of the night Rear door would just randomly open Not to mention really inconsistent auto pilot performance The radio turns off intermittently when I use the rear demister I can't imagine any of these things happening with a Merc BMW Audi The car is fast though that is true The other major thing is that the car is ergonomically diabolical I have had hip injuries as a direct result of the awful seat position and lack of support stability in the seats This is the main reason I am changing marques asap Despite the speed of the car I have to give a 1 star review because it is so far short of basic standards that I would expect from a car of this price

Title: SCAM
Content: The Tesla Model 3 has great motors it's super quick The stereo is amazing too Otherwise the car is a lie 370 miles of range In the real world it gets about 150 This is worse than any Dieselgate scandal The indicators are awfulThe auto wipers don't workThe reversing cameras and sensors are laggy and unreliableThe touchscreen is an absolute mess to use while driving it's actually dangerous The Autopilot slams the breaks on for no reason The early forward collision warnings go off randomly for no reason The car has no connectivity all the time despite me being in the middle of UK in an urban area It's basically just a very fast car like a Lotus or something that has no additional comforts because the additional comforts except the audio are all pretty much unusable Despite people saying they buy the car for the tech it has less tech than my old BMW's had no heads up no ambient lighting etc etc etc EDIT I have now lowered my review from 3 starts to 1 star Car broke down in June I have had nothing but trouble trying to get it fixed under warranty I have booked in for 7 service visits now every time the car goes in they do not fix the issue but create more They constantly cancel the appointment at the last second The are impossible to deal with over the app they are completely faceless no one you can speak or complain to DO NOT trust this company

Title: Save yourself hassle and don t buy Tesla
Content: Please don t buy this brand I spent 115k and been stranded multiple times Customer service is shocking they just want to rip you off with everything they can I got locked out in the basement and the key doesn t work they won t do anything and to issue a new key they have to connect to the car It s a burden not convenience this Car

Title: Terrible customer service in France
Content: Terrible customer service in France Failed to find the problem with the car and instead decided to blame the electricity company

Title: Please please steer clear of Tesla
Content: First time Tesla Owner here and first time I have written any review in years I feel that strongly about how bad Tesla's company service is so if anyone reading this is thinking of buying a Tesla I recommend staying away I will try to keep this short I moved from BMW to Tesla after many hassle free years at BMW but it felt like Tesla was the go top place for EV's so I switched over Firstly my brand new car turned up with scrapes all over it and filthy Then I go to charge my phone and find out that they have sent the car without front USB ports or charging pads So I complain to Tesla and it is like dealing with robots at their customer services there is no humility whatsoever Car had to go back in to have the scrapes repaired and basically a 3 month wait for USB's to be installed All I got from Tesla was a copy of T's and C's effectively saying tough luck we do not care that you have damage to your new vehicle and we will hopefully get the charge ports in in a few months So an incomplete and damaged car owned for months and taking my time to get the car back to them for repairs which naturally costs me money and inconvenience As above all I got was a load of T's and C's and an offer of a 45 Tesla gift card insulting I then refused the gift card and asked for Tesla to make an equivalent donation of 45 to charity Guess what the robots at Tesla Customer Service cannot even do this as it is not company policy Disgusting it is all about profits As you own the car you will then find that the vehicle that you have delivered could be totally different to your next door neighbours My car is marketed as having games to play with a controller and Elon Musk tweets to say that every Tesla owner is getting Sonic The Hedgehog This is not the case because my car has not got data carrying USB sockets so I cannot use a controller You then read about different computer chips and radar systems etc The long and short of this is Tesla have absolute no customer service when things go wrong and will not even make a payment to charity in lieu of a voucher which tells me exactly the company that they are Avoid avoid avoid

Title: Tesla has very poor car ordering system
Content: I reserved a Tesla Y reservation number RN115577770 on August 29th 2021 for a lease My insider sales Adviser was Ryan McClain very helpful sales person My Tesla was supposed to be delivered in November 2021 then it was delayed to December and then to January 9th 2022 The delivery was postponed due to some unknown reasons to February 20th 2022 Then it was delayed to March 19th 2022 and now it is delayed to April 24th 2022 When I reserved my Tesla Y I also ordered a BMW X5 from Peter Pan BMW dealership I was given a VIN number I tracked it through production process It was supped to be derived in the last week of December 2021 It was ready to be picked up on schedule on December 31st 2021 I picked it up on January 2nd 2022 Excellent service Manufacturing of a car is supposed to take weeks not months I understand when the demand is higher than the production it takes time to get it some time months The delivery can be predicted by sequence of manufacturing There can be delay of few days or weeks but not months Tesla is the top technology car manufacturer in the world They are supposed have a state of the art tracking system My expectations from Tesla were very high I fail to understand what went wrong here I am very much puzzled If I had know that Tesla is irresponsible and delivery is so unpredictable I would have gone with some other EV Now I have spent waiting for my Tesla Y for more 6 months I am stuck with it

Title: Great car horrendous customer service
Content: Love my model 3 had it 3 weeks now Had issue with Tesla wall charger fitted by one of their approved electricians Emailed dedicated expert team and was told had to have electrician on site to then call the dedicated phone line for expert advice as to issue over the phone Good luck to anyone ever getting through to them First attempt 40 min on phone then their centre closes so cuts you off2 nd attempt week later 1 hour on phone again ran out of time as closes at 16 30 No way of getting this sorted with out paying an electrician to sit by the phone waiting goodness knows how long to get through to a human voice

Title: Terrible customer service
Content: Terrible customer service We were stranded after my phone and cards were stolen I phoned Tesla Roadside team based in Netherlands who were nether willing nor able to help While there was a simple fix I found out later to the problem which would have allowed us to use the car but Tesla team did not advice us of this and let us suffer in sub zero temperature They offered to toe the car at a cost of 1500 to me while they could have told me how to start the car using the app It cost me over 1000 to recover and hours of delay After writing multiple times to Tesla they have recognised their failing in this matter but reluctant to provided any explanation Not a brand you can trust

Title: Given a delivery date without an option
Content: Given a delivery date without an option to change tried contacting customer service what a joke to change waiting hours to get hold of someone on the phone without any luck So tesla go ahead and deliver but I will not home I guess this is an indicator of their after service care and reading the reviews I think I'm right lets see what luck I have cancelling

Title: Appealingly bad
Content: Appealingly bad Bristol service team told me will call back multiple times no calls to arrange a replacement vehicle Pretty sure Tesla will fail one day due to customer service product can only drive you so far Mr Musk replaces your head of customer service replace him with someone more capable please

Title: tesla cars 9 10
Content: tesla cars 9 10tesla customer support 5 10

Title: Standard poor Tesla Service
Content: Standard poor Tesla Service Apart from Brooklands the rest of the services are pathetic Once you have bought the car they couldn't care less My car was booked in for a recall and i took it in and was told it was be done within a few hours Car was dropped off at 8am As i needed the car for the following day i thought plenty of time After waiting i texted as you can't get in touch with the robots at Tesla They said we will try and get it back today but maybe tomorrow and you can pick up As if i can just pop there when it suits them Then i get a text saying if you want it tomorrow then you will have to rebook If it wasn't for the cars this companies service track record is so so so poor Problem is its a whole bunch of 20 30 year old who just don't care less Please Elon take a look at the service centres as they give this company a bad reputation

Title: Worst service I have ever experienced
Content: Worst service I have ever experienced in my entire life Model 3 is a great car but I am bringing it for service for the 4th time for the exact same problem And it really appears that Tesla does not care

Title: Tesla Park Royal service centre
Content: This is so distressing it seems that tesla customer service is terrible everywhere I thought it was just London Park Royal that was awful They have smashed my Model S while in service They will not give me any information as to how this has happened or when it will be fixed It is impossible to talk to anyone that can give me the information that I need Have requested a call back from the manager and received nothing I feel like they are covering up something because they are being so evasive

Title: Waiting hours to get hold of someone on
Content: Waiting hours to get hold of someone on the phone not a good experience and haven't received my car yet

Title: My Tesla home charger stopped charging
Content: My Tesla home charger stopped charging my car so I took my car to the Tesla Service center I was told the problem could not be reproduced so the issue must be my charger and I would need to contact the charger department to schedule service I have written 10 emails and submitted 15 online service requests with zero response It has now been 3 full days that I have not been able to charge my car Both my car and charger are under warranty

Title: Terrible Service Turnaround 6 days and counting
