Content: I am an early adopter of Model S and have been shocked and disappointed at the decline in Tesla's service posture Latest fiasco is that I brought the car in for the LTE upgrade and some recall items on a scheduled visit Their target for turnaround is 24 hours seemed long to begin with vs other auto service Today is day 6 without the car Fortunately I got a loaner which I will keep until they complete this service although they wanted it back and offered me Uber credits Detroit could NEVER get away with this lack of responsiveness turnaround What happened Volume and lack of proper planning staffing As predicted by a friend from GM Institute who warned me not to buy Tesla

Title: I had great experiences up until now
Content: I had great experiences up until now My connectivity is not working my premium package I pay for has not worked for 3 months my GPS is not working some cameras are not working and they've cancelled my appt 5 times requesting more info

Title: my car needed to be repaired the parts
Content: my car needed to be repaired the parts were on backorder they refused to give me a loaner or suspend lease payments the reps working couldnt explain the logic just said this is the bestgreat concept of a car terrible execution as a company

Title: space x is a very non pp shaped rocket
Content: space x is a very non pp shaped rocket unlike amazzzzons rocket it is pp but it COMES early with prime I can NOT wait for the upcoming wwe fight againist JEFF BEZOS AND ELON MUSKET

Title: No FSD even though I paid for it 4 years ago
Content: I bought Tesla model S 90D MCU1 with FSD 4 years ago 4 years later I still didnt get FSD not even the Beta version I don't get any software update since 2020 I was an ex Tesla fan but I am deeply disappointed in Tesla and especially in Elon Musk Too much promises and very less realized I would not buy Tesla again now

Title: Shocking after sales service
Content: Waited over 3 hours to be seen at Tesla Stockport only to be told the booking system was confusing Then told had to keep car in overnight Problem not fixed and when I collected the car which I had valeted 3 days earlier it was covered in bird filth Absolutely outrageous service and Tesla basically don t care once you have purchased the car Please invest in after sales service Tesla

Title: The worse experience i had
Content: The worse experience i had the people lack experience very poor appointments system it rubbish following that experience i decided to sale my tesla i will never buy it again nor recommend to anyone

Title: Worst customer service EVER
Content: I had the worst experience with a customer service EVER when I came to lease a Tesla First we came to the store to ask if we could lease a Tesla with a French driver licence they say yes no problem they even send us the step to enter the French driver licence for the reservation we decide to go for an existing model online pay the 250 reservation fee and after verification we book an appointment to pick up the car The day before the pick up they call us telling that We can t pick up the car with a French driver licence except if we want to buy it or pay cash we are really not happy about this answer because we came to ask so we insist but there is nothing to do so we ask about the 250 and here is the worst I m sorry but even if we said that you can lease it with a French driver license and We made a mistake the 250 fee are not refundable we insist a lot and she says I m sorry I can t do anything else We go to the store to explain what is happening and they tell us ok we understand the problem a manager is going to call you back never got a call We go back to the store 2 days later and 4 days later same story manager supposed to call back and never do In the meantime we go to the DMV and my husband gets his driver licence we put it on the Tesla website and miracle the car is still available we book an appointment to pick it up to days later but there is a problem on the website we can t book the insurance because my husband was remove from the file even if we Were co leasing the car and we got it depending on both our pays We go back to the store and they tell us sorry you need to to it again from the start and it could take several days to be approve you should postpone your appointment to pick up the car we insist and insist again and finally a manager come and help us and say that there was a mistake because it s impossible that he is not on the file if it s a co lease he solve the problem in a few hours and then we are able to go to the shop where we are supposed to pick it up 1 hour from home on time for the appointment when we arrive for the appointment they tell us we are sorry but there was a problem when you book it and We don t have your appointment here so your car is not ready come back in 3hours to pick it up so we explain that we just did a 1 hour trip to pick it up and we are not going to go back home now and we wan t the car after several minutes she tell us that the car will be ready in 30 minutes it was ready 1 hour later and that s how we finally got our Tesla no commercial gesture for the worst customer service ever but we didn t expect anything else

Title: Very poor customer service
Content: Very poor customer service and I they only care about pumping out car after car for increased shareholder profit

Title: Don t trust Tesla a subpar product
Content: I recently purchased a Tesla model 3 long range Waiting was 7 weeks It arrived Dec 2021 and then failed miserably around 6th week after the delivery It had only 1800 miles on it The diagnose was rear drive component failure with is like an engine failed in traditional car Tesla service station replaced it under warranty they better But the price for the replacement was over 15 000 if I had to pay out of pocket So it was a major problem Where is quality control Has anyone heard of a brand new car with regular engine fail within 2000 miles these days Well Tesla has done it Unimaginable failure I asked Tesla to give me a new car was told the new parts were put in so it is as a new one Sounds like a used car dealer Service was slow and after they were done they didn t even clean it for you My car which I drove for only 6 weeks before it went in was just washed and inside was clean it came back filthy with dirty floor The whole experience with Tesla car and service have been such a disappointment if I can give a negative star I definitely will

Title: Tesla door came down on my back suffering for 3 years and still doing therapy nothing have been resolved
Content: I am a mom of 4 children my youngest is12 years old I am health care worker who gave my time and hours to many I worked in facility which i cared for the elderly which i loved dearly Over a year ago i was injured by a Tesla upon putting one of my patient in the back seat of her son car 2021 Tesla while he was putting her walker in the back trunk My patient son open the car door which went up in the air while putting the seatbelt on her the door came down on my back the son used the remote to try to open the door which i was trapped in for about 5 minutes I have been suffering since then i cant work because of pain i had spinal injection and i am still in Theraphy I was assined for pain management again Have a case for work which am not getting paid I cant pay accumulating bills I do believe the car was faulty i want my life back During this time am going through depression and taking meds for this I took a Human Rights course and now fighting for my rights I took my wedding dress money and started a Registered NGO fighting for my cause i cant lift more than 5 pounds cant do social activities like i use to with my daughter and have not gotten a salary from my job for 1 year now Fighting because my 12 year old need me I will not stop until someone hear me about these dangerous cars Sherlee S

Title: There customer service SUCK
Content: First of all Tesla have you schedule an appointment for a test drive Tampa location 11945 N Florida Ave Tampa FL 33612 when they don't have the vehicle there to drive There customer service was absolutely HORRIBLE They treat some customers better then other customers HINT HINT

Title: Rubbish
Content: Rubbish Ordered a Model 3 long range but didn't want to take delivery until the new plate in March Impossible to speak to a human to arrange so cancelled Happy to take the 100 deposit hit for better some customer service elsewhere Don't be seduced by the performance of the cars the customer service is all but non existent

Title: Was not in the country when they told
Content: Was not in the country when they told me my car was ready They canceled my order even though I said I would be back in 2 weeks Horrible clueless people running customer service I had a price locked in 4K less also and they totally ignored my responses just kept saying your order was canceled

Title: Tesla sell cars that break apparat
Content: Tesla sell cars that break apparat during normal use Model S and Model X should have a recall for control arms that break Really dangerous problem May end up with fatal outcome When Car collapse Tesla may claim that the reason is user csused and refuse to cover costs warranty or goodwill Many owners experience ridiculous quality problems Company makes products fart but neglecting quality issues Customer service is extremely poor Get a good lawyer if you buy a Tesla

Title: Tesla Customer Service has trended from Good to Terrible
Content: I m a 2015 Model S owner I have to say that ever since the Model 3 came out the Customer Service has gone from Great to Terrible I used to have a Personal Advisor when I dropped off my Model S for service prior to the new and unimproved Tesla Service I could call that human s mobile phone who worked at the Service Center before during and after my Service Now as others have described it s nearly to talk to a human unless you drive to your Service Center and stand in line to talk to them My latest and currently ongoing experience with a charging issue with my Model S has been as bad as advertised I put in a Service Ticket before having it towed to service center as I wanted to prepare them and make sure they could receive my car No one ever responded over 3 days I finally called roadside assistance and asked them to please message my service center and make sure it was OK for me to drop off my car there at the Service Center they never did confirm my appointment time I m now in my 3rd day waiting for some useful status on my car s charging issues I m trying to figure out how to get my concerns frustrations with the changes in Telsa Service to Elon and the Tesla management team assuming they care at all They really need to bring back humans to talk to in the Service Centers I ll keep trying

Title: Terrible after sales service from their Online Store
Content: Ordered a set of tire chains from Tesla's Online Store It was a set of Konig Summit K45 chains for my Tesla Model S I was testing the chains before heading out for my Yosemite trip and to my horror the chains were coming off every time I followed all the instructions on Konig's website and the videos available Tesla's own website surprisingly has a dated demo video that is for a completely different set of tire chains I even took the car to a service center so that a technician could look at it and the chains were coming off even then The technician helped me raise a request for a return It has been a week since then and nobody has even bothered to acknowledge or reach out Furthermore my email to their online orders team that is responsible for managing the returns hasn't even been acknowledged or responded to by the concerned team I called their customer service helpline and I was told every time that it is the online orders team that can help me out Glad that I didn't head out on my trip The worst part is Tesla does not realize the fact that this can cause an accident on a snowy icy road This isn't a T shirt that I bought with Elon Musk's face imprinted on it but a piece of necessary equipment that can be the difference between you staying on the road vs skidding off of it

Title: Tesla Paramus NJ Delivery Service
Content: I paid for home delivery of a Model Y to Maine because Tesla does not have a dealership here The closest pickup location is 5 hours away in Paramus NJ I received notice that my car was at the dealership on Nov 4 2021 I paid in full for the vehicle on 11 5 21 My account said that delivery was scheduled for 12 10 which came and went without any communication A few days later the scheduled delivery date was updated to 12 18 on the account website 12 18 came and went with no communication and no response to attempts to reach Tesla My car arrived on 12 27 I had not received any notification by email phone or text that the car would arrive on that day Fortunately I was at home when it arrived The car had not been prepped for delivery It was missing hub covers from all 4 wheels it had shipping tape and plastic covering the interior columns A large foam shipping block was glued to the front passenger door The interior door panels and carpets were dirty Attempts to reach the Paramus Delivery Center by email and text received no response No phone number for the Paramus Delivery Center is provided online I called the national Tesla customer service number The person there said that the Paramus Operations Manager would call me Instead I got an email that the wheel hub covers have been ordered and will ship to my home from California presumably for me to install myself There was no mention of resolving the other issues For a premium vehicle company Tesla's delivery and customer service is TERRIBLE DISGUSTING I eventually did get a call from the Paramus Operations Manager He said that the car came with hub covers and they don't know when they were misplaced They have ordered a new set which will ship from California to Paramus NJ and then need to ship to me in Maine They are back ordered and he has no idea when I will receive them

Title: Appalling after sales service
Content: Had a new Model 3 delivered recently and it was filthy The outside was filthy finger prints inside on the doors and upholstery Footprints on the floors Stickers still on he car We were told they were too busy to clean it before delivery Appalling Also told message Tesla and we would get a voucher to clean it Had no response to the feedback Went to the Chelmsford dealership and were told to get it cleaned at our expense and submit a receipt as they re not there to clean cars As we ve had no response to the original feedback I doubt we ll see a refund The person was rude arrogant and unhelpful Unfortunately I got angry at his attitude which had he been polite I wouldn t have I was told to leave HIS store and never come back Just the kind of service you expect after spending that kind of money on a new car Had we dealt with this individual at the outset we wouldn t have purchased the car His attitude and arrogance couldn t have been further away from the person we dealt with originally completely different service Will never buy there again An appalling experience

Title: Tesla RIP OFF
Content: DO NOT accidentally order the summons package Get the credit card statement a month later GASP Then try to get your back Over 10K I have NEVER ONCE used it and it isn t legal in TX yet I have spent probably 10 hours on the phone and over 50 emails They refuse to issue a refund Still fighting

Title: Got my car delivered today
Content: Got my car delivered today1 It was FILTHY2 The app doesn t work as it hasn t yet registered that the car was delivered3 The software in the car doesn t reboot so there is an issue4 It took 45 minutes to get someone on the phone5 Although they were very nice they couldn t really do much to help other than to agree with me that it doesn t work6 Do not buy a Tesla in the Uk unless you intend to be a cab driver The single worst customer experience I have ever seen

Title: Terrible customer service
Content: No replies to any emails 20 minute hold times becoming 25 then 30 minutes I gave up as I can t spend hours on hold They are impossible to contact

Title: Things must have improved
Content: Things must have improved I have taken delivery of an M3 LR just over a week ago so early days for me The car is delivered faultless with the exception of a slightly miss aligned number plate I was able to easily book a mobile service for that So far the communication with Tesla and customer service I am UK based has been excellent and cannot be faulted I hope this continues The car is beyond good in terms of quality and how it drives Time will tell I have been disappointed in the past with other posh and not so posh ice car dealerships with the exception of maybe one So over all a positive experience and no regrets yet

Title: Tesla the hot girl that treats you like crap
Content: Tesla has great products Everyone knows that and they do too However they treat you like total crap It's really hard to recommend Tesla to anyone after going through this crap The ordering process the delays the communication to finalize the delivery the repairs It doesn't matter what you put out there if you make your customer feel like crap all the time they'll move on as soon as a new option is available

Title: Wheel stud
Content: The first 3mm of one of the studs on my car was crossthreaded I went to Tesla for help on the matter with the expectation that the stud could be replaced as is possible in any other car only to be charged over 300 for a new assembly as they would not replace a single stud This is an outrageous situation in which to be with Tesla demonstrating their evident desire to make a profit ahead of a customers needs and the environment I am outraged that I am being charged such an extortionate amount and being forced to do so I will be not be purchasing another Tesla in the future if this is how I am dealt with ever again and am expecting the cost of this to be refunded for the inconvenience it has caused

Title: PATETIC CUSTOMER SERVICE Tesla Y
Content: Bought a Tesla Y 4 months ago havent receive it and they have change 2 times the pick up date for different reasons the last one because THEY did a dent to my car the day before of the pick up THEY DONT TRY TO HELP YOU they make you pay everything and later dont care about nothing and the Customer Service Rep doesnt care about NOTHING OF THE CUSTOMERS NEEDS Sadly Tesla is the same or worst as the old brands I really thought they were different and trying to be better I was wrong

Title: For goodness sake tesla get your act together
Content: We bought a new Model 3 three months ago and disappointed with lack of attention to fundamentals like spare wheel or tyre repair kit no lifting pugs then told by their service centre they don t bother using them Strange then the warning that we must use the pugs or risk damaging the batteries and our warranty We experience intermittent glitches in the tech and now the software update has frozen showing an Error 540 code You try and contact Tesla only to be told the office is closed on a Sunday Are we supposed to only drive this car during office hours I m beginning to think I have made a huge mistake

Title: The worst experience so far
Content: I just can't believe how bad Tesla's customer service is in the UK We have been trying to reach someone for the last 1 week and we could not speak to relevant people This is after booking a Tesla Model S and trying to arrange invoice to make the payment I am bit worried how the after sales support will be Thinking hard to cancel my model S order

Title: Tesla s finance customer service is
Content: Tesla s finance customer service is horrible First the hide their number and you have to dig and dig to find it but when you do then are super rude I have two call every month to tell them my lease has been extended WHY can t they see this in their own records They are the ones that have all the paperwork and information Why do I have to spend my time doing their job For an innovative car company the service is the worse in the world I have to rethink if I stay with Tesla long term it may not be worth the trouble Tesla fix your customer service

Title: Car Delivery Customer Service SUCKS
Content: While the car is fine the customer service is awful Actually beyond awful First they kept pushing back my delivery I ordered in April of 2021 with a promise of a 45 to 90 day delivery They initially contacted me and promised to give me updates They didn't contact me again until I contacted them They didn't have any updates and just kept slipping the delivery date by updating the delivery date in my account They never called or even texted me Worse when I texted my Tesla POC they just disappeared Never answered and I never heard from them again Finally after calling and being put on hold for hours I got through to a person They weren't much help I did eventually get the car in late October Like all Teslas there were misaligned body panels that had to be adjusted So I had to take it back for service Tesla registers the car for you You pay the registration fee but they register the car and get your license plates Of course they can't do this right away so they give you 30 day tags The 30 days came and went with no permanent license plates I called Tesla long before the 30 days were up and again waited on hold for hours and they couldn't figure out how to get the license plates So now I have nothing and I am still trying to figure out how to drive my car legally Service Sucks

Title: The worst service I've ever experienced
Content: The worst service I've ever experienced and seen Bad experiences in Prague as well as in Vienna They absolutely do not meet any standards from the set time to the delivery of the car They do not even know how to issue an invoice properly They change the price as the car is made Really very very bad and it's very sad too And the same complaints in the service

Title: Best car I ve ever drove
Content: Best car I ve ever drove I had a model 3 since Marts 2019 I Had one service appointments over the years and the service center fixed it for free Overall the car is really reliable and a good daily driver

Title: Company does not stand behind product
Content: Company does not stand behind product Product arrived 3 months late and had engine problems from the start

Title: Elon Musk is a liar
Content: Tesla wants to save the planet Watch Panarama on BBC Slave labour Corruption No human rights Elon Musk is no hero He is a wolf in sheep's clothing Exploiting the poor to benefit the lives of the rich in the name of environmental action Lies upon lies upon lies Do not buy his cars as you are only fueling the suffering of the few to save the many

Title: Horribly Slow Service
Content: Got a terrible loaner car and had to run with it for 3 weeks 3 weeks to fix a car is the worst service I ve ever seen in my life Lost my trust on Tesla

Title: I am supposed to take delivery of a
Content: I am supposed to take delivery of a Tesla at the end of this month How do I pay What does wire the money mean My bank does not validate the bank account that I have to make the purchase price to Response by Tesla tells me to phone Only problem they cut you dead Buying a tin of beans is more pleasurable than buying a Tesla Appalled given the high number of payment scams that they expect me to transfer a huge sum 7 days before pick up yet do not afford me the courtesy of verification of payment details Forget using this company if you have poor internet connection What happened to good old customer service I long for a return to the days when I first bought a Merc and received it with a bunch of flowers on the drivers seat

Title: Was supposed to pick up car yesterday
Content: Was supposed to pick up car yesterday Got call the night before saying my car was wrong color After many calls and much frustration they said they found a match to my car that was at a different location not to far away I was given new VIN yesterday and told they were going to transfer it to my pickup location Called today to get estimate of when and was told it was scheduled the next day and would be able to pick up within days I go on app only to find they scheduled me at the other location for tomorrow which is almost 2 hours away When I called again they said yes we cancelled the transfer but if I want them to transfer to my location I will have to wait another week I cannot believe how terrible their customer service is They clearly do not care about the customer at all Was even told by the Tesla rep with an attitude that I should just cancel if I can't wait TWO mistakes on their end and they do NOTHING to accommodate UNREAL AVOID TESLA

Title: windscreen cracked in the service
Content: windscreen cracked in the service centre Tesla staff are blaming me for the issue The worst customer experience ever Run away from this brand such a shame such a bad customer service I hope Elon is happy with these low class people he employs Dissapointed

Title: Worst service department
Content: Worst service department No one can help or get is rims until next year This is a safety issue as we have documented several timea

Title: Telsa service is so frustrating and bad Don't buy anything from them
Content: I'm writing about Telsa solar panel customer service I'm just mad and want to review them somewhere Solar City was my original company bought by Tesla insert throw up emoji Since then every requirement for Tesla customer service fills me with DREAD Why Two years ago at Telsa's direction they said it would be nearly a year before their techs were available and everyone uses their local roofers for the work I paid lots of money to have a roofing company remove and reinstall my panels when I needed a new roof When they couldn't figure out how to reinstall all they had were the original install diagrams sent many times to me by Tesla and MANY calls to Telsa giving me the same guidance I finally pulled the speak to a manager BS got a local Tesla panel installer on the phone and found out roofers should NEVER have uninstalled the panels and would not have the new hardware to needed to reinstall He was shocked that customer service just kept sending my installation plans and thought a non specialist could do this Also I paid for everything twice Did Tesla care No They told me I was getting a deal and it was usually twice the cost to reinstall Great almost 2 000 and over a month of my panels sitting useless in my garage Cut to today I get a text that my system is no longer working and needs to be repaired The only directions are to schedule service via the Telsa app the website is not an option why I download it and log in except whoops it doesn't work and just kicks me to the login screen I reset my password Twice Same glitch I find a service number call wait the call is dropped I call back and wait again Somehow I talk to someone nice and she takes on the repair scheduling herself Only one option but my six hour repair window in a few weeks is scheduled I'm lucky to have the date and I believe her sounds like I got a canceled spot I just want to say Telsa the brand has this gloss this high tech wonderland image The reality is their customer support is HELL Their app doesn't work how does that fit their brand image Their systems are beyond buggy and seem completely untested before they launch with customers Their customer support specialists are often given the wrong guidance and provide you with expensive incorrect information see roofing story And while I bought an electric car recently not for ONE SECOND did I consider a Telsa Was a shocked today to find endless reviews saying people couldn't get help couldn't schedule car repairs Of course not Oh I also noticed that their bad customer service reviews seem buried under fake crap AKA I guarantee they pay for this and want new customers to see 4 star customers ratings the first time they want to learn about Tesla customer service experiences Newsflash the actual rating should be around the Comcast level 1 5 ish on a good day This brand is about flash ego and gives me con vibes Cool car bro hope you like waiting on hold AVOID Telsa

Title: Terrible service in Pittsburgh
Content: Terrible service in Pittsburgh I own a model X Wait times for service appointment ridiculous Must be done through app They don t want human interaction at all Never any loaner cars so enjoy your cheap Enterpise rental car

Title: frustrating customer service
Content: I have bought a tesla and their customer service is really bad they make you wait for 35 mins to an hour on the phone and take days to slove certain issue it s is really frustrating never had this issue with any other company

Title: I have been driving Tesla model S since
Content: I have been driving Tesla model S since 2015 and compared to all other brands this is fantastic I m on my second TMS and all issues have been minor and fixed from Tesla The service cost is ultra minimals compared to other cars with the same specifications

Title: Tesla is rubbish
Content: I have attempted to purchase a windscreen direct from Tesla parts for 4 days That is over 96 calls and multiple emails I have spoken to advisors on 4 occasions as they just dont answer the phone and every time i have been advised to email the parts dept none of my emails have been answered I was informed that there is the part i need in the depot i want to order from but cannot buy it over the counter How Tesla expect their vehicles to be maintained is beyond me They have zero customer service skills and they obviously have no training in answering the phone This a common problem with Tesla They wont even provide me with the part number so i can get it myself So now i have a customer sat with a windscreen less car that we cannot fix Elon Musk cannot be as rich as he states as his employees don't have no business acrimon what so ever The company is useless

Title: Asides the fact that I have to go miles
Content: Asides the fact that I have to go miles to find a shop that would service my Tesla I think it s the best thing to happen to me as I save a lot on gas I d definitely recommend that they open more service outlets to make it easier for people looking to get their Tesla serviced

Title: Our Tesla drives great
Content: Our Tesla drives great but getting it serviced is a nightmare There are not enough service areas and the few that are near us are over worked and overwhelmed The customer service is pretty terrible

Title: Battery replacement needed after 90k miles
Content: 2013 Model S only 6 weeks out of warranty I m told bought in 2015 and Tesla won t provide documentation of purchase date I m told there is a hard fault in the HV battery but despite inquiries have been given no information I contacted Tesla about 3 months ago saying something off with battery and was told without even bringing it in that all is well Best Tesla has offered is 9k for a refurbished battery 90k miles I know of Yugos that lasted longer

Title: Very disappointed with Tesla sales
Content: Very disappointed with Tesla sales communication just purchased a model Y and my delivery have been scheduled 3 times in the last 4 weeks the problem is the night before all delivery scheduled Tesla call and say something is wrong and we are going to have to reschedule delivery day is became a joke and I have taken days of work just for that and for a company this big and the car being a expensive car the company service and communication are terrible Im very disappointed

Title: Car become undrivable
Content: Car become undrivable Had to get roadside assistance involved Response was very quick but had no information on how long my vehicle would be gone how I would get it back THey had to bring it to a service center 3hrs away I would not recommend a tesla to people on northern new england Zero close service centers They make a great product but they don't support it They offer a 100 dollar voucher for 2 days of uber This is not helpful with kids Warranty is not up to par with competitors

Title: Ignoring the customer who paid a lot of money for the car Unbelievable
Content: To contact the customer's service is like to win a Jackpot But no winning Jackpot is more likely All my charging invoices have wrong details because they put it this way If I want to change it I have to reach the accountancy office which is in Netherlands and is only accessible thru Tesla's systems No mail address no phone number anything With each charging I'm loosing more and more money That is a disaster I'm very disappointed I was expecting much more of a company I paid a lot of money for the car not to have a proper service

Title: Tesla customer service takes its lead from Elon arrogant and inflexible
Content: Tesla gave me a heads up my car was ready on Sunday morning I was given delivery options of Monday or Tuesday Due to recent surgery follow up appointments I couldn t do Tuesday and I needed to get the vin to my credit union first thing Monday to generate the loan and check so I selected Monday evening delivery Tesla questioned if my payment would be ready and offered to allow an extra day for Wednesday delivery if we couldn t get it done on Monday I made it very clear I still wanted Monday if I could get the paperwork done I was able to get it all put together and verified tracking number of check by 2 pm on Monday but then tesla told me they No longer had drivers that evening They said if I wanted it I would have to come to Fremont because of my recent surgery I was not able to drive to Fremont so they rescheduled for Tuesday morning to deliver to my home Overnight my account was updated to have a new balance of 750 When I inquired first thing in the morning it turned out that the California fuel reward incentive that had been 1500 reduced to only 750 starting that Tuesday So basically because they delayed my delivery I now owed 750 I had expected they would make this right as most customer service oriented organizations would But they stood behind the fact that it wasn t them who decided to change the amount it was a California their hands were tied was what they claimed The customer service representative tried to defend Tesla by saying that there was an offer to deliver on Wednesday which would ve been too late so I shouldn t be complaining But I never wanted Wednesday and they never warned me what I would be losing if I waited till Wednesday I used to sell cars for a living and I know full well they have plenty of room to make this right from their own side but Tesla doesn t care because they have the market cornered don t expect them to help you out She even threatened to cancel my order if I didn t calm down on the phone

Title: These people don t know anything about customer service
Content: These people from the customer service give you false hope all the time Delivery date was scheduled 10 17 then they called because they have to fix the car for some mis alignments on the doors Pushed back on the 20th then on the 23rd then the 27th and now on 11 5 I m so sorry for your inconvinience they say all the time they called Well it s really an inconvenience Why can t you just stop messaging or calling giving dates and giving false hopes all the time Just call whenever the car is really ready This makes me so mad I shouldn t have sold my old car I thought I ll be saving some money but from what it looks like I am spending more with Uber and lift for God knows until when I know Tesla is a good e vehicle but customer service is really bad Should have gone with another brand If only I could give them 0 stars

Title: Service department should learn from the sales department
Content: Made an appointment with closest service station to be advised through the app that the parts are not in stock and rescheduled the appointment for 2 weeks later Could not make the time they gave me so has to wait even longer for an appointment The service to 2 days instead of the few hours indicated Gave me Uber vouchers not sufficient to cover the cost of where I had to go during the day When picking the car up there was a dirty cloth in the car and unlike most other service stations for other brands of car they do not wash the car If only the service department could be as professional as the sales department

Title: No car dealership has ever had a more
Content: No car dealership has ever had a more non existent customer service environment then Tesla They will never fail to disappoint you from the inability to speak to a person to their inability to resolve take issues in your car It's sad because it's a great car and I'm wanting to sell it ONLY because there is no proper customer service and that mandate come straight from had office

Title: No power from Solar panels 4 months
Content: For 2 months my solar panels have not worked They never notified me I tried reaching out to them and they said they notified the previous owner over 10 months ago I have called them 4 times about this issue No solution and each time I call the hold time is over 1 5 hours Called them today and they hung up on me as they answered Now I am being told another 2 months before someone can look at my panels

Title: Tesla is the biggest modern fraud
Content: This is the biggest modern fraud To collect a 100 promising people a car that never gets delivered No customer support Car was supposed to be delivered in August Then September October November December They do it at 2 weeks Increments so you don t cancel Wasted thousands of dollars renting cars and no communication from Tesla Save yourself from this horrible experience

Title: Worst Customer Service Ever 3 depts nearly 2 hours later I'm still on hold
Content: I called in to have a party removed from my solar rental account contract after a divorce and refinance Nearly two hours of hold time and three department transfers later I'm back on hold waiting to get transferred back to the last dept I spoke with I was just told that it will be several weeks before they can do this because it will take that long to have my documents sent over to the right dept and I will need to call back in again at that point I'm looking at listing my home for sale this month and need the other party off my contract What does it take to get anything done with this company

Title: The best cars I have ever owned
Content: Seems to be a bit of a theme in these reviews from people creating an account to write a bad review instead of speaking with Tesla about it I have a 2016 Model S from new and a 2019 Model 3 from new and they have both been just amazing experiences 200 miles daily commutes are effortless My Model 3 has saved me from what would have been a near fatal accident The autopilot and safety software is invaluable for me The best cars I have ever owned

Title: Frunk popped up and almost killed me
Content: If I could put zero I would This is the worst customer service I have every had This makes Iceland look like Harrod s My frunk popped up and nearly killed me and my family Logs said it had failed My car is a year old and cost me 110 000 The latch failed No apology just that I will have to pay for a loan car and the frunk repair because it warned me The warning was so good I didn t even know it had happened Exactly the warning you should get for a life ending failure I will never get another Tesla and I will ensure no one I know gets one Shoddy cheap parts with no customer service I had lots of damage when I got it and it was a brand new carPlease please please do not buy one

Title: Unacceptable
Content: Buying online good Delivery date found defects go into app get an appointment for 2 months later earliest I mean seriously New issues detected nobody to call communication virtually nonexistent Seriously you can get a less expensive Nissan Sentra for a fraction of the price and have much less defects better customer service and an overall better experience Kudos to telsa for making an all electric car and even trying to make it affordable but shame on you for mass producing cars with so many defects and no way to interact with a human who can help you in less then 2 months Its unacceptable

Title: If I could I would have put 0 stars
Content: If I could I would have put 0 stars I ve had service come out to fix my hood latch 3 times and it s still not fixed Then I was sent to the service center in Burbank where NO ONE WOULD TALK TO ME After about 30 minutes of waiting around they told me they didn t have the parts and to come back then they contacted me and said they would come fix it at my house They arrived at house and STILL didn t have the right part This happened a few more times then finally they wanted me to take the car 45 minutes away today to another service center This appointment was made about 2 months ago Then guess what I waited 30 minutes and they told me they DIDN'T HAVE THE PART Ha So now I have to come back now a 5th time to fix this stupid hood latch and to replace a speaker one of the service people that came to my house took out for no reason Tesla service is horrible The worst I ve ever experienced I have contemplated switching to another electric car company just based on the service alone

Title: Awful customers service from Tesla
Content: Awful customers service from Tesla I had my car less than 24hrs and tried auto steer adhering to all their rules The car pushed its rear wheel of the road I managed to intervene to keep the car on the road and not in a field but the wheel and suspension were damaged I spoke to Tesla and they were not interested in this safety incident Nobody has called I have done all the running The car is in to be repaired and there are no parts and no sign of parts for weeks I ve tried speaking to Tesla on numerous occasions and they want me to do the chasing between parts centres I asked about the investigation progress in to the initial incident and how it would be done I said that I was expecting some contact from Tesla to understand the process I was told that they can t do this because they have lots of customers this makes no sense The agent on the on the phone just wanted to argue and not listen Tesla just don t seem to care that their car might have caused a serious accident that they have a duty of care and that they can t supply simple parts At the moment I wished I d never bought a Tesla car and the way I feel right now I would recommend that others think hard before they do so I wish I d bought a Polestar or a Ford e Mach Volvo and Ford would listen and I m sure have parts Come on Tesla sort yourselves out Live up to your hype and take care of your customers

Title: Tesla the worst in the history of customer service
Content: Tesla customer service is the worst in the history of customer service Rude and arrogant

Title: My most recent experience with Tesla
Content: My most recent experience with Tesla service was abysmal In a home call my back windshield was broken by the technician who assured me that I could bring the car in the following Monday and he would personally make sure it would be replaced in an hour Then I got a message through the app that it would be two weeks before they could do it when I arrived the service writer who was rude to the extreme told me they would need the car all day and it goes downhill from there I have to agree with everyone else that while the car is great fun service is absolutely awful I was considering a Y but will now wait for other electric vehicles to come online

Title: I bought my Model X in 2018
Content: I bought my Model X in 2018 I love my car I have been lucky I have not needed any emergency repairs or service until recently I was driving on a road trip 9 6 and the treads blew off my front tire I contacted service no people can answer the phone you are re directed to the app My app was not working I had to arrange for my car to be towed to the service center to get them to do anything I had to rent a car myself for a week to get to work appointments no word from them no loaner car nothing Fast forward to last week my charge port stopped working and I could not charge my car This is kind of important My battery was super low and my app was surprise not working I called every number I could find and kept getting re directed to use the non working app I had friends download the app and they could not get it to work It turns out when Tesla repaired my tires earlier in the month they kept the data in service mode disabling my app After 4 days and an average of 3 hours a day on the phone I was able to get a service appointment for a crew to come to my location and fix it The service crew texted me no call that they would make an appointment for the next available time on 10 19 to fix it Meanwhile I missed my dentist appointment weekend plans several work meetings and they were telling me they could not fix it for 3 weeks I had my car towed to Tesla Service center yesterday and I await word from them that they even intend to fix it I love my car when it works This service has been a nightmare and I have resigned to sell my car and never look back I will never buy another Tesla product again

Title: I just bought a 2021 Model X a fee
Content: I just bought a 2021 Model X a fee months ago I asked what happens when you get a flat tire I was told they come to you and either fix it or replace it So fast forward to my first nail in the tire and I call Tesla Road Side assistance After being on hold for almost 20 min just to talk to someone he proceeds to tell me that there are literally no tires available in my area I'm in downtown Tampa not in the country AND there are no temporary spares OR anyone that can come change it He claimed there is a tire shortage How can there be a tire shortage of car manufacturer that doesn't provide spare tires on their cars My only option was to have it towed to the dealership Oh and He offered Uber credit I dont want Uber credit I want a working car Add this to the long list of problems that I have experienced with this car including no one being able to hear me on the Bluetooth even after I had it in for repair 4 times the car raising and lowering randomly several times a day the windshield wipers not working in the torrential Florida rains the self driving mode that I paid 10 000 for that doesn't work because it's still in a beta version which they never mentioned when they sold me the car Constant warnings popping up like Driver Assist unavailable the list is endless And to top it all off the customer service is the worst You can't even talk to someone when scheduling the service appt that takes many WEEKS to get I so miss my Audi and the amazing customer service that came with it

Title: Sold my M3 can't stand their service model
Content: Sold my M3 Loved the car when all works well BUT service is absolutly the worst 1 B pilar cover keep snapping off even after replacing it The service guy told me that it's not an issue Only tall and big people experience the issue therefore it's not a defect 2 If puddle door light burn the window does not work can't close the door They took 17 days to fix it the first time the next day the passenger side one burned they scheduled me for 21 days later That's when I decide to sell it I lost confidence in the service and start fearing what could happenn on a long trip

Title: I cant get a single reply
Content: I cant get a single reply for my problem I cant add my car to my account It just says try again later every day

Title: They took my payment of 134k and won t give me the car
Content: They took my payment plated the car and accepted my Montana LLC in the system The GM said they wouldn t take it when he saw my tattoos Thinks I was flipping the car I haven t heard from Corporate yet and they have had my 133 695 00 CASH and have not returned it yet

Title: Just total crap car
Content: Just total crap carAnd to think I even liked mr musk onceFor sure I would never rocket with himWhat a disaster farceCan t ever get my money back

Title: WORST COSTUMER SERVICE EVER
Content: WORST COSTUMER SERVICE EVER Never buy a new car from Tesla buy used if you like the car and never come to Service Dept

Title: Tesla s service has plummeted in the
Content: Tesla s service has plummeted in the past couple of years The only way to directly communicate with a person is via chat text or phone is if you re buying a new vehicle I currently have a service issue with my model S where it s making a concerning loud noise The ONLY way to communicate with Tesla to determine if the problem is critical is to schedule an appointment on the Tesla app which I did last night First appointment is November 8th Tesla service used to be top notch now it s barely existent I love the vehicle It s a shame they care so little after the car is purchased

Title: Wanting to put down a larger deposit
Content: Their system to pay the down payment cannot be adjusted I didn t want to put down the minimum they list of 4 500 00 I have been calling for 4 days and received texts emails One yesterday asking how much do you want to put down I emailed back in less than 5 minutes told them 12 000 00 Got no reply no update this entire day My pickup is this coming Tuesday with tomorrow bring Friday I have little choice but to only pay 4 500 00 get stuck with a 750 00 car payment rather than the 600 I wanted Terrible way to treat a brand new customer

Title: I am a pretty level headed person but
Content: I am a pretty level headed person but when I try to resolve an issue and can neither get it resolved nor reach anyone at Corporate this is unacceptable I was even told that someone would call me back but I received no call for 2 days now The Model Y has been on the market for over 1 5 years and I was told the other day that the software issues I am having are being worked on for 1 5 years Wipers do not go on in the rain Wipers go on when there's no rain Cruise control not Autopilot slammed on the breaks going at 65mph with nothing in front of my car this happened twice My wife's iPhone and my Android phone do not allow us to open the car frequently this has happened in the pouring rain I requested Fobs due to this and was told I had to purchase these for 175 each for a car that is not functioning properly not good customer service

Title: Terrible Customer Service
Content: I have an appointment scheduled for service am totally unable to contact anyone regarding re scheduling due to confilict Their chat system is a fraud there appears to be NO phone number to talk to anyone Fine car absolutely terrible customer support post sale

Title: Worst customer service in Austin Research Blvd
Content: Disappointing customer service experience While this store s hands are tied by nonsensical Tesla corporate policies the agents at this store have a bad attitude Customers who pay Tesla prices should be greeted and treated accordingly Sass sarcasm and condescending tones have no business in a functional customer relationship I was a bit shocked that the gentleman with the worst attitude is a manager of some sort His responses but more importantly the delivery of his responses were enough to make angry by the time I left the store No customer should ever be pushed to the point of having to simply walk away from a conversation because it is so infuriating Overall post sale service from Tesla has been abysmal The service center will not answer phone calls instead you will be directed to send an email to which they will never respond Save it to say that this will be the last Tesla I purchase

Title: I am only giving one star because that
Content: I am only giving one star because that is the minimum allowed Absolutely horrible customer service Due to this alone I will never purchase or lease ANY tesla products and am telling everyone I know to stay away You simply cannot speak to anyone about anything and all the emails and chats are useless

Title: Tesla Service is extremely poor
Content: This is an email I sent to a Mr Walker who I found on a search is VP Sales Email was returned no such person or email address No one at Tesla has any idea of any email addresses of their top executives Guess that sums it up for Tesla If the Brass don't hear of problem I guess they don't existMr Walker et al for the past year or so I have been exploring the purchase of an Electric Vehicle and finally decided on the new Model S Can't tell you how excited I was when I received an email telling me it had arrived I scheduled delivery for Tuesday August 31 and confirmed delivery on Monday August 30 so I sold my Lexus ES 300h on that Monday Well that excitement went quickly down the tubes as I was informed Monday right after I sold my Lexus the Tesla Model S had a battery issue that needed to be fixed Since I had just sold my Lexus I asked for a loaner car since the timeframe for the fix for the battery issue was unknown Well coming from Lexus I thought I would get the same type of EXCELLENT customer service from Tesla Well was I ever wrong I was told very firmly I must add that Tesla could not would not provide a loaner car as they don't have any And only after insisting something be done I was offered the option of using Uber to get to fro and Tesla would pay the costs Seriously Call an Uber One to get where I need to go and another to get me back home for each and every trip For an unknown period of time After repeated calls to many different Tesla employees I finally got Daniel Monez who offered me a Rental car that Tesla would pay for Took 2 5 days without transportation to get this far Finally They agreed to get me an Enterprise rental car Well to my surprise Enterprise had no cars available and nothing in the near future You think I was a bit upset at this Answer is YESI'll shorten this up a bit Tuesday Car not ready Wednesday car not ready Thursday Tech working on the car called in sick so car not ready Friday September 3 car not ready with no end in sight Still haven't got a rental either Now it's Tuesday September 7 and still no car no rental no nothing I do not want a car that requires the work that needs to be done I understand this is a totally new design with newer hardware and software and I do want it fixed properly not just fast But not providing me with a vehicle and making this seem like it is MY problem and not yours is totally unacceptable Lexus would have bent over backwards to accommodate my request for a LOANER car of the same or similar quality and style without me asking Tesla has chosen to make the customer beg for three days then make a reservation without confirming the availability of any rental cars As you can see my first experience with Tesla Service is well below expected for the price of the car And oh by the way you had no problem requiring FULL payment prior to delivery and no one has yet to offer any compensation for the inconveniences placed on me by your company I find that to be unacceptable as well Would you want to be treated in this manner after spending 100K for a car Do you find this acceptable Are you happy with your Service policy of not providing transportation to customers Or by making the customer feel this is your standard operating practice I hope the answers to these questions are NO NO NO NO I also hope that once I receive my car I will enjoy it and feel it has been worth the fight One can dream I truly hope and expect a response to this email by someone with authority to fix this NO RESPONSE WAS EVER RECEIVED NO ONE AT TESLA CARES ONCE THEY GET YOUR MONEY
